currentQuests.description: Go to Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there.  It may have a key that will allow access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Felstone Field Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

currentQuests.name: The Scourge Cauldrons
currentQuests.description: Speak with Shadow Priestess Vandis at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Return to Chillwind Point
currentQuests.description: Bring the Filled Gahrron's Withering Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Target: Gahrron's Withering
currentQuests.description: Go to Gahrron's Withering in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Gahrron's Withering Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

currentQuests.name: Return to Chillwind Camp
currentQuests.description: Bring the Filled Writhing Haunt Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Target: Writhing Haunt
currentQuests.description: Go to the Writhing Haunt in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Writhing Haunt Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

currentQuests.name: Return to Chillwind Camp
currentQuests.description: Bring the Filled Dalson's Tears Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Target: Dalson's Tears
currentQuests.description: Go to Dalson's Tears in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there, and use its key to gain access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Dalson's Tears Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

currentQuests.name: Return to Chillwind Camp
currentQuests.description: Bring the Filled Felstone Field Bottle to High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Target: Felstone Field
currentQuests.description: Go to Felstone Field in Western Plaguelands to locate and defeat the Cauldron Lord present there.  It may have a key that will allow access to the cauldron.  You must have the Empty Felstone Field Bottle with you to secure a sample of the poisons used inside the cauldron.

currentQuests.name: The Scourge Cauldrons
currentQuests.description: Speak with High Priestess MacDonnell at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Legplates of the Chromatic Defier
currentQuests.description: To forge the Legplates of the Chromatic Defier, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':$B$B1 Chromatic Carapace.$B$B10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.$B$B10 Blood of Heroes.$B$B5 Skin of Shadow.

currentQuests.name: Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight
currentQuests.description: To forge the Breastplate of the Chromatic Flight, you will be required to bring the following items to Jeziba the 'Sculptor':$B$B1 Chromatic Carapace.$B$B10 Brilliant Chromatic Scales.$B$B10 Blood of Heroes.$B$B10 Frayed Abomination Stitchings.

currentQuests.name: Catalogue of the Wayward
currentQuests.description: Read from the Catalogue of the Wayward.

currentQuests.name: Wrath of the Blue Flight
currentQuests.description: Speak with Jeziba in the Plaguelands. He resides in Andorhal.

currentQuests.name: The Annals of Darrowshire
currentQuests.description: Bring the Annals of Darrowshire to Chromie in Andorhal.

currentQuests.name: All Along the Watchtowers
currentQuests.description: Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: All Along the Watchtowers
currentQuests.description: Using the Beacon Torch, mark each tower in Andorhal; you will need to stand in the doorway of the tower to successfully mark it.$B$BOnce all four towers are marked, return the Beacon Torch to Commander Ashlam Valorfist in Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Scarlet Diversions
currentQuests.description: Proceed to the Scarlet Crusade's base camp between Felstone Field and Dalson's Tears and destroy their command tent.$B$BPlace the Scourge banner at the camp, and then return to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
currentQuests.description: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glades and the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
currentQuests.description: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glade and the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
currentQuests.description: Seek out High Executor Derrington.  His base camp is located at the Bulwark, east of Tirisfal Glade and the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Clear the Way
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Skeletal Flayers and 10 Slavering Ghouls in Sorrow Hill.$B$BReturn to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Two Halves Become One
currentQuests.description: Locate the other half of the Good Luck Charm somewhere on the Felstone Farm in Western Plaguelands and reassemble it.$B$BGive the Good Luck Charm to Janice Felstone on the Felstone Farm, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Good Luck Charm
currentQuests.description: Return to Janice Felstone in Western Plaguelands her Good Luck Half-Charm.

currentQuests.name: Better Late Than Never
currentQuests.description: Check with the Royal Overseers of the Undercity to learn the whereabouts of a Jeremiah Felstone.  There is usually a census officer located near guild and tabard registration.

currentQuests.name: Better Late Than Never
currentQuests.description: Check with the Royal Factors of Stormwind to learn the whereabouts of an Emma Felstone.  There is usually a census officer located in City Hall.

currentQuests.name: Better Late Than Never
currentQuests.description: The ramblings of the ghostly woman indicated that she needed a package delivered.  She claimed that it was where her horse was.  As to where the horse is or where the package was to be delivered - the ghost remains incomprehensible.

currentQuests.name: Glyphed Oaken Branch
currentQuests.description: Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Thunder Bluff is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.

currentQuests.name: Glyphed Oaken Branch
currentQuests.description: Based on the magic enchanted within the Glyphed Oaken Branch, its delivery to the Cenarion Circle in Darnassus is the next step the tauren druid sought.  Seek one of the druids there for assistance.

currentQuests.name: The Wildlife Suffers Too
currentQuests.description: Destroy 8 Diseased Grizzlies, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: The Wildlife Suffers Too
currentQuests.description: Destroy 8 Diseased Wolves, and then return to Mulgris Deepriver at the Writhing Haunt, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Counting Out Time
currentQuests.description: Locate 5 Andorhal Watches amongst the rubble of the city, and return with them to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Counting Out Time
currentQuests.description: Locate 5 Andorhal Watches, found in lockboxes amongst the rubble of the city.  Return with them to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: A Matter of Time
currentQuests.description: Use the Temporal Displacer near one of Andorhal's silos and uncover Temporal Parasites.$B$BSlay 10 Temporal Parasites, and then return the Temporal Displacer to Chromie in the Andorhal Inn, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Skeletal Fragments
currentQuests.description: Bring 15 Skeletal Fragments to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Scholomance
currentQuests.description: Speak with Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Alas, Andorhal
currentQuests.description: Bring Araj's Phylactery Shard to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Alas, Andorhal
currentQuests.description: Bring Araj's Phylactery Shard to High Executor Derrington at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: The Glowing Shard
currentQuests.description: Travel to Ratchet to find someone that can tell you more about the glowing shard.$B$BThen, deliver the shard as you are directed.

currentQuests.name: The Glowing Shard
currentQuests.description: Travel to Ratchet to find the meaning behind the Nightmare Shard.

currentQuests.name: Smart Drinks
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 portions of Wailing Essence to Mebok Mizzyrix in Ratchet.

currentQuests.name: Nara Wildmane
currentQuests.description: Speak with Nara Wildmane.

currentQuests.name: Hamuul Runetotem
currentQuests.description: Speak with Hamuul Runetotem.

currentQuests.name: Deviate Eradication
currentQuests.description: Ebru in the Wailing Caverns wants you to kill 7 Deviate Ravagers, 7 Deviate Vipers, 7 Deviate Shamblers and 7 Deviate Dreadfangs.

currentQuests.name: Deviate Hides
currentQuests.description: Nalpak in the Wailing Caverns wants 20 Deviate Hides.

currentQuests.name: Serpentbloom
currentQuests.description: Apothecary Zamah in Thunder Bluff wants you to collect 10 Serpentbloom.

currentQuests.name: Trouble at the Docks
currentQuests.description: Crane Operator Bigglefuzz in Ratchet wants you to retrieve the bottle of 99-Year-Old Port from Mad Magglish who is hiding in the Wailing Caverns.

currentQuests.name: Leaders of the Fang
currentQuests.description: Bring the Gems of Cobrahn, Anacondra, Pythas and Serpentis to Nara Wildmane in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Shizzle's Flyer
currentQuests.description: Collect 8 Webbed Diemetradon Scales and 8 Webbed Pterrordax Scales for Shizzle in Marshal's Refuge.

currentQuests.name: Volcanic Activity
currentQuests.description: Collect 9 samples of Un'Goro Ash from the fire elementals around the volcano in Un'Goro Crater, and return them to Liv Rizzlefix in Ratchet.

currentQuests.name: Beware of Pterrordax
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Pterrordax and 15 Frenzied Pterrordax, then speak to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Refuge.

currentQuests.name: Lost!
currentQuests.description: Find Ringo at Fire Plume Ridge.

currentQuests.name: A Little Help From My Friends
currentQuests.description: Lead Ringo to Spraggle Frock at Marshal's Refuge.$B$BIf Ringo faints, use Spraggle's Canteen to revive him.

currentQuests.name: Making Sense of It
currentQuests.description: Speak with J.D. Collie in a moment.

currentQuests.name: The Mighty U'cha
currentQuests.description: Bring U'cha's Pelt to Torwa Pathfinder at the entrance of Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: The Bait for Lar'korwi
currentQuests.description: Using the contents of Torwa's Pouch, summon Lar'korwi and defeat him. Then bring Lar'korwi's Head to Torwa Pathfinder near the entrance to Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: The Scent of Lar'korwi
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Ravasaur Pheromone Glands to Torwa Pathfinder near the entrance to Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: The Fare of Lar'korwi
currentQuests.description: Find the carcass of Lar'korwi's freshest kill and steal a Piece of Threshadon Carcass before returning to Torwa Pathfinder in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: The Apes of Un'Goro
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Un'Goro Gorilla Pelts, 2 Un'Goro Stomper Pelts, and 2 Un'Goro Thunderer Pelts to Torwa Pathfinder at the entrance of Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: The Western Pylon
currentQuests.description: Discover the location of the Western Crystal Pylon.

currentQuests.name: The Eastern Pylon
currentQuests.description: Discover the location of the Eastern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: The Northern Pylon
currentQuests.description: Discover the location of the Northern Crystal Pylon in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: Crystals of Power
currentQuests.description: Collect 7 Power Crystals of each color: red, blue, yellow, and green. Bring them to J.D. Collie at Marshal's Refuge.

currentQuests.name: Chasing A-Me 01
currentQuests.description: Escort A-Me 01 back to Karna Remtravel in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: Chasing A-Me 01
currentQuests.description: Find a Mithril Casing and return to A-Me 01 in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: Chasing A-Me 01
currentQuests.description: Find A-Me 01 in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: Marvon's Workshop
currentQuests.description: Travel to Marvon Rivetseeker's workshop in Ratchet.

currentQuests.name: Larion and Muigin
currentQuests.description: Hunt 5 Bloodpetal Lashers, 5 Bloodpetal Threshers, 5 Bloodpetal Flayers and 5 Bloodpetal Trappers for Larion at Marshal's Refuge.

currentQuests.name: Haze of Evil
currentQuests.description: Collect 5 samples of Atal'ai Haze, then return to Muigin in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: A Visit to Gregan
currentQuests.description: Take a Bloodpetal to Gregan Brewspewer in Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Muigin and Larion
currentQuests.description: Collect 15 Bloodpetals and return to Muigin.

currentQuests.name: Silver Heart
currentQuests.description: Collect 11 Silvery Claws and 1 Irontree Heart for Eridan Bluewind in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Aquementas
currentQuests.description: Take the Book of Aquor, the Silvery Claws, and the Irontree Heart to Tanaris.$B$BUse the Book of Aquor to summon Aquementas.$B$BAfter you have the completed totem, take it to J.D. Collie in Marshal's Refuge.

currentQuests.name: It's Dangerous to Go Alone
currentQuests.description: Travel to Fire Plume Ridge, south of Marshal's Refuge.$B$BFind Blazerunner and use the totem to remove his protective aura. Once he has been defeated, acquire the Golden Flame from the cave.

currentQuests.name: Linken's Adventure
currentQuests.description: Take the Silver Totem of Aquementas to Linken in Marshal's Refuge.

currentQuests.name: Linken's Memory
currentQuests.description: Find Eridan Bluewind in southern Felwood.

currentQuests.name: A Gnome's Assistance
currentQuests.description: Find J.D. Collie in the cave at Marshal's Refuge.

currentQuests.name: Linken's Sword
currentQuests.description: Deliver Linken's Superior Sword to Linken in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: A Grave Situation
currentQuests.description: Resurrect, then look for the gravestone that Gaeriyan told you to find.

currentQuests.name: Meet at the Grave
currentQuests.description: Go to the graveyard outside Gadgetzan, and use the Videre Elixir. Follow the rest of Donova's instructions to find Gaeriyan.

currentQuests.name: The Videre Elixir
currentQuests.description: Seek out Gregan Brewspewer in northern Feralas. From him, learn how you may acquire the Videre Elixir, then return to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

currentQuests.name: It's a Secret to Everybody
currentQuests.description: Take Linken's Sword to Donova Snowden in Winterspring.

currentQuests.name: Williden's Journal
currentQuests.description: Return the journal to Williden Marshal somewhere in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: Alien Ecology
currentQuests.description: Use the Scraping Vial to collect a Hive Wall Sample from one of the Gorishi hive hatcheries in Un'Goro Crater.  Look for the chambers with the hanging larval spawns.$B$BBring the Hive Wall Sample to Hol'anyee Marshal in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: Roll the Bones
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Dinosaur Bones to Spark Nilminer in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: Expedition Salvation
currentQuests.description: Bring a Crate of Foodstuffs and Research Equipment to Williden Marshal in Un'Goro Crater.

currentQuests.name: It's a Secret to Everybody
currentQuests.description: Examine the items inside the pack and bring them to their owner.

currentQuests.name: It's a Secret to Everybody
currentQuests.description: Look around in the pond for a clue about who this wrecked raft may belong to.

currentQuests.name: The New Springs
currentQuests.description: Travel to Winterspring and speak with Donova Snowden.

currentQuests.name: Finding the Source
currentQuests.description: Krakle in Un'Goro Crater wants you to find the hottest area of Fire Plume Ridge.$B$BWhenever you find a hot spot, right click the thermometer to check the temperature. Keep looking until you find the hottest one.

currentQuests.name: Marla's Last Wish
currentQuests.description: Bring Samuel Fipps' Remains to Marla's Grave, then return to Novice Elreth.

currentQuests.name: The Champion of the Banshee Queen
currentQuests.description: Speak with Nathanos Blightcaller in the Eastern Plaguelands. He is said to have taken up residence at the Marris Stead.

currentQuests.name: A Plague Upon Thee
currentQuests.description: Find someplace suitable in the center of the Northridge Lumber Mill in Western Plaguelands to place the Barrel of Plagueland Termites.

currentQuests.name: A Plague Upon Thee
currentQuests.description: Use the Empty Termite Jar on the Termite Mounds in Eastern Plaguelands. After you've gathered 100 Plagueland Termites, return to Mickey Levine at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.

currentQuests.name: Welcome!
currentQuests.description: Bring the Deathknell Gift Voucher to Claire Willower in Deathknell.

currentQuests.name: Doom Weed
currentQuests.description: Collect 10 Doom Weed and deliver them back to Junior Apothecary Holland.

currentQuests.name: Gordo's Task
currentQuests.description: Collect 3 Gloom Weed and deliver them to Junior Apothecary Holland in the Brill graveyard.

currentQuests.name: The Jeremiah Blues
currentQuests.description: Find Jeremiah Payson in the Undercity and see if he is in fact Jeremiah Felstone.  If he is, then perhaps he'd like the package Janice Felstone made for him.

currentQuests.name: Melding of Influences
currentQuests.description: Bring a Merged Ooze Sample to Chemist Fuely in Undercity.

currentQuests.name: ... and a Batch of Ooze
currentQuests.description: Gather Un'Goro Slime Samples from any of the slimes in Un'Goro Crater. Then, using the Testing Equipment next to Chemist Fuely in Undercity, see which of your samples are the most pure. Bring 5 of the Pure Un'Goro Samples you find to Chemist Fuely.

currentQuests.name: A Sample of Slime...
currentQuests.description: Gather Felwood Slime Samples from any of the slimes in Felwood. Then, using the Testing Equipment next to Chemist Fuely in Undercity, see which of your samples are the most corrupt. Bring 5 of the Corrupted Felwood Samples you find to Chemist Fuely.

currentQuests.name: Scavenging Deathknell
currentQuests.description: Search Deathknell and the vicinity for 6 pieces of Scavenged Goods, and return them to Deathguard Saltain.

currentQuests.name: Rattling the Rattlecages
currentQuests.description: Kill 12 Rattlecage Skeletons, and then return to Shadow Priest Sarvis in Deathknell when you are done.

currentQuests.name: Assisting Arch Druid Runetotem
currentQuests.description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Seeping Corruption
currentQuests.description: Give Cuely's Elixir to Thersa Windsong in Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Seeping Corruption
currentQuests.description: Fill all 4 Empty Vials at the tide pools along the coast of the Ruins of Eldarath in Azshara before returning to Chemist Cuely.

currentQuests.name: Lines of Communication
currentQuests.description: Oran Snakewrithe in Undercity wants you to travel to the Hinterlands and burn the Highvale Records, Highvale Report, and Highvale Notes.

currentQuests.name: Zinge's Delivery
currentQuests.description: Bring the Wolf Heart Samples to Apothecary Zinge in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Sample for Helbrim
currentQuests.description: Bring the Wolf Heart Sample to Apothecary Helbrim in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: To Steal From Thieves
currentQuests.description: Bring Kenata, Fardel, and Marcel Dabyrie's Heads to Genavie Callow in Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Test of Lore
currentQuests.description: Find The Beginnings of the Undead Threat, and return it to Parqual Fintallas in Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Hearts of Zeal
currentQuests.description: Master Apothecary Faranell in the Undercity wants 20 Hearts of Zeal.

currentQuests.name: In the Name of the Light
currentQuests.description: Kill High Inquisitor Whitemane, Scarlet Commander Mograine,  Herod, the Scarlet Champion and Houndmaster Loksey and then report back to Raleigh the Devout in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Vorrel's Revenge
currentQuests.description: Return Vorrel Sengutz's wedding ring to Monika Sengutz in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Mythology of the Titans
currentQuests.description: Retrieve Mythology of the Titans from the Monastery and bring it to Librarian Mae Paledust in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Compendium of the Fallen
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Compendium of the Fallen from the Monastery in Tirisfal Glades and return to Sage Truthseeker in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Into The Scarlet Monastery
currentQuests.description: Kill High Inquisitor Whitemane, Scarlet Commander Mograine, Herod, the Scarlet Champion and Houndmaster Loksey and then report back to Varimathras in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: The New Frontier
currentQuests.description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

currentQuests.name: Return to Apothecary Zinge
currentQuests.description: Bring the Sealed Field Testing Kit to Apothecary Zinge in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: The Star, the Hand and the Heart
currentQuests.description: Bring the items on Bel'dugur's Note to Keeper Bel'dugur in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: A Rogue's Deal
currentQuests.description: Defeat Calvin Montague in Deathknell.

currentQuests.name: The Crown of Will
currentQuests.description: Report to Melisara at Tarren Mill in the Hillsbrad Foothills.

currentQuests.name: A New Plague
currentQuests.description: Bring Johaan's Special Drink to the Captured Mountaineer.

currentQuests.name: Delivery to Silverpine Forest
currentQuests.description: Take Apothecary Johaan's findings to Apothecary Renferrel in Silverpine Forest.

currentQuests.name: At War With The Scarlet Crusade
currentQuests.description: Executor Zygand of Brill wants you to kill 10 Scarlet Warriors.

currentQuests.name: The Mills Overrun
currentQuests.description: Gather 5 Notched Ribs and 3 Blackened Skulls, then return to Deathguard Dillinger in Brill.

currentQuests.name: The Prodigal Lich Returns
currentQuests.description: Bring the Nether Gem to Bethor Iceshard in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Proving Allegiance
currentQuests.description: Obtain a Candle of Beckoning.$B$BSummon Lillith Nefara and kill her.$B$BReturn to Gunther on his island.

currentQuests.name: The Family Crypt
currentQuests.description: Kill 8 Wailing Ancestors and 8 Rotting Ancestors.$B$BKill Captain Dargol, and bring his skull to Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

currentQuests.name: Fields of Grief
currentQuests.description: Take the Laced Pumpkin to the Captured Scarlet Zealot who is being held in the cellar of the Gallow's End Tavern.

currentQuests.name: The Prodigal Lich
currentQuests.description: Present Sevren's Orders to Bethor Iceshard in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: A Putrid Task
currentQuests.description: Bring 7 Putrid Claws to Deathguard Dillinger in Brill.

currentQuests.name: Wanted: Maggot Eye
currentQuests.description: Kill Maggot Eye and return to Executor Zygand in Brill with his paw for a reward.

currentQuests.name: Vital Intelligence
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Scarlet Crusade Documents to Executor Zygand in Brill.

currentQuests.name: The Red Messenger
currentQuests.description: Kill Meven Korgal, the messenger, at the Crusader camp, then return any information you find to Executor Arren.

currentQuests.name: The Scarlet Crusade
currentQuests.description: Bring Executor Arren 12 Scarlet Armbands from Scarlet Converts and Scarlet Initiates.

currentQuests.name: Night Web's Hollow
currentQuests.description: Executor Arren wants you to kill 10 Young Night Web Spiders and 8 Night Web Spiders.

currentQuests.name: The Damned
currentQuests.description: Novice Elreth requires 6 Scavenger Paws and 6 Duskbat Wings.

currentQuests.name: The Chill of Death
currentQuests.description: Bring five Duskbat Pelts and some Coarse Thread to Gretchen Dedmar in Brill.

currentQuests.name: Proof of Demise
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Scarlet Insignia Rings to Deathguard Burgess in Brill.

currentQuests.name: At War With The Scarlet Crusade
currentQuests.description: Executor Zygand in the town of Brill wants you to assassinate Captain Melrache and his two bodyguards.

currentQuests.name: At War With The Scarlet Crusade
currentQuests.description: Executor Zygand in Brill has commissioned you to slay Captain Vachon and 5 Scarlet Friars.

currentQuests.name: At War With The Scarlet Crusade
currentQuests.description: Executor Zygand in Brill wants you to kill Captain Perrine, 3 Scarlet Zealots and 3 Scarlet Missionaries.

currentQuests.name: A New Plague
currentQuests.description: Apothecary Johaan in the town of Brill wants you to bring him 4 samples of venom from a Vicious Night Web Spider.

currentQuests.name: A New Plague
currentQuests.description: Apothecary Johaan of the town of Brill needs 5 Vile Fin Scales from Murlocs in Tirisfal Glades.

currentQuests.name: A New Plague
currentQuests.description: Apothecary Johaan in the town of Brill wants you to collect 5 Vials of Darkhound Blood.

currentQuests.name: Return the Book
currentQuests.description: Return Gunther's Spellbook to him, on the island of Gunther's Retreat.

currentQuests.name: Fields of Grief
currentQuests.description: Steal 10 pumpkins from the farm to the west, just north of Deathknell and take them to Apothecary Johaan in Brill.

currentQuests.name: The Mindless Ones
currentQuests.description: Shadow Priest Sarvis wants you to kill 8 Mindless Zombies and 8 Wretched Zombies.

currentQuests.name: Rude Awakening
currentQuests.description: Speak with Shadow Priest Sarvis.

currentQuests.name: The Haunted Mills
currentQuests.description: Slay Devlin Agamand, and bring Devlin's Remains to Coleman Farthing in Brill.

currentQuests.name: A Letter Undelivered
currentQuests.description: Find Yvette Farthing, and deliver to her the letter from Thurman Agamand.

currentQuests.name: Return to the Magistrate
currentQuests.description: Return to Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

currentQuests.name: Forsaken Duties
currentQuests.description: Speak with Deathguard Linnea.

currentQuests.name: Graverobbers
currentQuests.description: Kill Rot Hide Graverobbers and Rot Hide Mongrels.  $B$BBring 8 Embalming Ichors to Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

currentQuests.name: The Lich's Identity
currentQuests.description: Bring the Lich's Spellbook to Bethor Iceshard in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Rear Guard Patrol
currentQuests.description: Kill 8 Bleeding Horrors and 8 Wandering Spirits, then report back to Linnea at her camp.

currentQuests.name: Speak with Sevren
currentQuests.description: Speak with Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

currentQuests.name: Deaths in the Family
currentQuests.description: Bring Gregor's Remains, Nissa's Remains and Thurman's Remains to Coleman Farthing in Brill.

currentQuests.name: Errand for Apothecary Zinge
currentQuests.description: Bring the Field Sampling Kit to Apothecary Zinge in the Undercity.

currentQuests.description: Use the Ectoplasmic Distiller near incorporeal undead to collect 12 Scorched Ectoplasms in Silithus, 12 Frozen Ectoplasms in Winterspring and 12 Stable Ectoplasms in the Eastern Plaguelands.  Bring them along with the Ectoplasmic Distiller back to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan.

currentQuests.description: Take the Sealed Venom Container to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan.

currentQuests.description: Bring the Sealed Blood Container to Mux Manascrambler inside Gadgetzan in Tanaris.

currentQuests.description: Return to Mux Manascrambler in Gadgetzan with 1 Delicate Arcanite Converter, 4 Greater Eternal Essence, 10 Stonescale Oil, 25 Volcanic Ash and 40 gold.

Use the Skeleton Key Mold by the lava lake to forge the Unfinished Skeleton Key.$B$BBring the Unfinished Skeleton Key to Apothecary Dithers at the Bulwark, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Fire Plume Forged
currentQuests.description: Take the Skeleton Key Mold and 2 Thorium Bars to the top of Fire Plume Ridge in Un'Goro Crater.  Use the Skeleton Key Mold by the lava lake to forge the Unfinished Skeleton Key.$B$BBring the Unfinished Skeleton Key to Alchemist Arbington at Chillwind Point, Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.description: Bring Pestlezugg's Un'Goro Report to Gracina Spiritmight in Darnassus.

currentQuests.description: Defeat the Gorishi Hive Queen once she is summoned.$B$BBring the Gorishi Queen's Brain to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

currentQuests.description: Collect a Laden Dew Gland and bring it to Marin Noggenfogger in Gadgetzan.

currentQuests.description: Show Tooga the way back to his wife, Torta.

currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Wastewander Water Pouches to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan in exchange for another power source.

currentQuests.description: Acquire acceptable samples for 8 basilisks, 8 hyenas, and 8 scorpions.  Bring the testing kit back to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan before the power source runs out.

currentQuests.description: Escort OOX-17/TN to Steamwheedle Port, then report to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Wastewander Water Pouches to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan.

currentQuests.name: Find OOX-17/TN!
currentQuests.description: Bring the distress beacon to Oglethorpe's homing robot.

currentQuests.name: Into the Field
currentQuests.description: Speak to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle in Gadgetzan about getting a power source for the testing kit.

currentQuests.name: Rise of the Silithid
currentQuests.description: Take the Insect Analysis Report to Gracina Spiritmight in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Insect Part Analysis
currentQuests.description: Deliver the report to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser in Gadgetzan.  Be sure he gives you a copy of the report, as Alchemist Pestlezugg has requested.

currentQuests.name: Insect Part Analysis
currentQuests.description: Check in Gadgetzan for Alchemist Pestlezugg and his analysis of the insect parts.

currentQuests.name: Noxious Lair Investigation
currentQuests.description: Bring five Centipaar insect parts from the Noxious Lair to Alchemist Pestlezugg in Gadgetzan.

currentQuests.name: Rise of the Silithid
currentQuests.description: Take the report to Zilzibin Drumlore in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: The Scrimshank Redemption
currentQuests.description: Discover the fate of Junior Surveyor Scrimshank, and bring either him or his surveying equipment to Senior Surveyor Fizzledowser in Gadgetzan.

currentQuests.name: In Eranikus' Own Words
currentQuests.description: Travel to the eastern part of Winterspring and speak with Umbranse the Spiritspeaker.

currentQuests.name: The Essence of Eranikus
currentQuests.description: Bring the Oathstone of Ysera's Dragonflight and the Chained Essence of Eranikus to Itharius in the Swamp of Sorrows.  It is there that you will make your choice to aid Ysera's Dragonflight or not.

currentQuests.name: The Swamp Talker
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Warchief's Orders and return them to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Orders
currentQuests.description: Speak to Bengor.

currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Monstrous Crawler Legs to Dar in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: The Atal'ai Exile
currentQuests.description: Bring the Bundle of Atal'ai Artifacts to the Atal'ai Exile in the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Continued Threat
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Marsh Inkspewers, 10 Marsh Flesheaters, and 10 Marsh Oracles, then return to Katar in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Threat From the Sea
currentQuests.description: Speak with Tok'Kar in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Threat From the Sea
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Marsh Murlocs, 10 Marsh Inkspewer, and 10 Marsh Flesheater, then return to Katar in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Deliver the Shipment
currentQuests.description: Bring the Shipment to Nethergarde to Quartermaster Lungertz in Nethergarde Keep.

currentQuests.name: Pool of Tears
currentQuests.description: Fel'zerul in Stonard wants you to gather 10 Atal'ai Artifacts.

currentQuests.name: The Lost Supplies
currentQuests.description: Bring the Lost Supplies to Quartermaster Lungertz.

currentQuests.name: Threat From the Sea
currentQuests.description: Speak to Katar in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: The Lost Caravan
currentQuests.description: Find the Caravan Chest in the Fallow Sanctuary, obtain the Wizards' Reagents and bring to Watcher Biggs.

currentQuests.name: Neeka Bloodscar
currentQuests.description: Speak with Neeka Bloodscar.

currentQuests.name: Driftwood
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 pieces of Sundried Driftwood to Watcher Biggs in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Encroaching Wildlife
currentQuests.description: Kill 8 Young Sawtooth Crocolisks, 10 Sorrow Spinners and 10 Swamp Jaguars then return to Watcher Biggs in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Galen's Escape
currentQuests.description: Escort Galen out of danger, then find his camp in the Swamp of Sorrows and open his strongbox.

currentQuests.name: Noboru the Cudgel
currentQuests.description: Bring Noboru's Cudgel to the leader of The Harborage in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Draenethyst Crystals
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Draenethyst crystals to Magtoor at The Harborage in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Dream Dust in the Swamp
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Specks of Dream Dust to Krazek in Booty Bay.  Dream Dust is gathered from the dragon whelps of the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Lack of Surplus
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Sawtooth Snapper Claws to Tok'Kar in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: Lack of Surplus
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Unprepared Sawtooth Flanks to Tok'Kar in Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: The Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
currentQuests.description: Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth Jarien and Sothos and slay them. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the recombined Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.

currentQuests.name: The Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
currentQuests.description: Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth Jarien and Sothos and slay them. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.

conditions.name: Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet

currentQuests.name: Dead Man's Plea
currentQuests.description: Go into Stratholme and rescue Ysida Harmon from Baron Rivendare.

currentQuests.name: Ramstein
currentQuests.description: Travel to Stratholme and slay Ramstein the Gorger. Take his head as a souvenir for Nathanos.

currentQuests.name: Of Love and Family
currentQuests.description: Travel to Stratholme, in the northern part of the Plaguelands. It is in the Scarlet Bastion that you will find the painting 'Of Love and Family,' hidden behind another painting depicting the twin moons of our world.$B$BReturn the painting to Tirion Fordring.

currentQuests.name: Menethil's Gift
currentQuests.description: Travel to Stratholme and find Menethil's Gift. Place the Keepsake of Remembrance upon the unholy ground.

currentQuests.name: The Restless Souls
currentQuests.description: Use Egan's Blaster on the ghostly and spectral citizens of Stratholme. When the restless souls break free from their ghostly shells, use the blaster again - freedom will be theirs!$B$BFree 15 Restless Souls and return to Egan.

currentQuests.name: Above and Beyond
currentQuests.description: Venture to Stratholme and destroy Baron Rivendare. Take his head and return to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff.

currentQuests.name: The Truth Comes Crashing Down
currentQuests.description: Take the Head of Balnazzar to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: The Archivist
currentQuests.description: Travel to Stratholme and find Archivist Galford of the Scarlet Crusade. Destroy him and burn down the Scarlet Archive.

currentQuests.name: Houses of the Holy
