currentQuests.name: Protect Kaya
currentQuests.description: Escort Kaya Flathoof to Camp Aparaje, and then return to Makaba Flathoof near the southeastern edge of Stonetalon.

currentQuests.name: Earthen Arise
currentQuests.description: Open the Resonite cask with the Enchanted Resonite Crystal, and then slay Goggeroc. Return to Mor'rogal with the news and Enchanted Resonite Crystal.

currentQuests.name: Blood Feeders
currentQuests.description: Xen'zilla at Malaka'Jin needs you to kill 10 Deepmoss Creepers and 7 Deepmoss Venomspitters.

currentQuests.name: Boulderslide Ravine
currentQuests.description: Explore deep into the cave at Boulderslide Ravine and bring back 10 Resonite Crystals for Mor'rogal at Sun Rock Retreat to investigate.

currentQuests.name: Kaya's Alive
currentQuests.description: Tell Tammra Windfield in Sun Rock Retreat the good news.

currentQuests.name: Elemental War
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Incendrites to Tsunaman at Sun Rock Retreat.

currentQuests.name: New Life
currentQuests.description: Plant 10 Gaea Seeds in Gaea Dirt Mounds, and then return the remaining Enchanted Gaea Seeds to Tammra at Sun Rock Retreat.

currentQuests.name: Cycle of Rebirth
currentQuests.description: Tammra Windfield at Sun Rock Retreat wants you to gather 10 Gaea Seeds.

currentQuests.name: Arachnophobia
currentQuests.description: Kill Besseleth and bring Besseleth's Fang to Maggran at Sun Rock Retreat.

currentQuests.name: Bloodfury Bloodline
currentQuests.description: Maggran at Sun Rock Retreat wishes you to slay Bloodfury Ripper and bring her remains as proof of your deed.

currentQuests.name: Harpies Threaten
currentQuests.description: Maggran Earthbinder in Sun Rock Retreat wants you to slay 7 Bloodfury Harpies, 7 Bloodfury Ambushers, 7 Bloodfury Slayers and 7 Bloodfury Roguefeathers.

currentQuests.name: Calling in the Reserves
currentQuests.description: Maggran wishes you to deliver a letter to Grish Longrunner at the Great Lift in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Gerenzo Wrenchwhistle
currentQuests.description: Bring Gerenzo Wrenchwhistle's Mechanical Arm to Ziz Fizziks in the Stonetalon Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Further Instructions
currentQuests.description: Bring the new orders to Ziz Fizziks in the Stonetalon Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Further Instructions
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Sealed Envelope to Sputtervalve in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Super Reaper 6000
currentQuests.description: Get the Super Reaper 6000 Blueprints for Ziz Fizziks in the Stonetalon Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Gerenzo's Orders
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Unidentified Ore to Ziz Fizziks in the Stonetalon Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Kaela's Update
currentQuests.description: Bring the Venture Co. Letters to Kaela Shadowspear.

currentQuests.name: Gerenzo's Orders
currentQuests.description: Get the mysterious ore from Piznik after he finishes mining it.

currentQuests.name: The Den
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Den on Stonetalon Peak. Using the Gatekeeper's Key, obtain the druids' hidden items. Use these items to open the Talon Den Hoard.

currentQuests.name: Ordanus
currentQuests.description: Bring Ordanus' head to Braelyn Firehand near Sun Rock Retreat.

currentQuests.name: Cenarius' Legacy
currentQuests.description: Kill 4 Sons of Cenarius, 4 Daughters of Cenarius and 4 Cenarion Botanists for Braelyn Firehand near Sun Rock Retreat.

currentQuests.name: Wounded Ancients
currentQuests.description: Bring a piece of Corroded Shrapnel to Kaela Shadowspear in Stonetalon.

currentQuests.name: Enraged Spirits
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Smoldering Embers from any of the fire elementals in the Charred Vale to Kaela Shadowspear in Stonetalon.

currentQuests.name: Update for Sentinel Thenysil
currentQuests.description: Return to Sentinel Thenysil in Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: Reception from Tyrande
currentQuests.description: Find Tyrande Whisperwind in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Covert Ops - Beta
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Venture Co. Letters from Windshear Mine at the east end of Windshear Crag.

currentQuests.name: Covert Ops - Alpha
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Venture Co.'s Engineering Plans from the lumber mill in Windshear Crag.

currentQuests.name: Retrieval for Mauren
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Crystalized Scales to Collin Mauren in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Special Delivery for Gaxim
currentQuests.description: Bring the Scroll of Messaging to Gaxim Rustfizzle in Stonetalon.

currentQuests.name: Devils in Westfall
currentQuests.description: Bring Dust Devil Debris to Collin Mauren in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: A Scroll from Mauren
currentQuests.description: Find Collin Mauren in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Ineptitude + Chemicals = Fun
currentQuests.description: Bring the Nitromirglyceronium back to Gaxim Rustfizzle in Stonetalon.

currentQuests.name: Ineptitude + Chemicals = Fun
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Minor Mana Potions and 2 Elixirs of Minor Fortitude to Lomac Gearstrip in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: An Old Colleague
currentQuests.description: Speak to Lomac Gearstrip in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: A Gnome's Respite
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Venture Co. Loggers, and 10 Venture Co. Deforesters and return to Gaxim Rustfizzle in Stonetalon.

currentQuests.name: Shredding Machines
currentQuests.description: Kill the shredders XT:4 and XT:9, then return to Seereth Stonebreak at the border of the Stonetalon Mountains and the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: The Elder Crone
currentQuests.description: Speak with Magatha in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Goblin Invaders
currentQuests.description: Kill 15 Venture Co. Loggers, then return to Seereth Stonebreak on the border of Stonetalon and the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: The Spirits of Stonetalon
currentQuests.description: Speak with Seereth Stonebreak in the Stonetalon Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Reclaiming the Charred Vale
currentQuests.description: Travel to Falfindel Waywarder on the border of Thousand Needles and Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Jin'Zil's Forest Magic
currentQuests.description: Witch Doctor Jin'Zil at Malaka'jin wants 5 portions of Stonetalon Sap, 5 Twilight Whiskers, 30 Courser Eyes and a Fey Dragon Scale.

currentQuests.name: Reclaiming the Charred Vale
currentQuests.description: Keeper Albagorm on Stonetalon Peak wants you to slay 7 Bloodfury Harpies, 7 Bloodfury Ambushers, 7 Bloodfury Slayers and 7 Bloodfury Roguefeathers.

currentQuests.name: Return to Podrig
currentQuests.description: Buy a bat ride to the Sepulcher from the bat master Michael Garrett, then bring Gordon's Crate to Deathguard Podrig in the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Ride to the Undercity
currentQuests.description: Buy a bat ride to the Undercity from the bat master Karos Razok, then take Podrig's Order to Gordon Wendham in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Michael Garrett
currentQuests.description: Bring Gordon's Crate to Michael Garrett.

currentQuests.name: Supplying the Sepulcher
currentQuests.description: Bring Podrig's Order to Karos Razok.

currentQuests.name: Speak with Renferrel
currentQuests.description: Speak with Apothecary Renferrel at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: A Husband's Revenge
currentQuests.description: Kill Valdred Moray.$B$BBring his hands to Raleigh Andrean in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Beren's Peril
currentQuests.description: Locate Beren's Peril, then kill 6 Ravenclaw Drudgers and 6 Ravenclaw Guardians, then return to Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Journey to Hillsbrad Foothills
currentQuests.description: Deliver Apothecary Renferrel's findings to Apothecary Lydon in the town of Tarren Mill in the Hillsbrad Foothills.

currentQuests.name: Wand to Bethor
currentQuests.description: Take the Woven Wand to Bethor Iceshard in the Magic Quarter of the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Dalaran's Intentions
currentQuests.description: Speak with Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Dalar's Analysis
currentQuests.description: Take the rune-inscribed pendant to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: The Weaver
currentQuests.description: Kill the Dalaran archmage, then retrieve his staff for Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Ambermill Investigations
currentQuests.description: Obtain 8 Dalaran Pendants for Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Maps and Runes
currentQuests.description: Bring the strange pendant to Shadow Priest Allister at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Border Crossings
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the contents of one of the Dalaran wizards' crates. You will find Pyrewood Village to the south.

currentQuests.name: The Hidden Niche
currentQuests.description: Take Alaric to the hidden alcove.

currentQuests.name: Resting in Pieces
currentQuests.description: Bring Alaric's Head to his grave.

currentQuests.name: Pyrewood Ambush
currentQuests.description: Help Deathstalker Faerleia kill the Pyrewood Council.

currentQuests.name: A Recipe For Death
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 samples of Lake Creeper Moss, 6 samples of Lake Skulker Moss and a Hardened Tumor to Master Apothecary Faranell in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: A Recipe For Death
currentQuests.description: Retrieve Apothecary Berard's journal from Pyrewood Village and take it to Apothecary Renferrel at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: The Deathstalkers' Report
currentQuests.description: Bring the Deathstalker Report to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Report to Hadrec
currentQuests.description: Report to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: A Recipe For Death
currentQuests.description: Collect 6 Grizzled Bear Hearts and 6 samples of Skittering Blood and deliver them to Master Apothecary Faranell in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Thule Ravenclaw
currentQuests.description: Bring Bethor's Scroll to Apothecary Renferrel at the Silverpine Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Rot Hide Origins
currentQuests.description: Bring the Sample Ichor to Bethor Iceshard in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Rot Hide Ichor
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 bottles of rot hide ichor to Apothecary Renferrel at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Assault on Fenris Isle
currentQuests.description: Bring Thule's Head to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Raleigh and the Undercity
currentQuests.description: Bring Deliah's Ring to Raleigh.

currentQuests.name: The Engraved Ring
currentQuests.description: Bring Deliah's Ring to Magistrate Sevren in Brill.

currentQuests.name: Rot Hide Clues
currentQuests.description: Bring Deliah's Ring to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: The Decrepit Ferry
currentQuests.description: Go to the Decrepit Ferry.$B$BSearch for the reason the Scourge are there.

currentQuests.name: The Dead Fields
currentQuests.description: Kill rot hide gnolls at the Dead Fields.$B$BWhen Nightlash appears, kill her.$B$BBring the Essence of Nightlash to High Executor Hadrec at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Escorting Erland
currentQuests.description: Escort Erland through the wolves, to Rane Yorick.

currentQuests.name: Return to Quinn
currentQuests.description: Bring Quinn's potion to Quinn Yorick at the Ivar Patch, north of the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Wild Hearts
currentQuests.description: Gather 6 discolored worg hearts and bring them to Apothecary Renferrel at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Lost Deathstalkers
currentQuests.description: Find the Deathstalkers Quinn and Rane Yorick.

currentQuests.name: Ivar the Foul
currentQuests.description: Kill Ivar the Foul, and bring Ivar's Head to Rane Yorick at the Ivar Patch.

currentQuests.name: Arugal's Folly
currentQuests.description: Kill Grimson the Pale and bring his head to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Arugal's Folly
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Glutton Shackles and 3 Darksoul Shackles to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Arugal's Folly
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Remedy of Arugal for Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Prove Your Worth
currentQuests.description: Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher wants you to kill 5 Moonrage Whitescalps.

currentQuests.name: Arugal's Folly
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Pyrewood Shackles to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: Investigate the Scourge of Stormwind
currentQuests.description: Collect three Dim Necrotic Stones from the Scourge outside Stormwind and investigate the glowing runic circles nearby their encampment.

currentQuests.name: Investigate the Scourge of Darnassus
currentQuests.description: Collect three Dim Necrotic Stones from the Scourge outside Darnassus and investigate the glowing runic circles nearby their encampment.

currentQuests.name: Investigate the Scourge of Orgrimmar
currentQuests.description: Collect three Dim Necrotic Stones from the Scourge outside Orgrimmar and investigate the glowing runic circles nearby their encampment.

currentQuests.name: Investigate the Scourge of Thunder Bluff
currentQuests.description: Collect three Dim Necrotic Stones from the Scourge outside Thunder Bluff and investigate the glowing runic circles nearby their encampment.

currentQuests.name: Investigate the Scourge of Undercity
currentQuests.description: Collect three Dim Necrotic Stones from the Scourge outside Undercity and investigate the glowing runic circles nearby their encampment.

currentQuests.name: Neltharion
currentQuests.description: TODO

currentQuests.name: Cenarion Battlegear
currentQuests.description: Talk to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

conditions.name: The Scepter of the Shifting Sands

currentQuests.name: Stalwart's Battlegear
currentQuests.description: Bring 15 Cenarion Combat Badges, 20 Cenarion Logistics Badges, 17 Cenarion Tactical Badges and 1 Mark of Remulos to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Scouring the Desert
currentQuests.description: Find and deliver Silithyst to the Silithyst Extractor then speak with General Kirika at the Horde encampment near Hive'Regal.

currentQuests.name: Scouring the Desert
currentQuests.description: Find and deliver Silithyst to the Silithyst Extractor, then speak with Marshal Bluewall at the Alliance encampment near Hive'Zora.

currentQuests.name: Report to General Kirika
currentQuests.description: Speak with General Kirika at the Horde encampment near Hive'Regal.

currentQuests.name: Report to Marshal Bluewall
currentQuests.description: Speak with Marshal Bluewall at the Alliance encampment near Hive'Zora.

currentQuests.name: A Humble Offering
currentQuests.description: Aurel Goldleaf at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to bring her 1 Abyssal Scepter. You must also be Honored with the Cenarion Circle.

currentQuests.name: The Perfect Poison
currentQuests.description: Dirk Thunderwood at Cenarion Hold wants you to bring him Venoxis's Venom Sac and Kurinnaxx's Venom Sac.

currentQuests.name: Secrets of the Colossus - Zora
currentQuests.description: Take the Colossus of Zora's Husk to Lord Maxwell Tyrosus at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Secrets of the Colossus - Regal
currentQuests.description: Take the Colossus of Regal's Husk to Overseer Oilfist in Searing Gorge.

currentQuests.name: Secrets of the Colossus - Ashi
currentQuests.description: Take the Colossus of Ashi's Husk to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

currentQuests.name: The Ultimate Deception
currentQuests.description: Bring a Skin of Shadow, 3 Frayed Abomination Stitchings and 1 Twilight Cultist Robe to Aurel Goldleaf at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing XI in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Bandages for the Field
currentQuests.description: Bring 30 Heavy Runecloth Bandages, 30 Heavy Silk Bandages and 30 Heavy Mageweave Bandages to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Extraordinary Materials
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Enchanted Thorium Bars and 2 Enchanted Leather to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Uniform Supplies
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Mooncloth, 2 Bolts of Runecloth and 1 Ironweb Spider Silk to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Scrying Materials
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Large Brilliant Shard, 1 Large Radiant Shard and 1 Huge Emerald to Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Grinding Stones for the Guard
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Dense Grinding Stones, 10 Solid Grinding Stones and 10 Heavy Grinding Stones to Vish Kozus, Captain of the Guard at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing III in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Boots for the Guard
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Ornate Mithril Boots to Vish Kozus, Captain of the Guard at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing II in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Desert Survival Kits
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Globes of Water, 4 Powerful Anti-Venom and 4 Smoked Desert Dumplings to Calandrath at the inn in Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Armor Kits for the Field
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Rugged Armor Kits and 8 Heavy Armor Kits to Merok Longstride near Hive'Regal.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Arms for the Field
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Massive Iron Axes to Merok Longstride at the Orgrimmar Legion camp outside of Hive'Regal.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: The Orgrimmar Legion Needs Mojo!
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Powerful Mojo, 6 Flasks of Big Mojo and 8 Oils of Immolation to Shadow Priestess Shai near Hive'Regal in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Extraordinary Materials
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Enchanted Thorium Bars and 2 Enchanted Leather to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Uniform Supplies
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Mooncloth, 2 Bolts of Runecloth and 1 Ironweb Spider Silk to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Arms for the Field
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Moonsteel Broadswords to Janela Stouthammer at the Ironforge Brigade Outpost outside of Hive'Zora.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Armor Kits for the Field
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Rugged Armor Kits and 8 Heavy Armor Kits to Janela Stouthammer at the Ironforge Brigade Outpost near Hive'Zora in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Scrying Materials
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Large Brilliant Shard, 1 Large Radiant Shard and 1 Huge Emerald to Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: The Ironforge Brigade Needs Explosives!
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Oils of Immolation, 5 Goblin Rocket Fuel and 10 Dense Blasting Powder to Arcanist Nozzlespring near Hive'Zora in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Regal Burrowers
currentQuests.description: Kill 30 Hive'Regal Burrowers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing XI in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Regal Slavemakers
currentQuests.description: Kill 30 Hive'Regal Slavemakers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Regal Spitfires
currentQuests.description: Kill 30 Hive'Regal Spitfires and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Regal Ambushers
currentQuests.description: Kill 30 Hive'Regal Ambushers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Zora Reavers
currentQuests.description: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Reavers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Zora Waywatchers
currentQuests.description: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Waywatchers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Ashi Sandstalkers
currentQuests.description: Slay 30 Hive'Ashi Sandstalkers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing II in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Ashi Defenders
currentQuests.description: Slay 30 Hive'Ashi Defenders and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Twilight Marauders
currentQuests.description: Slay Twilight Marauder Morna and 2 Twilight Marauders.  Report to Windcaller Proudhorn when your task is finished.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing IX in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Hive'Ashi Scout Report
currentQuests.description: Contact Cenarion Scout Jalia inside Hive'Ashi and return the Hive'Ashi Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Hive'Regal Scout Report
currentQuests.description: Contact Cenarion Scout Landion inside Hive'Regal and return the Hive'Regal Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Azure Templar
currentQuests.description: Summon and slay an Azure Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Field Duty
currentQuests.description: Report to Krug Skullsplit at the Orgrimmar Legion post in front of Hive'Regal.  Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers, obtain Signed Field Duty Papers and bring them to Windcaller Kaldon in Cenarion Hold.$B$BNote: Healing or casting beneficial spells on a member of the Orgrimmar Legion will flag you for PvP.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Zora Tunnelers
currentQuests.description: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Tunnelers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Champion's Battlegear
currentQuests.description: Bring 15 Cenarion Combat Badges, 20 Cenarion Logistics Badges, 20 Cenarion Tactical Badges and 1 Mark of Cenarius to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Veteran's Battlegear
currentQuests.description: Bring 7 Cenarion Combat Badges, 4 Cenarion Logistics Badges and 4 Cenarion Tactical Badges to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Honored reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Volunteer's Battlegear
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Cenarion Combat Badges, 3 Cenarion Logistics Badges and 7 Cenarion Tactical Badges to Vargus at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also attain Friendly reputation with Cenarion Circle to be able to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Grinding Stones for the Guard
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Dense Grinding Stones, 10 Solid Grinding Stones and 10 Heavy Grinding Stones to Vish Kozus, Captain of the Guard at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing III in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Boots for the Guard
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Ornate Mithril Boots to Vish Kozus, Captain of the Guard at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing II in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Zora Hive Sisters
currentQuests.description: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Hive Sisters and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: The Four Dukes
currentQuests.description: Find a way to summon and slay the Duke of Cynders, the Duke of Fathoms, the Duke of Zephyrs and the Duke of Shards and report back to Commander Mar'alith in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing V in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Crimson Templar
currentQuests.description: Summon and slay a Crimson Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing II in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Earthen Templar
currentQuests.description: Summon and slay an Earthen Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing III in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Hoary Templar
currentQuests.description: Summon and slay a Hoary Templar and report back to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing IV in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Hive'Zora Scout Report
currentQuests.description: Contact Cenarion Scout Azenel inside Hive'Zora and return the Hive'Zora Scout Report to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: A Pawn on the Eternal Board
currentQuests.description: Learn all that you can of the past, then speak with Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: Field Duty
currentQuests.description: Report for duty at the Ironforge Brigade post near Hive'Zora.  Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers and obtain Signed Field Duty Papers from Captain Blackanvil and return to Windcaller Kaldon at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.$B$BNote: Healing or casting beneficial spells on a member of the Ironforge Brigade will flag you for PvP.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Ashi Workers
currentQuests.description: Slay 30 Hive'Ashi Workers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing III in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Target: Hive'Ashi Stingers
currentQuests.description: Kill 30 Hive'Ashi Stingers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing XII in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Twilight Battle Orders
currentQuests.description: Obtain the Twilight Battle Orders and bring them Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Tactical Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Desert Survival Kits
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Globes of Water, 4 Powerful Anti-Venom and 4 Smoked Desert Dumplings to Calandrath at the inn in Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing I in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Bandages for the Field
currentQuests.description: Bring 30 Heavy Runecloth Bandages, 30 Heavy Silk Bandages and 30 Heavy Mageweave Bandages to Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Logistics Task Briefing X in order to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Abyssal Contacts
currentQuests.description: Bor Wildmane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to destroy an Abyssal Templar and bring him an Abyssal Crest as proof of the deed.

currentQuests.name: Scepter of the Council
currentQuests.description: Bring an Abyssal Scepter to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Bor Wishes to Speak
currentQuests.description: Speak with Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Bor Wildmane
currentQuests.description: Speak with Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Signet of the Dukes
currentQuests.description: Bring the Abyssal Signet to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Goldleaf's Discovery
currentQuests.description: Speak with Aurel Goldleaf in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Lords of the Council
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Large Brilliant Shards and 3 Abyssal Signets to Aurel Goldleaf in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Dukes of the Council
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Large Brilliant Shard and 3 Abyssal Crests to Aurel Goldleaf in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Aurel Goldleaf
currentQuests.description: Speak with Aurel Goldleaf in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: True Believers
currentQuests.description: Hermit Ortell wants you to bring him 10 Encrypted Twilight Texts

currentQuests.name: Vyral the Vile
currentQuests.description: Bring Vyral's Signet Ring to Huum Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Twilight Geolords
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Twilight Geolords, then return to Huum Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Secret Communication
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Encrypted Twilight Texts to Bor Wildmane in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: The Calling
currentQuests.description: Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to recover the Crystal Unlocking Mechanism from the Qiraji Emissary.$B$BYou have been instructed to take the Glyphs of Calling to the Bones of Grakkarond, south of Cenarion Hold, and draw them in the sand. Should the Qiraji Emissary appear, slay it and recover the Crystal Unlocking Mechanism. Return to Geologist Larksbane if you succeed.$B$BAssemble an army for this task, $N!

currentQuests.name: Unraveling the Mystery (Elite)
currentQuests.description: Rutgar Glyphshaper at Bronzebeard's Encampment wants you to deliver the Glyphed Crystal Prism to Geologist Larksbane at the Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

currentQuests.name: Breaking the Code
currentQuests.description: Frankal Stonebridge at Bronzebeard's Encampment in Silithus wants you to recover a Hive'Zora Silithid Brain, Hive'Ashi Silithid Brain, and a Hive'Regal Silithid Brain. Return to Frankal when you have completed this task.

currentQuests.name: Glyph Chasing
currentQuests.description: Rutgar Glyphshaper at Bronzebeard's Encampment in Silithus wants you to venture to Hive'Ashi, Hive'Zora, and Hive'Regal and recover Glyphed Rubbings from the Glyphed Crystals of each hive.$B$BUse the Geologist's Transcription Kit to make a reasonable facsimile of the ancient glyphs. Return to Rutgar Glyphshaper when you complete this task.

currentQuests.name: Brann Bronzebeard's Lost Letter
currentQuests.description: Take Brann Bronzebeard's Letter to Bronzebeard's Encampment in southern Silithus.

currentQuests.name: Into The Maw of Madness
currentQuests.description: Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to find his beloved Natalia. The information that you gathered points to Hive'Regal in the south as being the area in which you may find Mistress Natalia Mar'alith.$B$BDo not forget to visit the dwarves at Bronzebeard's camp before venturing into the hive. They might have some additional work and advice for you.$B$BAnd $N, remember the Commander's words: "Do what you must..."

currentQuests.name: Long Forgotten Memories
currentQuests.description: Locate the Crystalline Tear in Silithus and gaze into its depths.

currentQuests.name: Dearest Natalia
currentQuests.description: Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to question the inhabitants of Bronzebeard's Encampment. You will find Bronzebeard's Encampment south of Cenarion Hold.$B$BOnce you have gathered the requested information, return to Commander Mar'alith.

currentQuests.name: Anachronos
currentQuests.description: Seek out Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: The Hand of the Righteous
currentQuests.description: Collect 200 Silithid Carapace Fragments and return to Baristolth.

currentQuests.name: The Path of the Righteous
currentQuests.description: Collect 200 Silithid Carapace Fragments and return to Baristolth.

currentQuests.name: A Terrible Purpose
currentQuests.description: Take the Decoded Tablet Parchment to Commander Mar'alith.

currentQuests.name: What Tomorrow Brings
currentQuests.description: Venture to the Caverns of Time in Tanaris and find Anachronos, Brood of Nozdormu.

currentQuests.name: The Deserter
currentQuests.description: Take the restored tablet to Hermit Ortell in Silithus.

currentQuests.name: The Twilight Mystery
currentQuests.description: Geologist Larksbane at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to collect 8 Twilight Tablet Fragments.

currentQuests.name: Wanted - Deathclasp, Terror of the Sands
currentQuests.description: Bring Deathclasp's Pincer to Vish Kozus, Captain of the Guard.

currentQuests.name: Noggle's Lost Satchel
currentQuests.description: Retrieve Noggle's Satchel from the mountains in the south of Silithus and return it to him at Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Stepping Up Security
currentQuests.description: Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to slay 20 Dredge Crushers.

currentQuests.name: Securing the Supply Lines
currentQuests.description: Windcaller Proudhorn at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to kill 15 Dredge Strikers.

currentQuests.name: The Twilight Lexicon
currentQuests.description: Bring the three chapters of the Twilight Lexicon to Hermit Ortell in Silithus.

currentQuests.name: Noggle's Last Hope
currentQuests.description: Beetix Ficklespragg at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to gather 3 Stonelash Pincer Stingers, 3 Stonelash Flayer Stingers and 3 Rock Stalker Fangs.

currentQuests.name: Deadly Desert Venom
currentQuests.description: Beetix Ficklespragg at Cenarion Hold in Silithus wants you to gather 8 Stonelash Scorpid Stingers and 8 Sand Skitterer Fangs. Return to her when you have completed the task.

currentQuests.name: Umber, Archivist
currentQuests.description: Take the Encrusted Silithid Object to Umber - the Cenarion Circle's archivist - in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

currentQuests.name: Hive in the Tower
currentQuests.description: Scale the tower of Southwind Village and locate a means to stir the silithid hive into activity.  Bring back anything unusual you may uncover when doing so to Layo Starstrike at the Valor's Rest graveyard of Silithus.

currentQuests.name: The Spirits of Southwind
currentQuests.description: Free the spirits of 8 Tortured Druids and 8 Tortured Sentinels in Southwind Village, and then return to Layo Starstrike at the Valor's Rest graveyard of Silithus.

currentQuests.name: Deathstalkers in Shadowfang
currentQuests.description: Find the Deathstalker Adamant and Deathstalker Vincent.

currentQuests.name: Arugal Must Die
currentQuests.description: Kill Arugal and bring his head to Dalar Dawnweaver at the Sepulcher.

currentQuests.name: The Book of Ur
currentQuests.description: Bring the Book of Ur to Keeper Bel'dugur at the Apothecarium in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Restoring Fiery Flux Supplies via Kingsblood
currentQuests.description: Deliver 2 Incendosaur Scales, 4 Kingsblood and one Coal to Master Smith Burninate.

currentQuests.name: Restoring Fiery Flux Supplies via Heavy Leather
Restoring Fiery Flux Supplies via Iron
JOB OPPORTUNITY: Culling the Competition
currentQuests.description: Slay 15 Dark Iron Taskmasters and 15 Dark Iron Slavers. Return to Taskmaster Scrange in the Searing Gorge once you have accomplished this task.

currentQuests.name: STOLEN: Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass
currentQuests.description: Find and return the Smithing Tuyere and Lookout's Spyglass to Taskmaster Scrange in the Searing Gorge.$B$BThe only information you have about these items is the following: They were definitely stolen by Dark Iron dwarves. The Smithing Tuyere is a blacksmithing tool used by blacksmiths and the Lookout's Spyglass is an invaluable monitoring tool to lookouts.

currentQuests.name: Incendosaurs? Whateverosaur is More Like It
currentQuests.description: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Incendosaurs.$B$BYou will find Incendosaurs occupying the lava pools inside the Slag Pit. The Slag Pit can be found in the Cauldron of the Searing Gorge.$B$BReturn to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Incendosaurs.

currentQuests.name: Fiery Menace!
currentQuests.description: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Greater Lava Spiders in the Searing Gorge. You can find Greater Lava Spiders in the plateaus and lava pools of the Searing Gorge.$B$BReturn to Hansel Heavyhands in the Searing Gorge when you have killed enough Greater Lava Spiders.

currentQuests.name: Curse These Fat Fingers
currentQuests.description: Hansel Heavyhands wants you to kill 20 Heavy War Golems.$B$BThe Heavy War Golems wander the areas surrounding the Cauldron in the Searing Gorge. When you've killed enough, return to Hansel in Searing Gorge.

currentQuests.name: What the Flux?
currentQuests.description: Somewhere in the Slag Pit of the Cauldron you will find the Secret Plans: Fiery Flux that Overseer Maltorius stole. Find those plans and return them to Master Smith Burninate in the Searing Gorge.

currentQuests.name: WANTED: Overseer Maltorius
currentQuests.description: Deep within the Slag Pit of the Cauldron, in the Searing Gorge, you will find the traitorous Dark Iron dwarf named Overseer Maltorius.$B$BSlay Overseer Maltorius and take his head. Return the head to Lookout Captain Lolo Longstriker in the Searing Gorge for your reward.

currentQuests.name: The Key to Freedom
currentQuests.description: Search Searing Gorge and find a use for the Grimesilt Outhouse Key you have found.

currentQuests.name: Ledger from Tanaris
currentQuests.description: Take the copy of Goodsteel's Ledger and then find the items listed in it before seeking Krinkle Goodsteel in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: Caught!
currentQuests.description: Kill 8 Dark Iron Geologists and bring 15 pieces of Silk Cloth to the person locked in the outhouse in Searing Gorge.

currentQuests.name: Rise, Obsidion!
currentQuests.description: Slay Lathoric the Black and Obsidion, and return to Thorius in Ironforge with the Head of Lathoric the Black and the Heart of Obsidion.

currentQuests.name: Trinkets...
currentQuests.description: Open the chest.

currentQuests.name: Set Them Ablaze!
currentQuests.description: Set the North, South, East, and West Sentry Towers on fire by using the Torch of Retribution inside each of the buildings.

currentQuests.name: Squire Maltrake
currentQuests.description: Speak with Squire Maltrake.

currentQuests.name: The Torch of Retribution
currentQuests.description: Take the Torch of Retribution.

currentQuests.name: The Torch of Retribution
currentQuests.description: Wait for Kalaran Windblade to complete the Torch of Retribution.

currentQuests.name: The Flame's Casing
currentQuests.description: Find and return a Symbol of Ragnaros to Kalaran Windblade.

currentQuests.name: Forging the Shaft
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Thorium Plated Daggers to Kalaran Windblade.

currentQuests.name: The Flawless Flame
currentQuests.description: Collect 4 Hearts of Flame and 4 globes of Golem Oil and return the items to Kalaran Windblade.

currentQuests.name: Divine Retribution
currentQuests.description: Listen as Kalaran Windblade tells his story.

currentQuests.name: Prayer to Elune
currentQuests.description: Find the Prayer to Elune and take it to Astarii Starseeker in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Prayer to Elune
currentQuests.description: Hear Zamael tell his tale.

currentQuests.name: Release Them
currentQuests.description: Find the Mysterious Artifact being guarded by the Twilight's Hammer Idolaters in the northwest quadrant of the Searing Gorge and bring it to the Altar of Suntara in the Slag Pit.

currentQuests.name: Suntara Stones
currentQuests.description: Take the Singed Letter to Thorius in Ironforge. He is in the Hall of Explorers.

currentQuests.name: Suntara Stones
currentQuests.description: Help Dorius get back to Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: The Horn of the Beast
currentQuests.description: Take Margol's Gigantic Horn to Mountaineer Pebblebitty.

currentQuests.name: The Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
currentQuests.description: Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Kormok and slay him. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the recombined Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.

currentQuests.name: The Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
currentQuests.description: Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Kormok and slay him. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.

conditions.name: Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet

currentQuests.name: Healthy Dragon Scale
currentQuests.description: Bring the Healthy Dragon Scale to Betina Bigglezink at the Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Betina Bigglezink
currentQuests.description: Bring the Frozen Eggs to Betina Bigglezink.

currentQuests.name: Plagued Hatchlings
currentQuests.description: Kill 20 Plagued Hatchlings, then return to Betina Bigglezink at the Light's Hope Chapel.

currentQuests.name: Krastinov's Bag of Horrors
currentQuests.description: Locate Jandice Barov in the Scholomance and destroy her. From her corpse recover Krastinov's Bag of Horrors. Return the bag to Eva Sarkhoff.

currentQuests.name: The Lich, Ras Frostwhisper
currentQuests.description: Find Ras Frostwhisper in the Scholomance. When you have found him, use the Soulbound Keepsake on his undead visage. Should you succeed in reverting him to a mortal, strike him down and recover the Human Head of Ras Frostwhisper. Take the head back to Magistrate Marduke.

currentQuests.name: Kirtonos the Herald
currentQuests.description: Return to the Scholomance with the Blood of Innocents. Find the porch and place the Blood of Innocents in the brazier. Kirtonos will come to feast upon your soul.$B$BFight valiantly, do not give an inch! Destroy Kirtonos and return to Eva Sarkhoff.

currentQuests.name: Doctor Theolen Krastinov, the Butcher
currentQuests.description: Find Doctor Theolen Krastinov inside the Scholomance. Destroy him, then burn the Remains of Eva Sarkhoff and the Remains of Lucien Sarkhoff. Return to Eva Sarkhoff when the task is complete.

currentQuests.name: Barov Family Fortune
currentQuests.description: Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Weldon Barov when you have completed this task.

currentQuests.name: Barov Family Fortune
currentQuests.description: Venture to the Scholomance and recover the Barov family fortune. Four deeds make up this fortune: The Deed to Caer Darrow; The Deed to Brill; The Deed to Tarren Mill; and The Deed to Southshore. Return to Alexi Barov when you have completed this task.

currentQuests.name: Dawn's Gambit
currentQuests.description: Place Dawn's Gambit in the Viewing Room of the Scholomance.  Defeat Vectus, then return to Betina Bigglezink.

currentQuests.name: Hilary's Necklace
currentQuests.description: Find Hilary's Necklace, and return it to Hilary in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: Morganth
currentQuests.description: Defeat Morganth.$B$BBring his Pendant of Shadow to Theocritus at the Tower of Azora in Elwynn Forest.

currentQuests.name: Looking Further
currentQuests.description: Climb the intact watch tower beside Stonewatch Keep.$B$BFind a suitable container to place the Glyph of Azora.

currentQuests.name: Assessing the Threat
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Redridge Mongrels and 6 Redridge Poachers, then report back to Deputy Feldon in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: Encroaching Gnolls
currentQuests.description: Report to Deputy Feldon.

currentQuests.name: Missing In Action
currentQuests.description: Protect Corporal Keeshan on the journey back to Redridge.

currentQuests.name: Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore
currentQuests.description: Kill Lieutenant Fangore and return to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire with his paw.

currentQuests.name: Theocritus' Retrieval
currentQuests.description: Bring the Faded Shadowhide Pendant to Theocritus the Mage.

currentQuests.name: Wanted: Gath'Ilzogg
currentQuests.description: Kill Gath'Ilzogg and bring his head to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire for the reward.

currentQuests.name: Murloc Poachers
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Murloc Fins to Dockmaster Baren in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: Messenger to Darkshire
currentQuests.description: Return to Magistrate Solomon with Lord Ebonlocke's letter of response.

currentQuests.name: Messenger to Darkshire
currentQuests.description: Magistrate Solomon wants you to take a letter to Lord Ebonlocke in Darkshire.

currentQuests.name: Messenger to Westfall
currentQuests.description: Return to Magistrate Solomon with Gryan Stoutmantle's response.

currentQuests.name: Messenger to Westfall
currentQuests.description: Magistrate Solomon wants you to take his written plea to Gryan Stoutmantle in Westfall.

currentQuests.name: Delivering Daffodils
currentQuests.description: Give Darcy the Daffodil Bouquet.

currentQuests.name: Visit the Herbalist
currentQuests.description: Speak with the Redridge Herbalist, Martie Jainrose.

currentQuests.name: A Free Lunch
currentQuests.description: Bring Parker's lunch to Guard Parker.  He patrols the road leading to Darkshire.

currentQuests.name: Blackrock Bounty
currentQuests.description: Kill 15 Blackrock Champions and Guard Howe in Lakeshire will reward you.

currentQuests.name: Selling Fish
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Spotted Sunfish to Dockmaster Baren in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: Howling in the Hills
currentQuests.description: Bring Yowler's Paw to Verner Osgood in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: The Lost Tools
currentQuests.description: Foreman Oslow of Lakeshire wants you to retrieve his toolbox from the bottom of Lake Everstill.

currentQuests.name: A Baying of Gnolls
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Redridge Brutes and 8 Redridge Mystics, then return to Verner Osgood.

currentQuests.name: Underbelly Scales
currentQuests.description: Gather 6 Underbelly Whelp Scales from Black Dragon Whelps, and bring them to Verner Osgood in Redridge.

currentQuests.name: Messenger to Stormwind
currentQuests.description: Take General Marcus Jonathan's letter of response to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: Messenger to Stormwind
currentQuests.description: Magistrate Solomon has given you a report which must be delivered to General Marcus Jonathan in Stormwind.  The judge wants you to return to him as soon as the delivery has been made.

currentQuests.name: Return to Verner
currentQuests.description: Return to Verner Osgood in Redridge.  Give him the Crate of Horseshoes.

currentQuests.name: The Price of Shoes
currentQuests.description: Take Verner's Note to Smith Argus in Goldshire.

currentQuests.name: Dry Times
currentQuests.description: Barkeep Daniels of Lakeshire needs a keg of Thunderbrew Lager, a cask of Merlot, a bottle of Moonshine and a skin of Sweet Rum.

currentQuests.name: Shadow Magic
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Midnight Orbs to Marshal Marris in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: A Watchful Eye
currentQuests.description: Take the Glyph of Azora to the Lion Statue near the Tower of Ilgalar in Redridge.

currentQuests.name: Redridge Goulash
currentQuests.description: Chef Breanna of Lakeshire wants five pieces of Tough Condor Meat, five Great Goretusk Snouts and five helpings of Crisp Spider Meat.

currentQuests.name: Solomon's Law
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Shadowhide Pendants to Bailiff Conacher in the Lakeshire Town Hall.

currentQuests.name: The Everstill Bridge
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Iron Pikes and 5 Iron Rivets to Foreman Oslow in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: An Unwelcome Guest
currentQuests.description: Martie Jainrose of Lakeshire wants you to kill Bellygrub.  Bring her his tusk as proof.

currentQuests.name: Blackrock Menace
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Battleworn Axes to Marshal Marris in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: Tharil'zun
currentQuests.description: Bring Tharil'zun's Head to Marshal Marris in Redridge.

currentQuests.name: A Host of Evil
currentQuests.description: Kill 8 Razorfen Battleguard, 8 Razorfen Thornweavers, and 8 Death's Head Cultists and return to Myriam Moonsinger near the entrance to Razorfen Downs.

currentQuests.name: An Unholy Alliance
currentQuests.description: Take the Small Scroll to Varimathras in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: An Unholy Alliance
currentQuests.description: Bring Ambassador Malcin's Head to Varimathras in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Bring the Light
currentQuests.description: Archbishop Bendictus wants you to slay Amnennar the Coldbringer in Razorfen Downs.

currentQuests.name: Extinguishing the Idol
currentQuests.description: Escort Belnistrasz to the Quilboar's idol in Razorfen Downs.$B$BProtect Belnistrasz while he performs the ritual to shut down the idol.

currentQuests.name: Scourge of the Downs
currentQuests.description: If you agree to aid Belnistrasz, speak with him again and hand the Oathstone he gave you back to him.

currentQuests.name: Bring the End
currentQuests.description: Andrew Brownell wants you to kill Amnennar the Coldbringer and return his skull.

currentQuests.name: Slaying the Beast
currentQuests.description: Enter Ragefire Chasm and slay Taragaman the Hungerer, then bring his heart back to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Hidden Enemies
currentQuests.description: Kill Bazzalan and Jergosh the Invoker before returning to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: The Power to Destroy...
currentQuests.description: Bring the books Spells of Shadow and Incantations from the Nether to Varimathras in Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Returning the Lost Satchel
currentQuests.description: Take the Grimtotem Satchel to Rahauro in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Testing an Enemy's Strength
currentQuests.description: Search Orgrimmar for Ragefire Chasm, then kill 8 Ragefire Troggs and 8 Ragefire Shaman before returning to Rahauro in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Searching for the Lost Satchel
currentQuests.description: Search Ragefire Chasm for Maur Grimtotem's corpse and search it for any items of interest.

currentQuests.name: Icy Scale Breastplate
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 8 Frozen Runes, 24 Heavy Scorpid Scale, 7 Essence of Water, 5 Cured Rugged Hides and 300 gold. You must also be of Exalted reputation with the Argent Dawn.

currentQuests.name: Icy Scale Gauntlets
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 5 Frozen Runes, 16 Heavy Scorpid Scale, 5 Essence of Water, 3 Cured Rugged Hides and 200 gold.

currentQuests.name: Icy Scale Bracers
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 4 Frozen Runes, 16 Heavy Scorpid Scales, 5 Essences of Water, 3 Cured Rugged Hides and 200 gold.

currentQuests.name: Polar Tunic
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 8 Frozen Runes, 16 Enchanted Leathers, 5 Essences of Water, 5 Cured Rugged Hides and 300 gold. You must also be of Exalted reputation with the Argent Dawn.

currentQuests.name: Polar Gloves
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 5 Frozen Runes, 12 Enchanted Leather, 3 Essence of Water, 3 Cured Rugged Hides and 200 gold.

currentQuests.name: Polar Bracers
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 4 Frozen Runes, 12 Enchanted Leather, 3 Essence of Water, 3 Cured Rugged Hides and 200 gold.

currentQuests.name: Glacial Vest
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 8 Frozen Runes, 8 Bolts of Runecloth, 6 Essences of Water, 4 Ironweb Spider Silks and 300 gold. You must also be of Exalted reputation with the Argent Dawn.

currentQuests.name: Glacial Gloves
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 5 Frozen Runes, 4 Bolts of Runecloth, 4 Essences of Water, 2 Ironweb Spider Silks and 200 gold.

currentQuests.name: Glacial Wrists
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 4 Frozen Runes, 2 Bolts of Runecloth, 2 Essences of Water, 2 Ironweb Spider Silks and 200 gold.

currentQuests.name: Glacial Cloak
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 5 Frozen Runes, 4 Bolts of Runecloth, 2 Essences of Water, 4 Ironweb Spider Silks and 200 gold. You must also be of Exalted reputation with the Argent Dawn.

currentQuests.name: Icebane Breastplate
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 8 Frozen Runes, 16 Thorium Bars, 2 Arcanite Bars, 4 Essence of Water and 300 gold. You will also need to be of Exalted reputation with the Argent Dawn.

currentQuests.name: Icebane Bracers
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 4 Frozen Runes, 12 Thorium Bars, 2 Arcanite Bars, 2 Essence of Water and 200 gold.

currentQuests.name: Icebane Gauntlets
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 5 Frozen Runes, 12 Thorium Bars, 2 Arcanite Bars, 2 Essences of Water and 200 gold.

currentQuests.name: Omarion's Handbook
currentQuests.description: Take Omarion's Handbook to Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: The Only Song I Know...
currentQuests.description: Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants you to bring him 2 Frozen Runes, 2 Essence of Water, 2 Blue Sapphires and 30 gold pieces.

currentQuests.name: Ramaladni's Icy Grasp
currentQuests.description: Korfax at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants you to bring him 1 Frozen Rune, 1 Blue Sapphire and 1 Arcanite Bar.

currentQuests.name: The Fate of Ramaladni
currentQuests.description: Enter Naxxramas and uncover the Fate of Ramaladni.

currentQuests.name: The Fall of Kel'Thuzad
currentQuests.description: Take the Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad to Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Bindings of Faith

currentQuests.name: Echoes of War
currentQuests.description: Commander Eligor Dawnbringer at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants you to slay 5 Living Monstrosities, 5 Stoneskin Gargoyles, 8 Deathknight Captains and 3 Venom Stalkers.

currentQuests.name: Plainsrunning
currentQuests.description: Speak to Saern Priderunner again to learn the Plainsrunning skill.

currentQuests.name: Welcome!
currentQuests.description: Bring the Camp Narache Gift Voucher to Vorn Skyseer.

currentQuests.name: Morrowgrain Research
currentQuests.description: Use an Evergreen Pouch with a Packet of Tharlendis Seeds and two Un'Goro Soil samples to try and cultivate samples of Morrowgrain.$B$BBring 10 Morrowgrain to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Morrowgrain Research
currentQuests.description: Take the Seed Voucher to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Assisting Arch Druid Runetotem
currentQuests.description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Un'Goro Soil
currentQuests.description: Bring 20 Un'Goro Soil samples to Ghede on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Break Sharptusk!
currentQuests.description: Bring the head of Chief Sharptusk Thornmantle to Brave Windfeather in Red Cloud Mesa.

currentQuests.name: A Future Task
currentQuests.description: Speak with Sage Truthseeker in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Return to Thunder Bluff
currentQuests.description: Speak with Nara Wildmane in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Seeing What Happens
currentQuests.description: Bring the miniature platinum discs to the gates of Uldum in Tanaris and look for clues as to the connection between the two.

currentQuests.name: Portents of Uldum
currentQuests.description: Speak with Nara Wildmane on the Elder Rise in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: The Platinum Discs
currentQuests.description: Take the reward voucher to Bena Winterhoof in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: A Task Unfinished
currentQuests.description: Bring the Bundle of Furs to Innkeeper Kauth in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: The Sacred Flame
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Cloven Hoof for Rau Cliffrunner at the Freewind Post.

currentQuests.name: The Sacred Flame
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Filled Etched Phial to Rau Cliffrunner at the Freewind Post.

currentQuests.name: The Sacred Flame
currentQuests.description: Return a Filled Etched Phial to Zangen Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Frostmaw
currentQuests.description: Bring Frostmaw's Mane to Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Steelsnap
currentQuests.description: Bring Steelsnap's Rib to Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Melor Sends Word
currentQuests.description: Speak with Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Rabine Saturna
currentQuests.description: Speak with Rabine Saturna in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.  Moonglade lies between Felwood and Winterspring, accessible through a path out of Timbermaw Hold.

currentQuests.name: The Flying Machine Airport
currentQuests.description: Bring the Toxic Fogger to the Venture Co. sky port, then return to Apothecary Zamah.

currentQuests.name: Return to Thunder Bluff
currentQuests.description: Bring Lydon's Toxin to Apothecary Zamah in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Blood of Innocents
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Vials of Innocent Blood to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Journey to Tarren Mill
currentQuests.description: Bring Zamah's Note to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Forsaken Aid
currentQuests.description: Speak with Apothecary Zamah in the Pools of Vision in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: The New Frontier
currentQuests.description: Speak with Arch Druid Hamuul Runetotem on the Elder Rise of Thunder Bluff about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

currentQuests.name: The Hunter's Way
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Flatland Prowler Claws to Melor Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Journey to the Crossroads
currentQuests.description: Speak with Thork at the Crossroads in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: A Sacred Burial
currentQuests.description: Lorekeeper Raintotem wants you to kill 8 Bristleback Interlopers at Red Rocks.

currentQuests.name: Attack on Camp Narache
currentQuests.description: Bring the Bristleback Attack Plans to Chief Hawkwind in Camp Narache.

currentQuests.name: The Battleboars
currentQuests.description: Grull Hawkwind in Camp Narache wants you to kill Battleboars and bring back 8 Battleboar Snouts and 8 Battleboar Flanks.

currentQuests.name: Rites of the Earthmother
currentQuests.description: Cairne Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff wants you to bring him the Horn of Arra'chea.

currentQuests.name: Journey into Thunder Bluff
currentQuests.description: Speak with Cairne Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Rite of Wisdom
currentQuests.description: Travel to Red Rocks east of Thunder Bluff and speak with the Ancestral Spirit.

currentQuests.name: Rite of Vision
currentQuests.description: Consume the Water of the Seers in front of the tribal fire in Bloodhoof Village and follow the vision once it appears.

currentQuests.name: Rite of Vision
currentQuests.description: Collect 2 Well Stones and 2 Ambercorn and bring them back to Zarlman Two-Moons in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: The Demon Scarred Cloak
currentQuests.description: Find someone who knows of Ghost Howl.

currentQuests.name: Kodo Hide Bag
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Light Leather and 4 Coarse Thread to Veren Tallstrider in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Gathering Leather
currentQuests.description: Bring 12 pieces of Light Leather to Veren Tallstrider in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Rite of Vision
currentQuests.description: Speak with Zarlman Two-Moons in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Mazzranache
currentQuests.description: Bring a Prairie Wolf Heart, Flatland Cougar Femur, Plainstrider Scale and Swoop Gizzard to Maur Raincaller at Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Supervisor Fizsprocket
currentQuests.description: Kill Supervisor Fizsprocket and return his clipboard to Morin Cloudstalker at Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: The Venture Co.
currentQuests.description: Kill 14 Venture Co. Workers and 6 Venture Co. Supervisors for Morin Cloudstalker at Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Rites of the Earthmother
currentQuests.description: Take the Totem of Hawkwind to Baine Bloodhoof in Bloodhoof Village. Follow the road out of Camp Narache.

currentQuests.name: Swoop Hunting
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Trophy Swoop Quills to Harken Windtotem in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Wildmane Cleansing
currentQuests.description: Use the Wildmane Cleansing Totem at the Wildmane Water Well, then return to Mull Thunderhorn.

currentQuests.name: Wildmane Totem
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Prairie Alpha Teeth to Mull Thunderhorn in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Thunderhorn Cleansing
currentQuests.description: Use the Thunderhorn Cleansing Totem at the Thunderhorn Water Well, then return to Mull.

currentQuests.name: Rite of Strength
currentQuests.description: Kill Bristlebacks in Brambleblade Ravine and bring 12 Bristleback Belts to Chief Hawkwind in Camp Narache.

currentQuests.name: Thunderhorn Totem
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Stalker Claws and 6 Cougar Claws to Mull Thunderhorn.

currentQuests.name: Rites of the Earthmother
currentQuests.description: Travel to Seer Graytongue who lives in the hills directly south of Camp Narache.

currentQuests.name: Winterhoof Cleansing
currentQuests.description: Use the Winterhoof Cleansing Totem at the Winterhoof Water Well, then return to Mull Thunderhorn.

currentQuests.name: A Humble Task
currentQuests.description: Take a Water Pitcher from the water well.$b$bReturn the pitcher to Chief Hawkwind in Camp Narache which is northwest from the water well.

currentQuests.name: A Humble Task
currentQuests.description: Chief Hawkwind wants you to search for his mother near the water well to the southeast of Camp Narache.

currentQuests.name: The Ravaged Caravan
currentQuests.description: Return the Venture Co. Documents to Morin Cloudstalker near Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: The Hunt Continues
currentQuests.description: Grull Hawkwind in Camp Narache wants you to bring him 10 Mountain Cougar Pelts.

currentQuests.name: The Ravaged Caravan
currentQuests.description: Morin Cloudstalker wants you to examine the contents of a supply crate at the Ravaged Caravan.

currentQuests.name: Poison Water
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Prairie Wolf Paws and 4 Plainstrider Talons to Mull Thunderhorn in Bloodhoof.

currentQuests.name: The Hunt Begins
currentQuests.description: Grull Hawkwind in Camp Narache wants you to bring him 7 Plainstrider Feathers and 7 pieces of Plainstrider Meat.

currentQuests.name: Dwarven Digging
currentQuests.description: Collect 5 Prospector's Picks.$B$BAt a forge, smash the Prospector's Picks to create Broken Tools.$B$BBring 5 Broken Tools to Baine Bloodhoof in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Sharing the Land
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Palemane Tanners, 8 Palemane Skinners, and 5 Palemane Poachers, then return to Baine Bloodhoof in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Preparation for Ceremony
currentQuests.description: Collect 6 Azure Feathers and 6 Bronze Feathers, and bring them to Eyahn Eagletalon in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Dangers of the Windfury
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Windfury Talons to Ruul Eagletalon in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: The Ashenvale Hunt
currentQuests.description: Speak with Senani Thunderheart at Splintertree Post, Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: Until Death Do Us Part
currentQuests.description: Place Clarice's Pendant on Yuriv's Tomb in Silverpine.

currentQuests.name: The Champion Returns
currentQuests.description: Take the Green Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: The Nightmare Manifests
currentQuests.description: Defend Nighthaven from Eranikus. Do not let Keeper Remulos perish. Do not slay Eranikus. Defend yourself. Await Tyrande.

currentQuests.name: The Nightmare's Corruption
currentQuests.description: Travel to the four Emerald Dream portals in Azeroth and collect a Fragment of the Nightmare's Corruption from each. Return to Keeper Remulos in the Moonglade when you have completed this task.

currentQuests.name: Waking Legends
currentQuests.description: Wait for Keeper Remulos at the Moonglade to cleanse the Nightmare Engulfed Object.

currentQuests.name: Uncovering Past Secrets
currentQuests.description: Speak with Rabine Saturna in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

currentQuests.name: A Reliquary of Purity
currentQuests.description: Travel to Silithus and search for a Reliquary of Purity within the ruins of Southwind Village.  If you are able to find it, return with it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

currentQuests.name: Shards of the Felvine
currentQuests.description: Find the Felvine in Dire Maul and acquire a shard from it.  Chances are you'll only be able to procure one with the demise of Alzzin the Wildshaper.  Use the Reliquary of Purity to securely seal the shard inside, and return it to Rabine Saturna in Nighthaven, Moonglade.

currentQuests.name: Wasteland
currentQuests.description: Speak with Layo Starstrike near the Valor's Rest graveyard of Silithus, showing him Rabine's Letter.

currentQuests.name: Scrying Goggles? No Problem!
currentQuests.description: Find Narain's Scrying Goggles and return them to Narain Soothfancy in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: Attunement to the Core
currentQuests.description: Venture to the Molten Core entry portal in Blackrock Depths and recover a Core Fragment. Return to Lothos Riftwaker in Blackrock Mountain when you have recovered the Core Fragment.

currentQuests.name: Attunement to the Core
currentQuests.description: Venture to the Molten Core entry portal in Blackrock Depths and recover a Core Fragment. Return to Lothos Riftwaker in Blackrock Mountain when you have recovered the Core Fragment.

currentQuests.name: Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Blood of the Mountain
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Core Leather
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Lava Core
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Fiery Core
Favor Amongst the Brotherhood, Dark Iron Ore
Shadowshard Fragments
currentQuests.description: Collect 10 Shadowshard Fragments from Maraudon and return them to Archmage Tervosh in Theramore on the coast of Dustwallow Marsh.

currentQuests.name: Shadowshard Fragments
currentQuests.description: Collect 10 Shadowshard Fragments from Maraudon and return them to Uthel'nay in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: The Pariah's Instructions
currentQuests.description: Read the Pariah's Instructions. Afterwards, obtain the Amulet of Union from Maraudon and return it to the Centaur Pariah in southern Desolace.

currentQuests.name: Seed of Life
currentQuests.description: Seek out Remulos in Moonglade and give him the Seed of Life.

currentQuests.name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
currentQuests.description: Slay Princess Theradras and return to Keeper Marandis at Nijel's Point in Desolace.

currentQuests.name: Corruption of Earth and Seed
currentQuests.description: Slay Princess Theradras and return to Selendra near Shadowprey Village in Desolace.

currentQuests.name: The Scepter of Celebras
currentQuests.description: Assist Celebras the Redeemed while he creates the Scepter of Celebras.$B$BSpeak with him when the ritual is complete.

currentQuests.name: Legends of Maraudon
currentQuests.description: Recover the two parts of the Scepter of Celebras: the Celebrian Rod and the Celebrian Diamond.$B$BFind a way to speak with Celebras.

currentQuests.name: Vyletongue Corruption
currentQuests.description: Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.$B$BUse the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.$B$BHeal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Talendria in Nijel's Point.

currentQuests.name: Vyletongue Corruption
currentQuests.description: Fill the Coated Cerulean Vial at the orange crystal pool in Maraudon.$B$BUse the Filled Cerulean Vial on the Vylestem Vines to force the corrupted Noxxious Scion to emerge.$B$BHeal 8 plants by killing these Noxxious Scion, then return to Vark Battlescar in Shadowprey Village.

currentQuests.name: Twisted Evils
currentQuests.description: Collect 15 Theradric Crystal Carvings for Willow in Desolace.

currentQuests.name: Return to Brock
currentQuests.description: Buy a gryphon to Thelsamar from the gryphon master Gryth Thurden, then bring the Honorary Picks to Brock Stoneseeker in Thelsamar.

currentQuests.name: Ride to Ironforge
currentQuests.description: Buy a gryphon to Ironforge from the gryphon master Thorgrum Borrelson, then bring Brock's List to Golnir Bouldertoe in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Gryth Thurden
currentQuests.description: Bring the Honorary Picks to Gryth Thurden in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Honor Students
currentQuests.description: Bring Brock's List to Thorgrum Borrelson in Thelsamar.

currentQuests.name: Proof of Deed
currentQuests.description: Take Margol's Gigantic Horn to Curator Thorius in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Badlands Reagent Run
currentQuests.description: Acquire the reagents Ghak Healtouch needs from the Badlands, then return to him in Thelsamar.

currentQuests.name: Bingles' Missing Supplies
currentQuests.description: Find and return Bingles' supplies:$B$BBingles' Wrench, Bingles' Screwdriver, Bingles' Hammer, and Bingles' Blastencapper.

currentQuests.name: Mountaineer Stormpike's Task
currentQuests.description: Speak with Mountaineer Stormpike.

currentQuests.name: Stormpike's Order
currentQuests.description: Bring Stormpike's Request to Furen Longbeard in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Vyrin's Revenge
currentQuests.description: Bring Ol' Sooty's head to Vyrin Swiftwind at the Farstrider Lodge.

currentQuests.name: After the Ambush
currentQuests.description: Speak with Miran.

currentQuests.name: Ironband's Excavation
currentQuests.description: Speak with Explorer Fellhew.

currentQuests.name: Thelsamar Blood Sausages
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 pieces of Bear Meat, 3 Boar Intestines, and 3 Spider Ichor to Vidra Hearthstove in Thelsamar.

currentQuests.name: Rat Catching
currentQuests.description: Bring 12 Tunnel Rat Ears to Mountaineer Kadrell in Thelsamar.

currentQuests.name: Crocolisk Hunting
currentQuests.description: Get 5 pieces of Crocolisk Meat and 6 Crocolisk Skins for Marek Ironheart at the Farstrider Lodge.

currentQuests.name: Protecting the Shipment
currentQuests.description: Ensure Miran and the shipment arrive at the excavation site, then inform Prospector Ironband.

currentQuests.name: Filthy Paws
currentQuests.description: Go to the Silver Stream Mine and collect 4 loads of Miners' Gear.$B$BReturn to Mountaineer Stormpike.

currentQuests.name: Powder to Ironband
currentQuests.description: Speak with Jern Hornhelm in Thelsamar.

currentQuests.name: Report to Ironforge
currentQuests.description: Take Ironband's Progress Report to Prospector Stormpike.

currentQuests.name: Excavation Progress Report
currentQuests.description: Bring Ironband's Progress Report to Jern Hornhelm in Thelsamar.

currentQuests.name: Gathering Idols
currentQuests.description: Bring Magmar Fellhew 8 Carved Stone Idols.

currentQuests.name: A Dark Threat Looms
currentQuests.description: The Disarming Mixture seemed to take effect.  Return to Chief Engineer Hinderweir to report the good news.

currentQuests.name: A Dark Threat Looms
currentQuests.description: Chief Engineer Hinderweir wants you to swim down to the base of the dam, locate the powder keg and stir in the Disarming Mixture to prevent an explosion.

currentQuests.name: A Dark Threat Looms
currentQuests.description: Chief Engineer Hinderweir wants you to gather Lurker Venom, a Mo'grosh Crystal, and a Crocolisk Tear.

currentQuests.name: A Dark Threat Looms
currentQuests.description: Ashlan Stonesmirk wants you to return to Chief Engineer Hinderweir and inform him of the new discovery.

currentQuests.name: Resupplying the Excavation
currentQuests.description: Speak with Huldar.

currentQuests.name: Vyrin's Revenge
currentQuests.description: Kill Ol' Sooty then show your handiwork to Daryl the Youngling at the Farstrider Lodge.

currentQuests.name: The Trogg Threat
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Trogg Stone Teeth to Captain Rugelfuss in the southern guard tower.

currentQuests.name: In Defense of the King's Lands
currentQuests.description: Mountaineer Wallbang in the southern guard tower wants you to kill 10 Stonesplinter Shaman and 10 Stonesplinter Bonesnappers.

currentQuests.name: A Hunter's Challenge
currentQuests.description: Kill 5 Elder Mountain Boars and return to Daryl the Youngling in the Farstrider Lodge within 12 minutes.

currentQuests.name: A Hunter's Boast
currentQuests.description: Kill 6 Mountain Buzzards and return to Daryl the Youngling in the Farstrider Lodge within 15 minutes.

currentQuests.name: WANTED: Chok'sul
currentQuests.description: Kill Chok'sul and bring his head to Magistrate Bluntnose of Thelsamar.

currentQuests.name: Mercenaries
currentQuests.description: Magistrate Bluntnose of Thelsamar has hired you to kill 4 Mo'grosh Ogres, 4 Mo'grosh Brutes and 4 Mo'grosh Enforcers.

currentQuests.name: A Dark Threat Looms
currentQuests.description: Investigate the area near the eastern ramp of the Dam and bring Chief Engineer Hinderweir a clue that might reveal what the Dark Iron Dwarves are up to.

currentQuests.name: In Defense of the King's Lands
currentQuests.description: Mountaineer Gravelgaw in the southern guard tower wants you to kill 10 Stonesplinter Skullthumpers and 10 Stonesplinter Seers and report back to him.

currentQuests.name: In Defense of the King's Lands
currentQuests.description: Mountaineer Cobbleflint of the southern guard tower wants you to kill 10 Stonesplinter Troggs and 10 Stonesplinter Scouts.

currentQuests.name: In Defense of the King's Lands
currentQuests.description: Kill the Trogg leader, Grawmug, and his two guards, Gnasher and Brawler then report back to Captain Rugelfuss in the southern guard tower.

currentQuests.name: A Dark Threat Looms
currentQuests.description: Return to Chief Engineer Hinderweir and show him the clue that you discovered.

currentQuests.name: A Dark Threat Looms
currentQuests.description: Chief Engineer Hinderweir wants you to take the strange smelling powder to Ashlan Stonesmirk, the explosives expert in Dun Modr.

currentQuests.name: Job Opening: Guard Captain of Revantusk Village
currentQuests.description: You have been tasked with the decimation of 20 Vilebranch Berserkers, 20 Vilebranch Shadow Hunters, 20 Vilebranch Blood Drinkers, and 20 Vilebranch Soul Eaters.$B$BShould you complete this task, return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Wanted: Vile Priestess Hexx and Her Minions
currentQuests.description: You have been ordered to slay Vile Priestess Hexx and 10 Vilebranch Aman'zasi Guards. See Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands once this task is complete.$B$BVile Priestess Hexx and the Aman'zasi Guards can be found atop Jintha'alor in the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Dark Vessels
currentQuests.description: Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to recover 10 Vessels of Tainted Blood from Jintha'alor. Return to Primal Torntusk when this task is complete.

currentQuests.name: Separation Anxiety
currentQuests.description: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to recover his twin brother's remains. Find and return Huntsman Malkhor's Skull and Huntsman Malkhor's Bones to Huntsman Markhor.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that his brother's remains were fed to the oozes and wolves of the Vilebranch. He also mentioned that there is a refuse pit filled with oozes in Jintha'alor as well as a wolf den. Both of these places are near the top of the temple.

currentQuests.name: Return to Primal Torntusk
currentQuests.description: Elder Torntusk at Jintha'alor wants you to return to Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village with news of his rescue.

currentQuests.name: Recover the Key!
currentQuests.description: Elder Torntusk at Jintha'alor wants you to kill Hitah'ya the Keeper to get the Shackle Key to his bindings. Return to Elder Torntusk when you have recovered the key.

currentQuests.name: Kidnapped Elder Torntusk!
currentQuests.description: Primal Torntusk at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to rescue her mate, Elder Torntusk, from Jintha'alor.$B$BYou have been told that he is being held prisoner atop Jintha'alor, the Vilebranch capital city located in the southern region of the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Cannibalistic Cousins
currentQuests.description: Mystic Yayo'jin at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 15 Vilebranch Scalpers and 10 Vilebranch Soothsayers. Return to her when this task is complete.$B$BYayo'jin indicated that these trolls could be found near the Shaol'watha and Agol'watha temples in the north by northeastern region of the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: The Final Message to the Wildhammer
