currentQuests.description: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to travel to Aerie Peak in the western region of the Hinterlands and place the Final Message to the Wildhammer by the well in the center of town. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BBeware of angry Wildhammer dwarves and unruly members of the Alliance.

currentQuests.name: Another Message to the Wildhammer
currentQuests.description: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to bring him 10 Long Elegant Feathers from the gryphons that inhabit the Hinterlands. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BGryphons are known to inhabit every region of the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Message to the Wildhammer
currentQuests.description: Otho Moji'ko at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to slaughter 15 Highvale Outrunners, 15 Highvale Scouts, 15 Highvale Marksman and 15 Highvale Rangers. Return to him when this task is complete.$B$BYou can find the Highvale high elves at the Quel'Danil Lodge in the northwestern region of the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Lard Lost His Lunch
currentQuests.description: Lard at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to find Lard's Lunch. Return to him when this task is complete.$B$BLard mentioned that he left it on the island to the north. Watch out for Vilebranch trolls.

currentQuests.name: Vilebranch Hooligans
currentQuests.description: Smith Slagtree at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to find Slagtree's Lost Tools. Return to him once this task is complete.$B$BYou recall Smith Slagtree mentioning that the tools might be at one of the Vilebranch temples in the northeastern region of the Hinterlands. You should also check Skulk Rock.

currentQuests.name: Avenging the Fallen
currentQuests.description: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill a Razorbeak Skylord and retrieve its Skylord Plume. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the Razorbeak Skylord are a rare breed that tend to occupy the wilds of the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Hunt the Savages
currentQuests.description: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 20 Savage Owlbeasts. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the Savage Owlbeasts occupy the wilds of the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Stalking the Stalkers
currentQuests.description: Huntsman Markhor at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 10 Silvermane Stalkers and 10 Silvermane Howlers. Return to him once the task is complete.$B$BMarkhor mentioned that the wolves hide in the wilds of the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Gammerita, Mon!
currentQuests.description: Katoom the Angler at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill Gammerita and retrieve Katoom's Best Lure from her corpse.$B$BKatoom mentioned that Gammerita hangs out on the coast with the other turtles.

currentQuests.name: Snapjaws, Mon!
currentQuests.description: Katoom the Angler at Revantusk Village in the Hinterlands wants you to kill 15 Saltwater Snapjaw turtles. Return to him when you have completed this task.

currentQuests.name: The Ancient Egg
currentQuests.description: Bring the Ancient Egg to Yeh'kinya in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: Saving Sharpbeak
currentQuests.description: Fight to the top of Jintha'Alor, kill Vile Priestess Hexx for the key to Sharpbeak's cage, and save Sharpbeak.

currentQuests.name: Return to the Hinterlands
currentQuests.description: Speak with Gryphon Master Talonaxe.

currentQuests.name: The Divination
currentQuests.description: Wait until Grimshade performs the ritual of divination.

currentQuests.name: Thadius Grimshade
currentQuests.description: Bring Sharpbeak's Feather to Thadius Grimshade in the Blasted Lands.

currentQuests.name: The Altar of Zul
currentQuests.description: Check the top of the Altar of Zul, then return to Gryphon Master Talonaxe.

currentQuests.name: Witherbark Cages
currentQuests.description: Check the cages at the two Witherbark villages, then return to Gryphon  Master Talonaxe.

currentQuests.name: Venom to the Undercity
currentQuests.description: Bring Faranell's Parcel to Master Apothecary Faranell in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Summoning Shadra
currentQuests.description: Defeat Shadra at the altar of Shadra'Alor, then bring her venom to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Consult Master Gadrin
currentQuests.description: Speak with Master Gadrin in Sen'jin Village.

currentQuests.name: Undamaged Venom Sac
currentQuests.description: Bring an Undamaged Venom Sac to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Venom Bottles
currentQuests.description: Bring a Venom Bottle to an apothecary in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Grim Message
currentQuests.description: Gather Witherbark Skulls and place on Nimboya's Pike.  Place Nimboya's Laden Pike at one of the Witherbark Villages in the Hinterlands, then return to Nimboya in Stranglethorn.

currentQuests.name: Troll Necklace Bounty
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Troll Tribal Necklaces to Fraggar Thundermantle in Aerie Peak.

currentQuests.name: Skulk Rock Clean-up
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Green Sludges and 10 Jade Oozes, and then report back to Fraggar Thundermantle in Aerie Peak.

currentQuests.name: Rin'ji's Secret
currentQuests.description: Oran Snakewrithe, a well known scholar on matters concerning the Witherbark trolls, may be able to decipher the tablet. She is known to reside within the Magic Quarter of the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Rin'ji is Trapped!
currentQuests.description: Escort Rin'ji out of the Quel'Danil Lodge, then find his hidden secret at the Overlook Cliffs to the east.

currentQuests.name: Rhapsody's Tale
currentQuests.description: Bring the Atal'ai Tablet Fragment to Brohann Caskbelly in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Rhapsody's Kalimdor Kocktail
currentQuests.description: Rhapsody Shindigger in The Hinterlands wants you to bring him 3 Roc Gizzards, 3 Groddoc Livers and 3 Ironfur Livers.

currentQuests.name: Rhapsody Shindigger
currentQuests.description: Seek out Rhapsody Shindigger in The Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Gryphon Master Talonaxe
currentQuests.description: Speak with Gryphon Master Talonaxe inside the Aerie Peak Aviary.

currentQuests.name: Return to Fel'Zerul
currentQuests.description: Return to Fel'Zerul in Stonard.

currentQuests.name: Rescue OOX-09/HL!
currentQuests.description: Escort OOX-09/HL to the shoreline beyond Overlook Cliff, then report to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

currentQuests.name: Find OOX-09/HL!
currentQuests.description: Take the distress beacon to Oglethorpe's homing robot at the head of the river in the Hinterlands, near Skulk Rock.

currentQuests.name: A Sticky Situation
currentQuests.description: Recover 10 bottles of Hinterlands Honey Ripple from the crates located around the abandoned Horde base in Skulk Rock.

currentQuests.name: The Hammer May Fall
currentQuests.description: Kill 8 Boulderfist Ogres and 10 Boulderfist Enforcers, then find Drum Fel in the Hammerfall outpost in Arathi Highlands.

currentQuests.name: Hints of a New Plague?
currentQuests.description: Find Phin Odelic in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Hints of a New Plague?
currentQuests.description: Protect Kinelory until she returns to Quae.

currentQuests.name: Hints of a New Plague?
currentQuests.description: Find Quae and Kinelory near the Go'Shek Farm in the Arathi Highlands.

currentQuests.name: Hints of a New Plague?
currentQuests.description: Find the Forsaken Courier and bring back her Sealed Folder to Quae near the Go'Shek Farm.

currentQuests.name: Hints of a New Plague?
currentQuests.description: Speak to Kinelory.

currentQuests.name: Dangerous!
currentQuests.description: High Executor Darthalia of Tarren Mill is offering a bounty on Clerk Horrace Whitesteed, Citizen Wilkes, Miner Hackett and Farmer Kalaba.

currentQuests.name: WANTED: Baron Vardus
currentQuests.description: Kill Baron Vardus and deliver his head to High Executor Darthalia in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Bartolo's Yeti Fur Cloak
currentQuests.description: Bring Bartolo Ginsetti of Southshore a Bolt of Wool, a Hillman's Cloak, Fine Thread and 10 clumps of Yeti Fur.

currentQuests.name: Costly Menace
currentQuests.description: Darren Malvew of Southshore wants you to kill 8 Mountain Lions and 10 Hulking Mountain Lions.

currentQuests.name: Reassignment
currentQuests.description: Deliver Farren's report to Major Samuelson in Stormwind Keep.

currentQuests.name: Stormwind Ho!
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Daggerspine Shorehunters and 10 Daggerspine Sirens for Lieutenant Farren Orinelle in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Farren's Proof
currentQuests.description: Speak with Lieutenant Farren Orinelle in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Farren's Proof
currentQuests.description: Deliver the sack of murloc heads to Marshall Redpath in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Farren's Proof
currentQuests.description: Collect 10 Murloc Heads from the murlocs on the Western Strand for Lieutenant Farren Orinelle in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Bracers of Binding
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Bracers of Earth Binding to Keeper Bel'varil in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Stone Tokens
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Worn Stone Tokens to Keeper Bel'varil in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Soothing Turtle Bisque
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 pieces of Turtle Meat and some Soothing Spices to Chef Jessen in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Helcular's Revenge
currentQuests.description: Charge the Rod of Helcular with the powers of the Flame of Azel, Flame of Veraz and the Flame of Uzel.$b$bDrive the charged rod into Helcular's grave in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Helcular's Revenge
currentQuests.description: Retrieve Helcular's Rod from the Yeti and bring it back to Novice Thaivand in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Battle of Hillsbrad
currentQuests.description: Take Darthalia's Sealed Commendation to Varimathras in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: WANTED: Syndicate Personnel
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Syndicate Rogues and 10 Syndicate Watchmen. Return to High Executor Darthalia in Tarren Mill for your reward.

currentQuests.name: Humbert's Sword
currentQuests.description: Retrieve Deathguard Humbert's sword from Dun Garok and return it to him in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Souvenirs of Death
currentQuests.description: Deathguard Samsa of Tarren Mill wants 30 Hillsbrad Human Skulls.

currentQuests.name: Dalaran Patrols
currentQuests.description: Kill 6 Dalaran Summoners and 12 Elemental Slaves, then return to Magus Voidglare in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Prison Break In
currentQuests.description: Find the traitors and recover their artifacts, then return to Magus Voidglare in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Battle of Hillsbrad
currentQuests.description: Travel to Dun Garok and kill 8 Mountaineers, 4 Riflemen, 2 Priests and Captain Ironhill and report back to Darthalia in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Battle of Hillsbrad
currentQuests.description: Kill Foreman Bonds and 10 Hillsbrad Miners and report back to Darthalia in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Down the Coast
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Torn Fin Tidehunters and 10 Torn Fin Oracles for Lieutenant Farren Orinelle in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Infiltration
currentQuests.description: Retrieve information about Gol'dir's whereabouts for Krusk in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Battle of Hillsbrad
currentQuests.description: Kill Magistrate Burnside and 4 Hillsbrad Councilmen.  Destroy the Hillsbrad Proclamation.  Steal the Hillsbrad Town Registry.  Report back to Darthalia in Tarren Mill afterwards.

currentQuests.name: Battle of Hillsbrad
currentQuests.description: Kill Blacksmith Verringtan and 4 Hillsbrad Apprentice Blacksmiths.$b$bRetrieve a shipment of iron and report back to Darthalia in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Battle of Hillsbrad
currentQuests.description: Kill 15 Hillsbrad Peasants and report back to Darthalia in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Battle of Hillsbrad
currentQuests.description: Kill 6 Hillsbrad Farmhands, 6 Hillsbrad Farmers, Farmer Ray and Farmer Getz and report back to Darthalia in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Agony
currentQuests.description: Place the Tainted Keg on the rug for the captured farmers.

currentQuests.name: The Crown of Will
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Crown of Will to Sharlindra in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: The Crown of Will
currentQuests.description: Kill Mug'Thol, and return his head with the Crown of Will to Melisara in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: The Crown of Will
currentQuests.description: Kill Targ, Muckrake, and Glommus and bring their heads to Melisara in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: The Crown of Will
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Crushridge Maulers for Melisara in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Agony
currentQuests.description: Bring a keg of Shindigger Stout to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Agony
currentQuests.description: Bring the Mudsnout Mixture, a Strong Troll's Blood Potion, 5 Daggerspine Scales and 5 Torn Fin Eyes to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Agony
currentQuests.description: Take the Mudsnout Composite to Master Apothecary Faranell in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Agony
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Mudsnout Blossoms to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Taretha's Gift
currentQuests.description: Return Taretha's pendant to Krusk in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Lord Aliden Perenolde
currentQuests.description: Kill Lord Aliden Perenolde and ask his mistress, Elysa, about Taretha's pendant.

currentQuests.name: Blackmoore's Legacy
currentQuests.description: Return the information gathered by Gol'dir to Krusk in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Gol'dir
currentQuests.description: Free Gol'dir then return to Krusk in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Pain
currentQuests.description: Feed the Elixir of Pain to Stanley.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Pain
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 vials of Mountain Lion Blood to Apothecary Lydon in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Suffering
currentQuests.description: Give Umpi the Elixir of Suffering.

currentQuests.name: The Rescue
currentQuests.description: Krusk in Tarren Mill needs you to free Drull and Tog'thar from Durnholde Keep.

currentQuests.name: Elixir of Suffering
currentQuests.description: Apothecary Lydon of Tarren Mill wants 10 Gray Bear Tongues and some Creeper Ichor.

currentQuests.name: Time To Strike
currentQuests.description: Travel to Tarren Mill to deliver Deathstalker Lesh's message to High Executor Darthalia.

currentQuests.name: Perfect Yeti Hide
currentQuests.description: Bring the Perfect Yeti Hide to Jangdor Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Pristine Yeti Hide
currentQuests.description: Bring the Pristine Yeti Hide to Pratt McGrubben at the Feathermoon Stronghold, Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Improved Quality
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Rage Scar Yeti Hides to Jangdor Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Improved Quality
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Rage Scar Yeti Hides to Pratt McGrubben at Feathermoon Stronghold, Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Zukk'ash Report
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Camp Mojache Zukk'ash Report to Zilzibin Drumlore.  He resides in the Drag of Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Stinglasher
currentQuests.description: Defeat Stinglasher in the Writhing Deep, bringing its glands back to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Zukk'ash Infestation
currentQuests.description: Bring 20 Zukk'ash Carapaces to Hadoken Swiftstrider at Camp Mojache, Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Refuel for the Zapping
currentQuests.description: Collect 6 Water Elemental Cores from the Sea Elementals and Sea Sprays along the Forgotten Coast of Feralas, and bring them back to Zorbin Fandazzle who is near the dock there.

currentQuests.name: Again With the Zapped Giants
currentQuests.description: Use Zorbin's Ultra-Shrinker to zap any kind of giant found in Feralas into a more manageable form.  Bring 10 Miniaturization Residues found on the zapped versions of these giants to Zorbin Fandazzle at the docks of the Forgotten Coast, Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Fuel for the Zapping
currentQuests.description: Collect 10 Water Elemental Cores from the Sea Elementals and Sea Sprays along the Forgotten Coast of Feralas, and bring them back to Zorbin Fandazzle who is near the dock there.

currentQuests.name: Zapped Giants
currentQuests.description: Use Zorbin's Ultra-Shrinker to zap any kind of giant found in Feralas into a more manageable form.  Bring 15 Miniaturization Residues found on the zapped versions of these giants to Zorbin Fandazzle at the docks of the Forgotten Coast, Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Becoming a Parent
currentQuests.description: Speak to Agnar Beastamer in the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Food for Baby
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Silvermane Stalker Flanks to Agnar Beastamer in Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: Thalanaar Delivery
currentQuests.description: Bring the Undelivered Parcel to Falfindel Waywarder in Thalanaar.

currentQuests.name: Rise of the Silithid
currentQuests.description: Bring Raschal's Report to Gracina Spiritmight in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: A Hero's Welcome
currentQuests.description: Speak with Shandris Feathermoon in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: Freed from the Hive
currentQuests.description: Free Raschal from the Zukk'ash hive.$B$BReturn to Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold and let him know that Raschal is alive and well.

currentQuests.name: The Writhing Deep
currentQuests.description: Now that Raschal's last known whereabouts have been discovered, continue your search for him or his remains in the Writhing Deep.  According to the note, it is located to the south of the Woodpaw gnoll camps.

currentQuests.name: The Woodpaw Gnolls
currentQuests.description: Search the Woodpaw Gnoll camps of southern Feralas for evidence of the courier's belongings or the courier himself.

currentQuests.name: Psychometric Reading
currentQuests.description: Speak with Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: The Knife Revealed
currentQuests.description: Take the Discarded Knife to Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: Boat Wreckage
currentQuests.description: Return to Feathermoon Stronghold and show Ginro Hearthkindle the Discarded Knife you have found.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Courier
currentQuests.description: Locate the courier's boat somewhere along the coast of Feralas.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Courier
currentQuests.description: Speak with Ginro Hearthkindle in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: The Strength of Corruption
currentQuests.description: Talo Thornhoof at Camp Mojache in Feralas wants you to kill 12 Angerclaw Grizzlies and 12 Felpaw Ravagers in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: The Newest Member of the Family
currentQuests.description: Take your Fragile Sprite Darter Egg to the Hinterlands and speak to Agnar Beastamer, but hurry, you only have 1 hour to find him before the hatchling within the egg dies.

currentQuests.name: A Short Incubation
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Elixir of Fortitudes to Quentin in Thousand Needles.

currentQuests.name: An Orphan Looking For a Home
currentQuests.description: Speak to Quentin in Thousand Needles.

currentQuests.name: The Mystery of Morrowgrain
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Morrowgrain to Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: Jonespyre's Request
currentQuests.description: Speak with Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: The Sunken Temple
currentQuests.description: Find Marvon Rivetseeker in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: Against the Hatecrest
currentQuests.description: Report to Latronicus Moonspear in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: Weapons of Spirit
currentQuests.description: Witch Doctor Uzer'i wants you to wait for a moment while he prepares the weapons.

currentQuests.name: Natural Materials
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Splintered Logs, 6 Encrusted Minerals, 20 pieces of Resilient Sinew, and 40 Metallic Fragments to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Camp Mojache.

currentQuests.name: Mountain Giant Muisek
currentQuests.description: Kill 7 Land Walkers or Cliff Giants. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Mountain Giants.

currentQuests.name: Treant Muisek
currentQuests.description: Kill 3 Wandering Forest Walkers. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Treants.

currentQuests.name: Faerie Dragon Muisek
currentQuests.description: Kill 8 Sprite Darters or Sprite Dragons. Use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Faerie Dragons.

currentQuests.name: Hippogryph Muisek
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Frayfeather Hippogryphs of any type, then use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture them.

currentQuests.name: Testing the Vessel
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Hinterlands, and locate the Wildkin. Kill 10, and use the Muisek Vessel to shrink and capture the fallen Wildkin.$B$BBring 10 Wildkin Muiseks and the Muisek Vessel to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Return to Witch Doctor Uzer'i
currentQuests.description: Deliver Neeru's Herb Pouch to Witch Doctor Uzer'i in Feralas.

currentQuests.name: A Strange Request
currentQuests.description: Take the Shrunken Head to Neeru Fireblade in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Vengeance on the Northspring
currentQuests.description: Talo Thornhoof wants you to kill 4 Northspring Harpies, 4 Northspring Roguefeathers, 4 Northspring Windcallers, and 4 Northspring Slayers.

currentQuests.name: Dark Heart
currentQuests.description: Talo Thornhoof in Camp Mojache wants Edana Hatetalon's Dark Heart.

currentQuests.name: The Gordunni Orb
currentQuests.description: Bring the Gordunni Orb to Uthel'nay in the Darkbriar Lodge in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Gordunni Cobalt
currentQuests.description: Orwin Gizzmick in Camp Mojache wants 12 samples of Gordunni Cobalt.

currentQuests.name: The High Wilderness
currentQuests.description: Angelas Moonbreeze wants you to kill 8 Gordunni Warlocks, 8 Gordunni Shaman, and 8 Gordunni Brutes.

currentQuests.name: The Ogres of Feralas
currentQuests.description: Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache wants you to kill 10 Gordunni Shaman, 10 Gordunni Warlocks, and 5 Gordunni Maulers.

currentQuests.name: Dark Ceremony
currentQuests.description: Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache wants you to find a Gordunni Orb.

currentQuests.name: The Gordunni Scroll
currentQuests.description: Bring the Gordunni Scroll to Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache.

currentQuests.name: A Grim Discovery
currentQuests.description: Bring the Crate of Grimtotem Horns to Belgrom Rockmaul in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: The Ogres of Feralas
currentQuests.description: Rok Orhan in Camp Mojache wants you to kill 10 Gordunni Ogres, 10 Gordunni Ogre-Magi, and 5 Gordunni Brutes.

currentQuests.name: A Grim Discovery
currentQuests.description: Bring 20 Grimtotem Horns to Krueg Skullsplitter in Camp Mojache.

currentQuests.name: A New Cloak's Sheen
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Iridescent Sprite Darter Wings to Krueg Skullsplitter in Camp Mojache.

currentQuests.name: Doling Justice
currentQuests.description: Take Jer'kai's Signet Ring to High Priestess Tyrande Whisperwind in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Doling Justice
currentQuests.description: Kill 12 Grimtotem Naturalists, 10 Grimtotem Raiders, and 6 Grimtotem Shamans before returning to Jer'kai Moonweaver in Feralas.

currentQuests.name: Freedom for All Creatures
currentQuests.description: Using the Bamboo Cage Key, free the Sprite Darters from the pen in the Grimtotem camp. At least 6 Sprite Darters and Kindal Moonweaver must survive.$B$BYou have 6 minutes before Kindal decides it is time to retreat and you fail the quest.

currentQuests.name: The Super Snapper FX
currentQuests.description: Use the Super Snapper FX to take a snapshot of Gammerita, then return to Daryn Lightwind in Rut'theran Village.

currentQuests.name: Return to Troyas
currentQuests.description: Deliver the book to Troyas Moonbreeze in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: The Morrow Stone
currentQuests.description: Return the Sparkling Stone and the Stave of Equinex to Troyas Moonbreeze in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: The Borrower
currentQuests.description: Take the letter to Curgle Cranklehop in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: Feralas: A History
currentQuests.description: Ask Daryn Lightwind if you may borrow her book.

currentQuests.name: In Search of Knowledge
currentQuests.description: Talk to Daryn Lightwind in Rut'theran Village.

currentQuests.name: The Battle Plans
currentQuests.description: Bring the Woodpaw Battle Plans to Hadoken Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

currentQuests.name: Woodpaw Investigation
currentQuests.description: Find the gnoll battle plans somewhere in the gnoll camps to the south of Camp Mojache.

currentQuests.name: The Stave of Equinex
currentQuests.description: Energize Troyas' Stave and find the Equinex Monolith.

currentQuests.name: Delivering the Relic
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Mysterious Relic to Vestia Moonspear in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: Against Lord Shalzaru
currentQuests.description: Eliminate Lord Shalzaru, and then bring the Mysterious Relic he uncovered to Latronicus Moonspear in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: Against the Hatecrest
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Hatecrest Naga Scales to Latronicus Moonspear in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: Return to Feathermoon Stronghold
currentQuests.description: Return to Shandris Feathermoon in the Feathermoon Stronghold and report your findings.

currentQuests.name: The Ruins of Solarsal
currentQuests.description: Explore the Ruins of Solarsal and investigate the presence of the naga there.

currentQuests.name: Alpha Strike
currentQuests.description: Kill 5 Woodpaw Alphas and return to Hadoken Swiftstrider within one hour.

currentQuests.name: War on the Woodpaw
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Woodpaw Gnoll Manes to Hadoken Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

currentQuests.name: Wandering Shay
currentQuests.description: Pick up Shay's Bell from the chest.$B$BEscort Shay Leafrunner to Rockbiter's camp.

currentQuests.name: The Giant Guardian
currentQuests.description: Locate the lost night elf girl.

currentQuests.name: The Mark of Quality
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Thick Yeti Hides to Jangdor Swiftstrider in Camp Mojache.

currentQuests.name: The Mark of Quality
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Thick Yeti Hides to Pratt McGrubben in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: Rescue OOX-22/FE!
currentQuests.description: Escort OOX-22/FE to the dock along the Forgotten Coast, then report to Oglethorpe Obnoticus in Booty Bay.

currentQuests.name: Find OOX-22/FE!
currentQuests.description: Take the distress beacon to Oglethorpe's homing robot in a cave near Feral Scar Vale.

currentQuests.name: Winterfall Activity
currentQuests.description: Salfa wants you to kill 8 Winterfall Totemics, 8 Winterfall Den Watchers, and 8 Winterfall Pathfinders.

currentQuests.name: Timbermaw Ally
currentQuests.description: Grazle wants you to prove yourself by killing 6 Deadwood Warriors, 6 Deadwood Pathfinders, and 6 Deadwood Gardeners.  Return to him in southern Felwood near the Emerald Sanctuary when you are done.

currentQuests.name: Deadwood of the North
currentQuests.description: Nafien would like you to kill 6 Deadwood Den Watchers, 6 Deadwood Avengers, and 6 Deadwood Shamans.  Return to him in northern Felwood near the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

currentQuests.name: The Brokering of Peace
currentQuests.description: Bring the Timbermaw Offering of Peace to Thrall in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Feathers for Nafien
currentQuests.description: Some of the Deadwood furbolgs wear a distinctive headdress that may be used as a means of proof in thinning their numbers. Bring me a feather from any headdresses you acquire; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

currentQuests.name: The Brokering of Peace
currentQuests.description: Bring the Timbermaw Offering of Peace to King Magni Bronzebeard in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: The Root of All Evil
currentQuests.description: Plant the Demon Summoning Torch in the mouth of High Chief Winterfall's cave in the Winterfall furbolg village.  Defeat the demon and retrieve the Essence of Xandivious for Gorn One Eye in Timbermaw Hold.

currentQuests.name: Deadwood Ritual Totem
currentQuests.description: Take the Deadwood Ritual Totem inside Timbermaw Hold and see if one of the furbolgs there will find a use for the item.  The Timbermaw will not speak with you unless you are of Neutral reputation or greater with them.

currentQuests.name: Beads for Salfa
currentQuests.description: The Winterfall are known to carry spirit beads to ward against foul spirits. These beads have clearly failed in their purpose, as the Winterfall themselves are the agents of corruption. Bring to me these spirit beads from fallen Winterfall furbolgs; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

currentQuests.name: Feathers for Grazle
currentQuests.description: Some of the Deadwood furbolgs wear a distinctive headdress that may be used as a means of proof in thinning their numbers. Bring me a feather from any headdresses you acquire; for every set of five you bring me, you will earn recognition amongst the Timbermaw.

currentQuests.name: Speak to Salfa
currentQuests.description: Travel through Timbermaw Hold and exit into Winterspring.  Speak with Salfa, who stands guard outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

currentQuests.name: Speak to Nafien
currentQuests.description: Travel north along the main road in Felwood and speak with the furbolg named Nafien.  He stands guard outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.

currentQuests.name: Deadwood of the North
currentQuests.description: Grazle would like you to kill 6 Deadwood Den Watchers, 6 Deadwood Avengers, and 6 Deadwood Shamans.

currentQuests.name: Timbermaw Ally
currentQuests.description: Grazle wants you to prove yourself by killing 5 Deadwood Warriors, 5 Deadwood Pathfinders, and 5 Deadwood Gardeners.

currentQuests.name: A Husband's Last Battle
currentQuests.description: Kill Overlord Ror and return his claw to Dreka'Sur at Bloodvenom Post in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Sacred Cloth
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Mooncloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.

currentQuests.name: Runecloth
currentQuests.description: Bring 30 Runecloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.

currentQuests.name: The Remains of Trey Lightforge
currentQuests.description: Return the Remains of Trey Lightforge to Jessir Moonbow in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: To Winterspring!
currentQuests.description: Find Starfall Village in Winterspring and speak with Wynd Nightchaser.

currentQuests.name: A Final Blow
currentQuests.description: Kill Moora and Salia, and bring Shadow Lord Fel'dan's Head to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Retribution of the Light
currentQuests.description: Return to Jaedenar and kill the succubus Rakaiah before finding the Remains of Trey Lightforge.

currentQuests.name: Rescue From Jaedenar
currentQuests.description: Escort Arko'narin to where Lightforge and her equipment are being held, and then protect her as you escape Shadow Hold. Afterwards, seek out Jessir Moonbow in Felwood to let her know what's happened to her friends.

currentQuests.name: A Strange Red Key
currentQuests.description: Search through Jaedenar to discover what the Blood Red Key is used for.

currentQuests.name: Dousing the Flames of Protection
currentQuests.description: Using the Purified Moon Well Water, douse the flames of the four braziers of protection within Shadow Hold in Felwood, then return to Greta Mosshoof in the Emerald Sanctuary.

currentQuests.name: Cleansed Water Returns to Felwood
currentQuests.description: Take the Purified Moon Well Water to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Seeking Spiritual Aid
currentQuests.description: Take the Corrupt Moon Well Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Collection of the Corrupt Water
currentQuests.description: Take the Empty Canteen to the Moon Well in the center of Jaedenar and fill it before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Verifying the Corruption
currentQuests.description: Seek out and destroy 2 Entropic Beasts and 2 Entropic Horrors while exploring Shatter Scar Vale. After checking to see if the craters there are still filled with corrupt fel water, return to Taronn Redfeather in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Forces of Jaedenar
currentQuests.description: Enter Jaedenar and slay 4 Jaedenar Hounds, 4 Jaedenar Guardsmen, 6 Jaedenar Adepts, and 6 Jaedenar Cultists before returning to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Further Corruption
currentQuests.description: Eridan Bluewind in Felwood wants you to kill 8 Jadefire Hellcallers, 8 Jadefire Betrayers, 8 Jadefire Tricksters, and Xavaric. Return to Eridan when the task is completed.

currentQuests.name: Wild Guardians
currentQuests.description: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to hunt 13 Moontouched Owlbeasts.

currentQuests.name: Wild Guardians
currentQuests.description: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to hunt 10 Berserk Owlbeasts in Winterspring.

currentQuests.name: Wild Guardians
currentQuests.description: Trull Failbane in Felwood wants you to kill 15 Raging Owlbeasts and 15 Ragged Owlbeasts.

currentQuests.name: Corrupted Sabers
currentQuests.description: Take Winna's kitten to the corrupted moonwell, release it, then bring it back to Winna.$B$BOnce you have returned to Winna, click on the cat to release it to Winna.

currentQuests.name: Well of Corruption
currentQuests.description: Collect a sample of corrupted water from the Jadefire Satyrs' moonwell and bring it to Winna Hazzard at Bloodvenom Post.

currentQuests.name: Purified!
currentQuests.description: Speak to Eridan again in a moment.

currentQuests.name: Felbound Ancients
currentQuests.description: Travel to Darnassus and use Eridan's Vial to collect a Vial of Blessed Water from the Temple of the Moon. Return to Eridan with the filled vial.

currentQuests.name: The Corruption of the Jadefire
currentQuests.description: Kill 11 Jadefire Felsworns, 9 Jadefire Shadowstalkers, 9 Jadefire Rogues, and Xavathras. Return to Eridan Bluewind in Felwood when the task has been completed.

currentQuests.name: Ancient Spirit
currentQuests.description: Escort Arei to safety, then speak with Kayneth Stillwind in Forest Song, in eastern Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: Cleansing Felwood
currentQuests.description: Bring 15 Blood Amber to Maybess Riverbreeze in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Cleansing Felwood
currentQuests.description: Bring 15 Blood Amber to Arathandris Silversky in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Flute of Xavaric
currentQuests.description: Bring the Flute of Xavaric and 5 Jadefire Felbind samples to Eridan Bluewind in southern Felwood.

currentQuests.name: The Lord of Blackrock
currentQuests.description: Venture to the Valley of Heroes in Stormwind City and speak with Field Marshal Afrasiabi.

currentQuests.name: The Lord of Blackrock
currentQuests.description: Return the Head of Nefarian to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Celebrating Good Times
currentQuests.description: Seek out Major Mattingly in the Valley of Heroes.

currentQuests.name: Victory for the Alliance
currentQuests.description: Take the Head of Onyxia to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: The Dragon's Eye
currentQuests.description: You must search the world for a being capable of restoring the power to the Fragment of the Dragon's Eye. The only information you possess about such a being is that they exist.

currentQuests.name: The Great Masquerade
currentQuests.description: Follow Reginald Windsor through Stormwind. Protect him from harm!

currentQuests.name: Stormwind Rendezvous
currentQuests.description: Travel to Stormwind City and venture to the city gates. Speak with Squire Rowe so that he may let Marshal Windsor know that you have arrived.

currentQuests.name: The Blightcaller Cometh
currentQuests.description: Return to Stormwind and inform Highlord Bolvar Fordragon of the fate of Nathanos Marris.

currentQuests.name: Honor the Dead
currentQuests.description: Speak with Mathias Shaw again if you wish to accept his task.

currentQuests.name: The First and the Last
currentQuests.description: Speak with Mathias Shaw in Old Town Stormwind. He resides in the Barracks.

currentQuests.name: Welcome!
currentQuests.description: Bring the Northshire Gift Voucher to Merissa Stilwell.

currentQuests.name: A Bundle of Trouble
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Bundles of Wood to Raelen at the Eastvale Logging Camp.

currentQuests.name: Eagan Peltskinner
currentQuests.description: Speak with Eagan Peltskinner.

currentQuests.name: A Call to Arms: The Plaguelands!
currentQuests.description: Seek out Commander Ashlam Valorfist.  His base camp is located at Chillwind Camp, north of the Alterac Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Good Natured Emma
currentQuests.description: Find Ol' Emma in Stormwind and see if she is in fact Emma Felstone.  If she is, then perhaps she'd like the package Janice Felstone made for her.

currentQuests.name: Grape Manifest
currentQuests.description: Bring the Grape Manifest to Brother Neals in Northshire Abbey.

currentQuests.name: Milly's Harvest
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 crates of Milly's Harvest to Milly Osworth at Northshire Abbey.

currentQuests.name: Milly Osworth
currentQuests.description: Speak with Milly Osworth.

currentQuests.name: Assisting Arch Druid Staghelm
currentQuests.description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Jonespyre's Request
currentQuests.description: Speak with Quintis Jonespyre in Feathermoon Stronghold.

currentQuests.name: The Corruption Abroad
currentQuests.description: Travel to Gershala Nightwhisper in Auberdine.

currentQuests.name: Items of Some Consequence
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Silk Cloth and 2 of Clara's Fresh Apples to Tyrion in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Infiltrating the Castle
currentQuests.description: Speak to Tyrion in Stormwind Castle.

currentQuests.name: Rest and Relaxation
currentQuests.description: Speak with Innkeeper Farley at the Lion's Pride Inn.

currentQuests.name: Vital Supplies
currentQuests.description: Speak with Watchmaster Sorigal.

currentQuests.name: To The Hinterlands
currentQuests.description: Speak with High Thane Falstad Wildhammer at Aerie Peak in the Hinterlands.

currentQuests.name: In Search of The Temple
currentQuests.description: Brohann Caskbelly in Stormwind wants you to search for the Temple of Atal'Hakkar.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Defeat Dashel Stonefist in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Mazen's Behest
currentQuests.description: Retrieve Khadgar's Essays on Dimensional Convergence and deliver them to Watcher Mahar Ba in Nethergarde Keep.

currentQuests.name: Mazen's Behest
currentQuests.description: Speak with Acolyte Dellis in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Defeat Private Hendel in Dustwallow Marsh.

currentQuests.name: James Hyal
currentQuests.description: Speak with Vincent Hyal in Menethil Harbor.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Find Bishop DeLavey in Stormwind Keep.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Find Private Hendel in Dustwallow Marsh.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Search Sentry Point for any sign of Private Hendel.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Find Commander Samaul in Dustwallow Marsh.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Speak to Mikhail in the Wetlands.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Subdue Tapoke Jahn before he escapes, and then return to Mikhail in Menethil.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Speak to Mikhail in the Wetlands.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Speak to Elling Trias in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Speak to Dashel Stonefist in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Bring the Defias Docket to Elling Trias in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Find the Defias Docket and return it to Watcher Backus in Duskwood.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Give the Sealed Note to Watcher Backus in Duskwood.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Delivery Jorgen's Sealed Note to Elling Trias in Stormwind City.

currentQuests.name: The Missing Diplomat
currentQuests.description: Find Jorgen in Stormwind City.

currentQuests.name: Elmore's Task
currentQuests.description: Speak with Grimand Elmore.

currentQuests.name: The New Frontier
currentQuests.description: Speak with Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm at the Cenarion Enclave of Darnassus about the Cenarion Circle's call to explore the frontiers of Kalimdor.

currentQuests.name: A Threat Within
currentQuests.description: Speak with Marshal McBride.

currentQuests.name: Malin's Request
currentQuests.description: Find Skuerto at Refuge Pointe in the Arathi Highlands.

currentQuests.name: The Perenolde Tiara
currentQuests.description: Bring the Perenolde Tiara to Remington Ridgewell in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Return to Milton
currentQuests.description: Bring the Tomes of Alterac to Milton Sheaf in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Preserving Knowledge
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Recovered Tomes and the Worn Leather Book containing The Arm of Gri'lek to Loremaster Dibbs in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Southshore
currentQuests.description: Speak with Loremaster Dibbs in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: The Attack!
currentQuests.description: Remain in the garden until Lord Gregor Lescovar and Marzon the Silent Blade have had their conversation. Afterwards, kill them both before returning to Elling Trias in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Humble Beginnings
currentQuests.description: Go to Baros Alexston's house in Westfall and search for his compass, then return it to him in Cathedral Square of Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: You Have Served Us Well
currentQuests.description: Speak with Zggi, the servant of Zardeth the Blackclaw, to claim your reward.

currentQuests.name: An Audience with the King
currentQuests.description: Deliver Baros Alexston's report on the Defias Brotherhood to King Varian Wrynn in Stormwind Keep.

currentQuests.name: Brotherhood's End
currentQuests.description: Speak with Baros Alexston in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: The Head of the Beast
currentQuests.description: Speak to Mathias Shaw in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Shadow of the Past
currentQuests.description: Bring the Sealed Description of Thredd's Visitor to Master Mathias Shaw in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: The Curious Visitor
currentQuests.description: Bring the Sealed Description of Thredd's Visitor to Baros Alexston in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Bazil Thredd
currentQuests.description: Speak with Warden Thelwater in the Stockade.

currentQuests.name: The Unsent Letter
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Letter to the City Architect to Baros Alexston in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Stormpike's Delivery
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Package for Stormpike to Mountaineer Stormpike in Loch Modan.

currentQuests.name: Look to an Old Friend
currentQuests.description: Speak to Elling Trias in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Rethban Ore
currentQuests.description: Gather 5 loads of Rethban Ore and bring it to Brother Paxton in the Northshire Library.

currentQuests.name: Return to Kristoff
currentQuests.description: Return to Brother Kristoff in the Cathedral Square.  Give him the book The Stresses of Iron.

currentQuests.name: Ink Supplies
currentQuests.description: Speak with Foreman Oslow in Lakeshire and ask him for Rethban Iron Ore.

currentQuests.name: Brother Paxton
currentQuests.description: Speak with Brother Paxton in the Northshire Abbey.

currentQuests.name: Speaking of Fortitude
currentQuests.description: Go to the Royal Library in Stormwind Keep and speak with Milton Sheaf.  He can find for you the book on metallurgy that Brother Kristoff needs for his speech.

currentQuests.name: A Noble Brew
currentQuests.description: Take the Black Claw Stout to Lord Wishock in the Hall of Petitioners.

currentQuests.name: A Noble Brew
currentQuests.description: Zardeth the Black Claw wants you to bring him a Tear of Tilloa from Darkshire and a Musquash Root from the Wetlands.

currentQuests.name: Package for Thurman
currentQuests.description: Go to the Larson Clothiers in the Stormwind Mage Quarter, and give Thurman Schneider his Sewing Kit.

currentQuests.name: Harlan Needs a Resupply
currentQuests.description: Go to the Canal Tailor Shop and bring Rema Schneider the Cloth Request from Harlan Bagley.

currentQuests.name: Wine Shop Advert
currentQuests.description: Go to the Gallina Winery, and bring Suzetta Gallina the Wine Ticket for a free bottle of wine.

currentQuests.name: Westbrook Garrison Needs Help!
currentQuests.description: Go to the Westbrook Garrison and speak with Deputy Rainer.

currentQuests.name: A Meal Served Cold
currentQuests.description: Kill a Cold Eye Basilisk, get a Chilled Basilisk Haunch, and return it to Angus Stern in the Blue Recluse.

currentQuests.name: Wanted:  "Hogger"
currentQuests.description: Slay the gnoll Hogger and bring his Huge Gnoll Claw to Marshal Dughan.

currentQuests.name: Manhunt
currentQuests.description: Find and kill "the Collector"  then return to Marshal Dughan with The Collector's Ring.

currentQuests.name: The Collector
currentQuests.description: Go to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire and give him The Collector's Schedule.

currentQuests.name: The Escape
currentQuests.description: Take the Invisibility Liquor to Maybell Maclure.

currentQuests.name: Collecting Kelp
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Crystal Kelp Fronds to William Pestle in Goldshire.

currentQuests.name: Speak with Gramma
currentQuests.description: Speak with Gramma Stonefield.

currentQuests.name: Report to Gryan Stoutmantle
currentQuests.description: Talk to Gryan Stoutmantle.  He usually can be found in the stone tower on Sentinel Hill, just off the road, in the middle of Westfall.

currentQuests.name: Note to William
currentQuests.description: Take Gramma Stonefield's Note to William Pestle.

currentQuests.name: Young Lovers
currentQuests.description: Give Maybell's Love Letter to Tommy Joe Stonefield.

currentQuests.name: Princess Must Die!
currentQuests.description: Kill Princess, grab her collar, then bring it back to Ma Stonefield at the Stonefield Farm.

currentQuests.name: Goldtooth
currentQuests.description: Bring Bernice's Necklace to "Auntie" Bernice Stonefield at the Stonefield Farm.

currentQuests.name: Pie for Billy
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Chunks of Boar Meat to Auntie Bernice Stonefield at the Stonefield's Farm.

currentQuests.name: Lost Necklace
currentQuests.description: Speak with Billy Maclure.

currentQuests.name: Back to Billy
currentQuests.description: Bring the Pork Belly Pie to Billy Maclure at the Maclure Vineyards.

currentQuests.name: Red Linen Goods
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Red Linen Bandanas to Sara Timberlain at the Eastvale Logging Camp.

currentQuests.name: The Jasperlode Mine
currentQuests.description: Explore the Jasperlode Mine, then report back to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

currentQuests.name: Report to Thomas
currentQuests.description: Deliver Rolf and Malakai's Medallions to Guard Thomas at the eastern Elwynn bridge.

currentQuests.name: The Fargodeep Mine
currentQuests.description: Explore the Fargodeep Mine, then return to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

currentQuests.name: Shipment to Stormwind
currentQuests.description: Bring William's Shipment to Morgan Pestle in the Stormwind Trade District.

currentQuests.name: Kobold Candles
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Large Candles to William Pestle in Goldshire.

currentQuests.name: Cloth and Leather Armor
currentQuests.description: Give Sara Timberlain the Stormwind Armor Marker.

currentQuests.name: Report to Goldshire
currentQuests.description: Take Marshal McBride's Documents to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

currentQuests.name: Protect the Frontier
currentQuests.description: Kill 8 Prowlers and 5 Young Forest Bears, and then return to Guard Thomas at the east Elwynn bridge.

currentQuests.name: Gold Dust Exchange
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Gold Dust to Remy "Two Times" in Goldshire.  Gold Dust is gathered from Kobolds in Elwynn Forest.

currentQuests.name: Bounty on Murlocs
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Torn Murloc Fins to Guard Thomas at the east Elwynn bridge.

currentQuests.name: Discover Rolf's Fate
currentQuests.description: Search the murloc village for Rolf, or signs of his death.

currentQuests.name: A Fishy Peril
currentQuests.description: Remy "Two Times" wants you to speak with Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

currentQuests.name: Deliver Thomas' Report
currentQuests.description: Report to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.

currentQuests.name: Find the Lost Guards
currentQuests.description: Guard Thomas wants you to travel north up the river and search for the two lost guards, Rolf and Malakai.

currentQuests.name: Further Concerns
currentQuests.description: Marshal Dughan wants you to speak with Guard Thomas.

currentQuests.name: Wolves Across the Border
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 pieces of Tough Wolf Meat to Eagan Peltskinner outside Northshire Abbey.

currentQuests.name: Skirmish at Echo Ridge
currentQuests.description: Kill 12 Kobold Laborers, then return to Marshal McBride at Northshire Abbey.

currentQuests.name: Brotherhood of Thieves
currentQuests.description: Bring 12 Red Burlap Bandanas to Deputy Willem outside the Northshire Abbey.

currentQuests.name: Investigate Echo Ridge
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Kobold Workers, then report back to Marshal McBride.

currentQuests.name: Riverpaw Gnoll Bounty
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Painted Gnoll Armbands to Deputy Rainer at the Barracks.

currentQuests.name: Kobold Camp Cleanup
currentQuests.description: Kill 10 Kobold Vermin, then return to Marshal McBride.

currentQuests.name: Bounty on Garrick Padfoot
currentQuests.description: Kill Garrick Padfoot and bring his head to Deputy Willem at Northshire Abbey.

currentQuests.name: The Shadow Guard
currentQuests.description: Mataus the Wrathcaster at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 10 Insignia of the Crusade and 30 gold.

currentQuests.name: Writ of Safe Passage
currentQuests.description: Deliver the signed Writ of Safe Passage to Dispatch Commander Metz at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Bolstering Our Defenses
currentQuests.description: Capture Crown Guard Tower, Eastwall Tower, Northpass Tower and Plaguewood Tower in the Eastern Plaguelands, then return to Emmisary Gormok at Light's Hope Chapel.

currentQuests.name: Establishing New Outposts
currentQuests.description: Capture Crown Guard Tower, Eastwall Tower, Northpass Tower and Plaguewood Tower in the Eastern Plaguelands, then return to Emmisary Whitebeard at Light's Hope Chapel.

currentQuests.name: Epic Armaments of Battle - Exalted Amongst the Dawn
currentQuests.description: For 27 Insignias of the Dawn and 27 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

currentQuests.name: Superior Armaments of Battle - Exalted Amongst the Dawn
currentQuests.description: For 6 Insignias of the Dawn and 6 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

currentQuests.name: Superior Armaments of Battle - Revered Amongst the Dawn
currentQuests.description: For 7 Insignias of the Dawn and 7 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

currentQuests.name: Epic Armaments of Battle - Revered Amongst the Dawn
currentQuests.description: For 45 Insignias of the Dawn and 45 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

currentQuests.name: Epic Armaments of Battle - Honored Amongst the Dawn
currentQuests.description: For 75 Insignias of the Dawn and 75 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

currentQuests.name: Superior Armaments of Battle - Honored Amongst the Dawn
currentQuests.description: For 20 Insignias of the Dawn and 20 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

currentQuests.name: Epic Armaments of Battle - Friend of the Dawn
currentQuests.description: For 110 Insignias of the Dawn and 110 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

currentQuests.name: Superior Armaments of Battle - Friend of the Dawn
currentQuests.description: For 30 Insignias of the Dawn and 30 Insignias of the Crusade you may choose an item from the Argent Dawn's treasure cache.

currentQuests.name: The Ice Guard
currentQuests.description: Mataus the Wrathcaster at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 10 Insignia of the Crusade and 30 gold.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Lightning Eel
currentQuests.description: Deliver 30 Lightning Eel and the Craftsman's Writ - Lightning Eel - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Plated Armorfish
currentQuests.description: Deliver 30 Plated Armorfish and the Craftsman's Writ - Plated Armorfish - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Stonescale Eel
currentQuests.description: Deliver 40 Stonescale Eel and the Craftsman's Writ - Stonescale Eel - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Flask of Petrification
currentQuests.description: Deliver 1 Flask of Petrification and the Craftsman's Writ - Flask of Petrification - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Major Healing Potion
currentQuests.description: Deliver 20 Major Healing Potions and the Craftsman's Writ - Major Healing Potion - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Greater Arcane Protection Potion
currentQuests.description: Deliver 15 Greater Arcane Protection Potions and the Craftsman's Writ - Greater Arcane Protection Potion - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

conditions.name: Craftsman's Writ - Greater Arcane Protection Potion

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Major Mana Potion
currentQuests.description: Deliver 10 Major Mana Potions and the Craftsman's Writ - Major Mana Potion - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Thorium Tube
currentQuests.description: Deliver 14 Thorium Tubes and the Craftsman's Writ - Thorium Tube - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Gnomish Battle Chicken
currentQuests.description: Deliver 4 Gnomish Battle Chickens and the Craftsman's Writ - Gnomish Battle Chicken - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Thorium Grenade
currentQuests.description: Deliver 20 Thorium Grenades and the Craftsman's Writ - Thorium Grenade - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Goblin Sapper Charge
currentQuests.description: Deliver 20 Goblin Sapper Charges and the Craftsman's Writ - Goblin Sapper Charge - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Runecloth Robe
currentQuests.description: Deliver 8 Runecloth Robes and the Craftsman's Writ - Runecloth Robe - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Runecloth Bag
currentQuests.description: Deliver 8 Runecloth Bags and the Craftsman's Writ - Runecloth Bag - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Runecloth Boots
currentQuests.description: Deliver 8 Runecloth Boots and the Craftsman's Writ - Runecloth Boots - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Brightcloth Pants
currentQuests.description: Deliver 6 Brightcloth Pants and the Craftsman's Writ - Brightcloth Pants - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Runic Leather Pants
currentQuests.description: Deliver 4 Runic Leather Pants and the Craftsman's Writ - Runic Leather Pants - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Wicked Leather Belt
currentQuests.description: Deliver 9 Wicked Leather Belts and the Craftsman's Writ - Wicked Leather Belt - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Rugged Armor Kit
currentQuests.description: Deliver 25 Rugged Armor Kits and the Craftsman's Writ - Rugged Armor Kit - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Wicked Leather Headband
currentQuests.description: Deliver 10 Wicked Leather Headbands and the Craftsman's Writ - Wicked Leather Headband - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Radiant Circlet
currentQuests.description: Deliver 3 Radiant Circlets and the Craftsman's Writ - Radiant Circlet - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Huge Thorium Battleaxe
currentQuests.description: Deliver 3 Huge Thorium Battleaxes and the Craftsman's Writ - Huge Thorium Battleaxe - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Volcanic Hammer
currentQuests.description: Deliver 3 Volcanic Hammers and the Craftsman's Writ - Volcanic Hammer - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Imperial Plate Chest
currentQuests.description: Deliver 3 Imperial Plate Chests and the Craftsman's Writ - Imperial Plate Chest - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Craftsman's Writ - Dense Weightstone
currentQuests.description: Deliver 120 Dense Weightstones and the Craftsman's Writ - Dense Weightstone - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: They Call Me "The Rooster"
currentQuests.description: Dispatch Commander Metz at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants an Argent Dawn Valor Token.

currentQuests.name: Savage Flora
currentQuests.description: Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 30 Savage Fronds.

currentQuests.name: Binding the Dreadnaught
currentQuests.description: Korfax at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 30 Dark Iron Scraps.

currentQuests.name: The Elemental Equation
currentQuests.description: Archmage Angela Dosantos at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 30 Core of Elements.

currentQuests.name: Bonescythe Digs
currentQuests.description: Rohan the Assassin at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 30 Bone Fragments.

currentQuests.name: Cryptstalker Armor Doesn't Make Itself...
currentQuests.description: Huntsman Leopold at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 30 Crypt Fiend Parts.

currentQuests.name: The Dread Citadel - Naxxramas
currentQuests.description: Archmage Angela Dosantos at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will grant you Arcane Cloaking at no cost. You must be Exalted with the Argent Dawn.

currentQuests.name: The Dread Citadel - Naxxramas
currentQuests.description: Archmage Angela Dosantos at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 2 Arcane Crystals, 1 Nexus Crystal and 30 gold pieces. You must also be Revered with the Argent Dawn.

currentQuests.name: The Dread Citadel - Naxxramas
currentQuests.description: Archmage Angela Dosantos at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 5 Arcane Crystals, 2 Nexus Crystals, 1 Righteous Orb and 60 gold pieces. You must also be Honored with the Argent Dawn.

currentQuests.name: Anthion's Strange Request
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Dark Iron Bars, 20 Enchanted Leather, 3 Mooncloth and 4 Cured Rugged Hides to Anthion Harmon in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Proof of Life
currentQuests.description: Bring Ysida's Locket to Anthion Harmon in Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: In Search of Anthion
currentQuests.description: Use the Extra-Dimensional Ghost Revealer at the entrance to Stratholme and speak with the ghost of Anthion Harmon.

currentQuests.name: In Search of Anthion
currentQuests.description: Use the Extra-Dimensional Ghost Revealer at the entrance to Stratholme and speak with the ghost of Anthion Harmon.

currentQuests.name: Order Must Be Restored
currentQuests.description: Assemble an army and travel to the Eastern Plaguelands. Launch a full assault on Nathanos Blightcaller and any Horde filth that may attempt to protect him.$B$BKeep your wits about you, $N. The Horde will defend the ranger lord with their very lives.

currentQuests.name: The Eastern Plagues
currentQuests.description: Scour the Eastern Plaguelands for clues as to the "Blightcaller" and the missing SI:7 agents. If you find any SI:7 Insignias, return them to Flint Shadowmore at Chillwind Camp.

currentQuests.name: Augustus' Receipt Book
currentQuests.description: Bring Augustus' Receipt Book to Augustus the Touched in Terrordale.

currentQuests.name: The Scarlet Oracle, Demetria
currentQuests.description: The Scarlet Crusade is on the move. Somewhere along the road from Tyr's Hand to Stratholme you will find the Oracle, Demetria, and her entourage. Hunt her down and slay her. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller should you succeed.

currentQuests.name: Return to Nathanos
currentQuests.description: Return to Nathanos Blightcaller with the new information.

currentQuests.name: Nathanos' Ruse
currentQuests.description: Travel to Tyr's Hand, southeast of the Marris Stead. Once there, take a bite of the Rotten Apple. While under the guise of the Scarlet Crusade, deliver the Grand Crusader's Command to Crusader Lord Valdelmar.

currentQuests.name: The Crimson Courier
currentQuests.description: Return to Eastern Plaguelands and track down the Crimson Courier. Kill the Courier and recover the Grand Crusader's Command.$B$BTake the command to Nathanos Blightcaller for further instruction.

currentQuests.name: The Call to Command
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Undercity and speak with Varimathras.

currentQuests.name: The Corpulent One
currentQuests.description: Find Borelgore in the northern wastes of Eastern Plaguelands and destroy him. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when the mission is complete.

currentQuests.name: Duskwing, Oh How I Hate Thee...
currentQuests.description: Find Duskwing and slay him. From the corpse, recover a Patch of Duskwing's Fur and return it to Nathanos Blightcaller.$B$BIt is said that Duskwing roams the countryside to the north of Marris Stead.

currentQuests.name: The Ranger Lord's Behest
currentQuests.description: Travel to the northern borders of the Eastern Plaguelands and recover the Quel'Thalas Registry. The item is somewhere in the Quel'Lithien lodge.$B$BYou must also slay 8 Rangers, 8 Pathstriders, and 8 Woodsmen.

currentQuests.name: Un-Life's Little Annoyances
currentQuests.description: Slay 20 Noxious Plaguebats and 10 Monstrous Plaguebats. Return to Nathanos Blightcaller when you are finished.

currentQuests.name: When Smokey Sings, I Get Violent
currentQuests.description: Travel to Plaguewood, northwest of Light's Hope. Destroy 8 Scourge Structures by using Smokey's Special Compound at the Mark of Detonation planted inside each building. Smokey has had the Ziggurats and Slaughterhouses marked.$B$BOnce you plant the bomb, leave the building and marvel at your handiwork.$B$BBy the way, Smokey's Special Compound is rather... unstable.

currentQuests.name: That's Asking A Lot
currentQuests.description: Smokey LaRue wants you to get 2 Thorium Bars, 1 Golden Rod, 8 Hi-Explosive Bombs, and 8 Unstable Triggers.$B$BYou will have to find a blacksmith and an engineer for these items.

currentQuests.name: Hameya's Plea
currentQuests.description: Kill Infiltrator Hameya.  Use his key on the Mound of Dirt behind the Undercroft.

currentQuests.name: To Kill With Purpose
currentQuests.description: Travel to Corin's Crossing to the east and slaughter the Scourge that inhabit the town. Collect 7 pieces of Living Rot in under 10 minutes. Use the Mortar and Pestle to grind the Living Rot into Coagulated Rot.

currentQuests.name: Zaeldarr the Outcast
currentQuests.description: Bring Zaeldarr's Head to Caretaker Alen at Light's Hope Chapel.

currentQuests.name: Hidden Treasures
currentQuests.description: Bring Joseph's Key to Joseph's Chest.

currentQuests.name: Return to Chromie
currentQuests.description: Take the Bundle of Relics to Chromie in Andorhal.

currentQuests.name: Of Love and Family
currentQuests.description: Travel to island of Caer Darrow, in the south-central region of the Plaguelands, and look for any clues as to the whereabouts of the painting.

currentQuests.name: Of Lost Honor
currentQuests.description: Travel to Northdale, in the northeastern region of the Eastern Plaguelands, and recover the Symbol of Lost Honor. Return to Tirion Fordring upon completion of your objective.

currentQuests.name: Of Forgotten Memories
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Undercroft - at the southernmost section of the Eastern Plaguelands - and recover Taelan's Hammer. Return to Tirion Fordring upon completion of your objective.

currentQuests.name: Redemption
currentQuests.description: Listen to what Tirion Fordring has to say.

currentQuests.name: The Battle of Darrowshire
currentQuests.description: Place the Relic Bundle at the Darrowshire town square.$B$BPrevent Davil Lightfire's death until the death of Horgus.$B$BPrevent Captain Redpath's death until Redpath the Corrupted appears.$B$BDefeat Redpath the Corrupted.$B$BSpeak with the spirit of Joseph Redpath when he appears at the town square, then speak with Pamela at her home.

currentQuests.name: Sister Pamela
currentQuests.description: Find Pamela Redpath in Darrowshire.

currentQuests.name: Carrion Grubbage
currentQuests.description: Seek out the Carrion Grubs and Devourers of the region. Slay them and harvest their meat. Return to Tirion Fordring when you have gathered 15 Slabs of Carrion Worm Meat.

currentQuests.name: Blood Tinged Skies
currentQuests.description: Slay 30 Plaguebats and return to Tirion Fordring.

currentQuests.name: Demon Dogs
currentQuests.description: Slay 20 Plaguehound Runts, 5 Plaguehounds and 5 Frenzied Plaguehounds. Return to Tirion Fordring when the task is complete.

currentQuests.name: Chromatic Mantle of the Dawn
currentQuests.description: Bring 25 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Mantles of the Dawn
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Argent Dawn Valor Tokens to Quartermaster Breechlock at Light's Hope Chapel, Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Menethil's Gift
currentQuests.description: Take the Soulbound Keepsake to Leonid Barthalomew in Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: The Restless Souls
currentQuests.description: Find Egan. You only know that he was last seen around Stratholme.

currentQuests.name: The Argent Hold

Be warned, a Heated Ancient Blade will not remain heated forever - time is of the essence.$B$BThe last step before returning to me is to slay the beast and drive the Heated Ancient Blade into her corpse.$B$BDo this and Quel'Serrar will be yours.

Once the Pylons have powered down, the force field surrounding Immol'thar will have dissipated.$B$BEnter the Prison of Immol'thar and eradicate the foul demon that stands at its heart. Finally, confront Prince Tortheldrin in Athenaeum.$B$BReturn to the Shen'dralar Ancient in the courtyard should you complete this quest.
