currentQuests.description: Speak with Onu at the Grove of the Ancients.

currentQuests.name: Cave Mushrooms
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Scaber Stalks and 1 Death Cap to Barithras Moonshade in Auberdine.

currentQuests.name: Therylune's Escape
currentQuests.description: Help Therylune escape, then tell Therysil at the Shrine of Aessina that her sister is safe.

currentQuests.name: The Master's Glaive
currentQuests.description: Gather information, then use the Phial of Scrying to create a Scrying Bowl.  Use the bowl to speak with Onu.

currentQuests.name: The Absent Minded Prospector
currentQuests.description: Archaeologist Flagongut in Menethil Harbor wants you to bring him the Stone of Relu and Flagongut's Fossil.

currentQuests.name: The Absent Minded Prospector
currentQuests.description: Take the mysterious fossil to Archaeologist Flagongut in Menethil Harbor.

currentQuests.name: The Absent Minded Prospector
currentQuests.description: Take the mysterious fossil to Chief Archaeologist Greywhisker in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: The Absent Minded Prospector
currentQuests.description: Protect Prospector Remtravel as he searches for the mysterious fossil, then return to Archaeologist Hollee in Auberdine.

currentQuests.name: The Absent Minded Prospector
currentQuests.description: Travel south and check on Prospector Remtravel.

currentQuests.name: Leonid Barthalomew
currentQuests.description: Bring the Frozen Eggs to Leonid Barthalomew in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Felnok Steelspring
currentQuests.description: Give Tinkee's Letter to Felnok Steelspring.

currentQuests.name: Broodling Essence
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Broodling Essence and the Draco-Incarcinatrix 900 to Tinkee Steamboil at the Flame Crest in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Tablet of the Seven
currentQuests.description: Bring the Tablet Transcript to Maxwort Uberglint in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: FIFTY! YEP!
currentQuests.description: Oralius wants 50 Blackrock Medallions. Chances are high that these medallions can be found on the orcs in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: The True Masters
currentQuests.description: Speak with Ragged John to learn of Marshal Windsor's fate and return to Marshal Maxwell when you have completed this task.$B$BYou recall Marshal Maxwell telling you to search for him in a cave to the north.

currentQuests.name: The True Masters
currentQuests.description: Speak with Marshal Maxwell in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: The True Masters
currentQuests.description: Take Bolvar's Decree to Magistrate Solomon in Lakeshire.

currentQuests.name: The True Masters
currentQuests.description: Speak with Highlord Bolvar Fordragon after speaking with Lady Katrana Prestor.

currentQuests.name: The True Masters
currentQuests.description: Travel to Stormwind and deliver Solomon's Plea to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon.$B$BBolvar resides in Stormwind Keep.

currentQuests.name: The True Masters
currentQuests.description: Travel to Lakeshire and deliver Helendis Riverhorn's Letter to Magistrate Solomon.

currentQuests.name: Dragonkin Menace
currentQuests.description: Slay 15 Black Broodlings, 10 Black Dragonspawn, 4 Black Wyrmkin and 1 Black Drake. Return to Helendis Riverhorn when the task is complete.

currentQuests.name: The Rise of the Machines
currentQuests.description: Venture to the Burning Steppes and recover 10 Fractured Elemental Shards for Hierophant Theodora Mulvadania.$B$BYou recall Theodora mentioning the golems and elementals of that region as being a source for these shards.

currentQuests.name: A Taste of Flame
currentQuests.description: Show Cyrus Therepentous proof of your worth.$B$BYou have a feeling that Cyrus already knows that you are unworthy.

currentQuests.name: A Taste of Flame
currentQuests.description: Show Cyrus Therepentous the Black Dragonflight Molt you received from Kalaran Windblade.

currentQuests.name: Ogre Head On A Stick = Party
currentQuests.description: Take Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head and place it at the top of Dreadmaul Rock. Look for a soft dirt mound to plant the pike.

currentQuests.name: Gor'tesh the Brute Lord
currentQuests.description: Find Gor'tesh, somewhere to the west of Dreadmaul Rock. Kill Gor'tesh and then take Gor'tesh's Lopped Off Head back to Oralius in Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Extinguish the Firegut
currentQuests.description: Slay 15 Firegut Ogre-Mages, 7 Firegut Ogres, and 7 Firegut Ogre Brutes, and return to Oralius when you are finished.

currentQuests.name: Krom'Grul
currentQuests.description: Recover Sha'ni's Nose-Ring from Krom'Grul and return it to Thal'trak in Kargath. Search the various caves and mines in Dreadmaul Rock.

currentQuests.name: You Are Rakh'likh, Demon
currentQuests.description: Destroy Razelikh the Defiler and return the Severed Horn of the Defiler to the Fallen Hero of the Horde. You will also need to return the Ward of the Defiler so that the Fallen Hero can destroy it, preventing it from ever falling into the wrong hands.

currentQuests.name: Uniting the Shattered Amulet
currentQuests.description: Slay Grol the Destroyer, Lady Sevine, and Archmage Allistarj. From their corpses take the Amulet of Grol, the Amulet of Sevine, and the Amulet of Allistarj.$B$BRemember to USE your Enchanted Azsharite Fel Weaponry to weaken the triad. They cannot be killed otherwise - but use them wisely...

currentQuests.name: One Draenei's Junk...
currentQuests.description: Bring Kum'isha Imperfect Draenethyst Fragments. Any form of monster in the Blasted Lands could be carrying a fragment.

currentQuests.name: Everything Counts In Large Amounts
currentQuests.description: Bring Kum'isha Imperfect Draenethyst Fragments and be rewarded for each one you turn in.

currentQuests.name: A Tale of Sorrow
currentQuests.description: Listen to the Fallen Hero of the Horde tell his story.

currentQuests.name: Fall From Grace
currentQuests.description: Listen to the Fallen Hero of the Horde tell his story.

currentQuests.name: Petty Squabbles
currentQuests.description: Speak with the Fallen Hero of the Horde at the border of the Blasted Lands and the swamp.

currentQuests.name: The Demon Hunter
currentQuests.description: Speak with Loramus Thalipedes in Azshara.

currentQuests.name: The Cover of Darkness
currentQuests.description: Return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde with your findings.

currentQuests.name: Kirith
currentQuests.description: Find out what became of Lieutenant Kirith.

currentQuests.name: Heroes of Old
currentQuests.description: Speak to Corporal Thund Splithoof.

currentQuests.name: Heroes of Old
currentQuests.description: Open the chest and claim your reward.

currentQuests.name: The Stones That Bind Us
currentQuests.description: Free nine Servants of Razelikh, three Servants of Sevine, three Servants of Allistarj, and three Servants of Grol. Return to the Fallen Hero when your task is complete. You must remain within close proximity of the stones or the process will fail.

currentQuests.name: The Disgraced One
currentQuests.description: Speak to Dispatch Commander Ruag in Stonard.

currentQuests.name: Spiritual Domination
currentQuests.description: Bring ten Vulture Gizzards and two Snickerfang Jowls to Bloodmage Lynnore.

currentQuests.name: Vulture's Vigor
currentQuests.description: Bring ten Vulture Gizzards and two Snickerfang Jowls to Bloodmage Lynnore.

currentQuests.name: Infallible Mind
currentQuests.description: Bring ten Basilisk Brains and two Vulture Gizzards to Bloodmage Lynnore.

currentQuests.name: The Basilisk's Bite
currentQuests.description: Bring ten Basilisk Brains and two Vulture Gizzards to Bloodmage Lynnore.

currentQuests.name: Salt of the Scorpok
currentQuests.description: Bring three Scorpok Pincers, two Vulture Gizzards, and one Blasted Boar Lung to Bloodmage Drazial.

currentQuests.name: The Decisive Striker
currentQuests.description: Bring three Scorpok Pincers, two Vulture Gizzards, and one Blasted Boar Lung to Bloodmage Drazial.

currentQuests.name: Spirit of the Boar
currentQuests.description: Bring three Blasted Boar Lungs, two Scorpok Pincers, and one Basilisk Brain to Bloodmage Drazial.

currentQuests.name: A Boar's Vitality
currentQuests.description: Bring three Blasted Boar Lungs, two Scorpok Pincers, and one Basilisk Brain to Bloodmage Drazial.

currentQuests.name: Rage of Ages
currentQuests.description: Bring three Snickerfang Jowls, two Blasted Boar Lungs, and one Scorpok Pincer to Bloodmage Drazial.

currentQuests.name: Snickerfang Jowls
currentQuests.description: Bring three Snickerfang Jowls, two Blasted Boar Lungs, and one Scorpok Pincer to Bloodmage Drazial.

currentQuests.name: Kum'isha's Endeavors
currentQuests.description: Find and return a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere to Kum'isha the Collector.

currentQuests.name: To Serve Kum'isha
currentQuests.description: In your journeys throughout the Blasted Lands, should you ever come across a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere, take the item back to Kum'isha the Collector.$B$BBe warned, this gem is one of the most rare crystals in all of Azeroth. Any creature in these lands could be holding a Flawless Draenethyst Sphere.$B$BYou will be rewarded for each Flawless Draenethyst Sphere you have collected.

currentQuests.name: Nefarius's Corruption
currentQuests.description: Slay Nefarian and recover the Red Scepter Shard. Return the Red Scepter Shard to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris. You have 5 hours to complete this task.

currentQuests.name: Only One May Rise
currentQuests.description: Return the Head of the Broodlord Lashlayer to Baristolth of the Shifting Sands at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

currentQuests.name: Mea Culpa, Lord Valthalak
currentQuests.description: Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon Lord Valthalak. Dispatch him, and use Lord Valthalak's Amulet on the corpse. Then, return Lord Valthalak's Amulet to the Spirit of Lord Valthalak.

currentQuests.name: The Right Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
currentQuests.description: Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Mor Grayhoof and slay him. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the recombined Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.

currentQuests.name: The Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
currentQuests.description: Use the Brazier of Beckoning to summon forth the spirit of Mor Grayhoof and slay him. Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain with the Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet and the Brazier of Beckoning.

conditions.name: Left Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet

currentQuests.name: Blackhand's Command
currentQuests.description: That is one stupid orc. It would appear as if you need to find this brand and gain the Mark of Drakkisath in order to access the Orb of Command.$B$BThe letter indicates that General Drakkisath guards the brand. Perhaps you should investigate.

currentQuests.name: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay General Drakkisath. Gather his blood and return it to Rexxar.

conditions.name: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion

currentQuests.name: Oculus Illusions
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 20 Black Dragonspawn Eyes. Return to Myranda the Hag when the task is complete.

currentQuests.name: Drakefire Amulet
currentQuests.description: You must retrieve the Blood of the Black Dragon Champion from General Drakkisath. Drakkisath can be found in his throne room behind the Halls of Ascension in Blackrock Spire.

conditions.name: Blood of the Black Dragon Champion

currentQuests.name: The Matron Protectorate
currentQuests.description: Travel to Winterspring and find Haleh. Give her Awbee's scale.

currentQuests.name: The Demon Forge
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Goraluk Anvilcrack. Slay him and then use the Blood Stained Pike upon his corpse. After his soul has been siphoned, the pike will be Soul Stained.$B$BYou must also find the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate.$B$BReturn both the Soul Stained Pike and the Unforged Rune Covered Breastplate to Lorax in Winterspring.

currentQuests.name: General Drakkisath's Demise
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy General Drakkisath. Return to Marshal Maxwell when the job is done.

currentQuests.name: General Drakkisath's Command
currentQuests.description: Take General Drakkisath's Command to Marshal Maxwell in Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Maxwell's Mission
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy War Master Voone, Highlord Omokk, and Overlord Wyrmthalak. Return to Marshal Maxwell when the job is done.

currentQuests.name: Finkle Einhorn, At Your Service!
currentQuests.description: Talk to Malyfous Darkhammer in Everlook.

conditions.name: Glowing Hunk of the Beast's Flesh

currentQuests.name: Message to Maxwell
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Burning Steppes and give Bijou's Information to Marshal Maxwell.

currentQuests.name: Bijou's Belongings
currentQuests.description: Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. Good luck!

currentQuests.name: Bijou's Reconnaissance Report
currentQuests.description: Take Bijou's Reconnaissance Report back to Grandmaster Lexlort in Kargath.

currentQuests.name: Bijou's Belongings
currentQuests.description: Find Bijou's Belongings and return them to her. You recall her mentioning that she stashed them on the bottom floor of the city.

currentQuests.name: Operative Bijou
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find out what happened to Bijou.

currentQuests.name: For The Horde!
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and slay Warchief Rend Blackhand. Take his head and return to Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Tinkee Steamboil
currentQuests.description: Speak with Tinkee Steamboil.

currentQuests.name: Warlord's Command
currentQuests.description: Slay Highlord Omokk, War Master Voone, and Overlord Wyrmthalak. Recover Important Blackrock Documents. Return to Warlord Goretooth in Kargath when the mission has been accomplished.

currentQuests.name: Urok Doomhowl
currentQuests.description: Read Warosh's Scroll.  Bring Warosh's Mojo to Warosh.

currentQuests.name: Mother's Milk
currentQuests.description: In the heart of Blackrock Spire you will find Mother Smolderweb. Engage her and get her to poison you. Chances are good that you will have to kill her as well. Return to Ragged John when you are poisoned so that he can 'milk' you.

currentQuests.name: En-Ay-Es-Tee-Why
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and collect 15 Spire Spider Eggs for Kibler.$B$BBy the sound of it, these eggs could be found near spiders.

currentQuests.name: The Final Tablets
currentQuests.description: Bring the Fifth and Sixth Mosh'aru Tablets to Prospector Ironboot in Tanaris.

currentQuests.name: Vivian Lagrave and the Darkstone Tablet
currentQuests.description: Speak with Shadowmage Vivian Lagrave.

currentQuests.name: The Darkstone Tablet
currentQuests.description: Bring the Darkstone Tablet to Shadow Mage Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

currentQuests.name: Mayara Brightwing
currentQuests.description: Speak with Mayara Brightwing in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Delivery to Ridgewell
currentQuests.description: Bring Ridgewell's Crate to Remington Ridgewell in Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Doomrigger's Clasp
currentQuests.description: Bring Doomrigger's Clasp to Mayara Brightwing in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Seal of Ascension
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Wyrmbog in Dustwallow Marsh. Find the ancient drake, Emberstrife and beat him without mercy until his will is broken.$B$BIt is at that moment which you must place the Unforged Seal of Ascension before the great beast. You must then be quick to use the Orb of Draconic Energy on his weakened form and claim dominion over his mental faculties. Control the beast and force the Flames of the Black Dragonflight upon the Unforged Seal of Ascension!

currentQuests.name: Seal of Ascension
currentQuests.description: Find the three gemstones of command: The Gemstone of Smolderthorn, Gemstone of Spirestone, and Gemstone of Bloodaxe. Return them, along with the Unadorned Seal of Ascension, to Vaelan.$B$BThe Generals, as told to you by Vaelan, are: War Master Voone of the Smolderthorn; Highlord Omokk of the Spirestone; and Overlord Wyrmthalak  of the Bloodaxe.

currentQuests.name: Egg Collection
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Collected Dragon Eggs and the Collectronic Module to Tinkee Steamboil at Flame Crest in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Egg Freezing
currentQuests.description: Use the Eggscilloscope Prototype on an egg in the Rookery.

currentQuests.name: Kibler's Exotic Pets
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and find Bloodaxe Worg Pups. Use the cage to carry the ferocious little beasts. Bring back a Caged Worg Pup to Kibler.

currentQuests.name: The Pack Mistress
currentQuests.description: Slay Halycon, pack mistress of the Bloodaxe worg.

currentQuests.name: Put Her Down
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Spire and destroy the source of the worg menace. As you left Helendis, he shouted a name: Halycon. It is what the orcs refer to in regards to the worg.

currentQuests.name: Return to Bodley
currentQuests.description: Return to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain and give him the Brazier of Beckoning.

currentQuests.name: Final Preparations
currentQuests.description: Gather 40 Blackrock Bracers and acquire a Flask of Supreme Power. Return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: More Components of Importance
currentQuests.description: Obtain Soul Ashes of the Banished and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: More Components of Importance
currentQuests.description: Retrieve a Brilliant Sword of Zealotry and return it to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: More Components of Importance
currentQuests.description: Acquire Druidical Remains and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: More Components of Importance
currentQuests.description: Acquire a Starbreeze Village Relic and return it to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: Components of Importance
currentQuests.description: Obtain Soul Ashes of the Banished and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: Components of Importance
currentQuests.description: Retrieve a Brilliant Sword of Zealotry and return it to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: Components of Importance
currentQuests.description: Acquire a Starbreeze Village Relic and return it to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: Components of Importance
currentQuests.description: Acquire Druidical Remains and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: Three Kings of Flame
currentQuests.description: Gather the Incendicite of Incendius, the Ember of Emberseer and the Cinder of Cynders, along with a Hallowed Brazier, and return them to Bodley inside Blackrock Mountain.

currentQuests.name: Bodley's Unfortunate Fate
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Mountain and use the Extra-Dimensional Ghost Revealer to find Bodley near Blackrock Spire.

currentQuests.name: Overmaster Pyron
currentQuests.description: Slay Overmaster Pyron and return to Jalinda Sprig.$B$BYou recall Jalinda talking about Pyron guarding the quarry. Perhaps you should search there?

currentQuests.name: Disharmony of Flame
currentQuests.description: Travel to the quarry in Blackrock Mountain and slay Overmaster Pyron. Return to Thunderheart when you have completed this assignment.

currentQuests.name: The Challenge
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Ring of the Law in Blackrock Depths and place the Banner of Provocation in its center as you are sentenced by High Justice Grimstone.  Slay Theldren and his gladiators and return to Anthion Harmon in the Eastern Plaguelands with the first piece of Lord Valthalak's amulet.

conditions.name: Top Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet

currentQuests.name: A Binding Contract
currentQuests.description: Turn the Thorium Brotherhood Contract in to Lokhtos Darkbargainer if you would like to receive the plans for Sulfuron.

currentQuests.name: The Last Element
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and recover 10 Essence of the Elements. Your first inclination is to search the golems and golem makers. You remember Vivian Lagrave also muttering something about elementals.

currentQuests.name: The Princess's Surprise
currentQuests.description: Return to Ironforge and speak with King Magni Bronzebeard.

currentQuests.name: The Fate of the Kingdom
currentQuests.description: Return to Blackrock Depths and rescue Princess Moira Bronzebeard from the evil clutches of Emperor Dagran Thaurissan.

currentQuests.name: The Bearer of Bad News
currentQuests.description: Return to Ironforge and deliver the bad news to King Magni Bronzebeard.

currentQuests.name: Kharan's Tale
currentQuests.description: Listen as Kharan Mighthammer tells his story.

currentQuests.name: Kharan Mighthammer
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and find Kharan Mighthammer.$B$BThe King mentioned that Kharan was being held prisoner there - perhaps you should try looking for a prison.

currentQuests.name: Yuka Screwspigot
currentQuests.description: Speak with Yuka Screwspigot in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Jail Break!
currentQuests.description: Help Marshal Windsor get his gear back and free his friends. Return to Marshal Maxwell if you succeed.

currentQuests.name: The Good Stuff
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and recover 20 Dark Iron Fanny Packs. Return to Oralius when you have completed this task. You assume that the Dark Iron dwarves inside Blackrock Depths carry these 'fanny pack' contraptions.

currentQuests.name: A Shred of Hope
currentQuests.description: Return Marshal Windsor's Lost Information.$B$BMarshal Windsor believes that the information is being held by Golem Lord Argelmach and General Angerforge.

currentQuests.name: A Crumpled Up Note
currentQuests.description: You may have just stumbled on to something that Marshal Windsor would be interested in seeing. There may be hope, after all.

currentQuests.name: Incendius!
currentQuests.description: Find Lord Incendius in Blackrock Depths and destroy him!

currentQuests.name: Abandoned Hope
currentQuests.description: Give Marshal Maxwell the bad news.

currentQuests.name: Marshal Windsor
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Mountain in the northwest and enter Blackrock Depths. Find out what became of Marshal Windsor.$B$BYou recall Ragged John talking about Windsor being dragged off to a prison.

currentQuests.name: The Love Potion
currentQuests.description: Bring 4 Gromsblood, 10 Giant Silver Veins and Nagmara's Filled Vial to Mistress Nagmara in Blackrock Depths.

currentQuests.name: Ribbly Screwspigot
currentQuests.description: Bring Ribbly's Head to Yuka Screwspigot in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Lost Thunderbrew Recipe
currentQuests.description: Bring the Lost Thunderbrew Recipe to Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

currentQuests.name: Vivian Lagrave
currentQuests.description: Speak with Shadowmaster Vivian Lagrave in Kargath.

currentQuests.name: Operation: Death to Angerforge
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and slay General Angerforge! Return to Warlord Goretooth when the task is complete.

currentQuests.name: Ragnar Thunderbrew
currentQuests.description: Speak with Ragnar Thunderbrew.

currentQuests.name: Hurley Blackbreath
currentQuests.description: Bring the Lost Thunderbrew Recipe to Ragnar Thunderbrew in Kharanos.

currentQuests.name: The Heart of the Mountain
currentQuests.description: Bring the Heart of the Mountain to Maxwort Uberglint in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Grark Lorkrub
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Burning Steppes and find Grark Lorkrub. You recall Lexlort mentioning that he was last seen in a massive Blackrock fortress.$B$BWhen you find Grark Lorkrub, use the Thorium Shackles to bind him and then lead him back through Blackrock Mountain to the Searing Gorge. Lexlort will have his men waiting on the other side to take Grark into custody.

currentQuests.name: Precarious Predicament
currentQuests.description: Escort your prisoner, Grark Lorkrub, through Burning Steppes and through Blackrock Mountain to the Searing Gorge.$B$BYou recall Lexlort mentioning that he would have his men waiting on the other side to take Grark into custody.$B$BYou will also be required to hand over your Thorium Shackles to Lexlort.

currentQuests.name: KILL ON SIGHT: High Ranking Dark Iron Officials
currentQuests.description: Venture to Blackrock Depths and destroy the vile aggressors!$B$BWarlord Goretooth wants you to kill 10 Anvilrage Medics, 10 Anvilrage Soldiers and 10 Anvilrage Officers. Return to him once your task is complete.

currentQuests.name: KILL ON SIGHT: Dark Iron Dwarves
currentQuests.description: Venture to Blackrock Depths and destroy the vile aggressors!$B$BWarlord Goretooth wants you to kill 15 Anvilrage Guardsmen, 10 Anvilrage Wardens and 5 Anvilrage Footmen. Return to him once your task is complete.$B$B

currentQuests.name: The Rise of the Machines
currentQuests.description: Find and slay Golem Lord Argelmach. Return his head to Lotwil. You will also need to collect 10 Intact Elemental Cores from the Ragereaver Golems and Warbringer Constructs protecting Argelmach. You know this because you are psychic.

currentQuests.name: A Taste of Flame
currentQuests.description: Travel to Blackrock Depths and slay Bael'Gar.$B$BYou only know that the giant resides inside Blackrock Depths. Remember to use the Altered Black Dragonflight Molt on Bael'Gar's remains to capture the Fiery Essence.$B$BReturn the Encased Fiery Essence to Cyrus Therepentous.$B$B

currentQuests.name: The Princess Saved?
currentQuests.description: Return to Thrall!

currentQuests.name: The Royal Rescue
currentQuests.description: Slay Emperor Dagran Thaurissan and free Princess Moira Bronzebeard from his evil spell.

currentQuests.name: The Eastern Kingdom
currentQuests.description: Speak with Thrall if you are prepared to take on the mission he has planned.

currentQuests.name: What Is Going On?
currentQuests.description: Speak with Kharan Mighthammer and gather information about Princess Moira Bronzebeard's kidnapping. Take that information to Thrall in Orgrimmar.$B$BYou recall Gor'shak mentioning that Kharan is being held in a cell nearby.

currentQuests.name: What Is Going On?
currentQuests.description: Defend Gor'shak.

currentQuests.name: Commander Gor'shak
currentQuests.description: Find Commander Gor'shak in Blackrock Depths.$B$BYou recall that the crudely drawn picture of the orc included bars drawn over the portrait. Perhaps you should search for a prison of some sort.

currentQuests.name: Disharmony of Fire
currentQuests.description: Enter Blackrock Depths and track down Lord Incendius. Slay him and return any source of information you may find to Thunderheart.

currentQuests.name: Dark Iron Legacy
currentQuests.description: Slay Fineous Darkvire and recover the great hammer, Ironfel. Take Ironfel to the Shrine of Thaurissan and place it on the statue of Franclorn Forgewright.

currentQuests.name: Dark Iron Legacy
currentQuests.description: Speak with Franclorn Forgewright if you are interested in obtaining a key to the city major.

currentQuests.name: Amongst the Ruins
currentQuests.description: Bring the Fathom Core to Je'neu Sancrea at Zoram'gar Outpost, Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: Allegiance to the Old Gods
currentQuests.description: Kill Lorgus Jett in Blackfathom Deeps and then return to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: Allegiance to the Old Gods
currentQuests.description: Bring the Damp Note to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: The Essence of Aku'Mai
currentQuests.description: Bring 20 Sapphires of Aku'Mai to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: Trouble in the Deeps
currentQuests.description: Speak to Je'neu Sancrea in Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: Blackfathom Villainy
currentQuests.description: Bring the head of Twilight Lord Kelris to Bashana Runetotem in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Researching the Corruption
currentQuests.description: Gershala Nightwhisper in Auberdine wants 8 Corrupt Brain stems.

currentQuests.name: Blackfathom Villainy
currentQuests.description: Bring the head of Twilight Lord Kelris to Dawnwatcher Selgorm in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Twilight Falls
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Twilight Pendants to Argent Guard Manados in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: In Search of Thaelrid
currentQuests.description: Seek out Argent Guard Thaelrid in Blackfathom Deeps.

currentQuests.name: Knowledge in the Deeps
currentQuests.description: Bring the Lorgalis Manuscript to Gerrig Bonegrip in the Forlorn Cavern in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: The Pocked Black Box
currentQuests.description: Take this box to Kravel.

currentQuests.name: The Rise of the Machines
currentQuests.description: Take the Elemental Shard Sample to Lotwil Veriatus.$B$BYou recall Theodora saying that Lotwil was stationed in a camp to the east.

currentQuests.name: Dreadmaul Rock
currentQuests.description: Venture forth to the Burning Steppes and find out what became of Sha'ni Proudtusk.

currentQuests.name: Replacement Phial
currentQuests.description: Bring a Mana Potion, Coal, and Sweet Nectar to Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge to get a replacement for Talvash's Phial of Scrying.

currentQuests.name: Power Stones
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Dentrium Power Stones and 8 An'Alleum Power Stones to Rigglefuzz in the Badlands.

currentQuests.name: The Lost Dwarves
currentQuests.description: Find Baelog in Uldaman.

currentQuests.name: Reclaimed Treasures
currentQuests.description: Get Patrick Garrett's family treasure from their family chest in the South Common Hall of Uldaman, and bring it to him in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Necklace Recovery, Take 3
currentQuests.description: Visit Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath to see if he was successful.

currentQuests.name: Deliver the Gems
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Necklace and Gem Salvage to Dran Droffers in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Find the Gems and Power Source
currentQuests.description: Recover all three gems and a power source for the necklace from Uldaman, and then bring them to Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath.  Jarkal believes a power source might be found on the strongest construct present in Uldaman.$B$BFrom the journal, you know...$B* The ruby has been stashed in a barricaded Shadowforge area.$B* The topaz has been hidden in an urn in one of the Trogg areas, near some Alliance dwarves.$B* The sapphire has been claimed by Grimlok, the trogg leader.

currentQuests.name: Translating the Journal
currentQuests.description: Let Jarkal borrow the necklace.  In exchange, he will translate the journal for you.

currentQuests.name: Translating the Journal
currentQuests.description: Find someone who can translate the paladin's journal.  The closest location that might have someone is Kargath, in the Badlands.

currentQuests.name: Necklace Recovery, Take 2
currentQuests.description: Find a clue as to the gems' whereabouts in the depths of Uldaman.

currentQuests.name: Necklace Recovery
currentQuests.description: Look for a valuable necklace within the Uldaman dig site and bring it back to Dran Droffers in Orgrimmar.  The necklace may be damaged.

currentQuests.name: The Platinum Discs
currentQuests.description: Take the miniature version of the Discs of Norgannon to the one of the sages in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: The Platinum Discs
currentQuests.description: Take the miniature version of the Discs of Norgannon to the Explorers' League in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: The Platinum Discs
currentQuests.description: Speak with stone watcher and learn what ancient lore it keeps.  Once you have learned what lore it has to offer, activate the Discs of Norgannon.

currentQuests.name: Badlands Reagent Run
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Buzzard Gizzards, 10 Crag Coyote Fangs, and  5 Rock Elemental Shards to Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath, Badlands.

currentQuests.name: The Hidden Chamber
currentQuests.description: Read Baelog's Journal, explore the hidden chamber, then report to Prospector Stormpike.

currentQuests.name: Restoring the Necklace
currentQuests.description: Obtain a power source from the most powerful construct you can find in Uldaman, and deliver it to Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Uldaman Reagent Run
currentQuests.description: Bring 12 Magenta Fungus Caps to Jarkal Mossmeld in Kargath.

currentQuests.name: Find the Gems
currentQuests.description: Find the ruby, sapphire, and topaz that are scattered throughout Uldaman.  Once acquired, contact Talvash del Kissel remotely by using the Phial of Scrying he previously gave you.$B$BFrom the journal, you know...$B* The ruby has been stashed in a barricaded Shadowforge area.$B* The topaz has been hidden in an urn in one of the Trogg areas, near some Alliance dwarves.$B$B* The sapphire has been claimed by Grimlok, the trogg leader.

currentQuests.name: Back to Uldaman
currentQuests.description: Search for clues as to the current disposition of Talvash's necklace within Uldaman.  The slain paladin he mentioned was the person who had it last.

currentQuests.name: Lore for a Price
currentQuests.description: Bring five silver bars to Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: The Shattered Necklace
currentQuests.description: Search for the original creator of the shattered necklace to learn of its potential value.

currentQuests.name: Report to Helgrum
currentQuests.description: Bring Neeka's Report to Helgrum the Swift in Stonard.

currentQuests.name: Coyote Thieves
currentQuests.description: Bring 30 Coyote Jawbones to Neeka Bloodscar in Kargath.

currentQuests.name: Reclaimed Treasures
currentQuests.description: Get Krom Stoutarm's treasured possession from his chest in the North Common Hall of Uldaman, and bring it to him in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: The Lost Tablets of Will
currentQuests.description: Find the Tablet of Will, and return them to Advisor Belgrum in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Broken Alliances
currentQuests.description: Use the Sign of the Earth to activate the Pillars of Diamond, Opal, and Amethyst and obtain the Runestones.$b$bPlace the runestones in the Seal of the Earth to free Blacklash and Hematus.$b$bSlay them and return Blacklash's Bindings, the Chains of Hematus, and the Sign of the Earth to Gorn.

currentQuests.name: Broken Alliances
currentQuests.description: Kill Boss Tho'grun and bring the Sign of the Earth to Gorn in Kargath.

currentQuests.name: This Is Going to Be Hard
currentQuests.description: Defeat the Fam'retor Guardian and bring Lotwil's Shackles of Elemental Binding back to Lotwil Veriatus.

currentQuests.name: This Is Going to Be Hard
currentQuests.description: Bring Cog #5 to Lotwil Veriatus.

currentQuests.name: Murdaloc
currentQuests.description: Slay Agmond's killer, Murdaloc.$B$BSlay 12 Stonevault Bonesnappers.$B$BReport to Prospector Ironband in Loch Modan.

currentQuests.description: Find Agmond.

currentQuests.description: Bring Yagyin's Digest to Theldurin.

currentQuests.name: Empty Stables
currentQuests.description: Locate a Frostwolf in Alterac Valley. Use the Frostwolf Muzzle when you are near the Frostwolf to 'tame' the beast. Once tamed, the Frostwolf will follow you back to the Frostwolf Stable Master. Speak with the Frostwolf Stable Master to earn credit for the capture.

currentQuests.name: Irondeep Supplies
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Irondeep Supplies to the Horde Quartermaster in Frostwolf Keep.

currentQuests.name: Coldtooth Supplies
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Coldtooth Supplies to the Alliance Quartermaster in Dun Baldar.

currentQuests.name: Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye
currentQuests.description: Recover Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye from the Winterax caves and return it to Master Ryson.$B$BBe warned, it is said that Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye carries with it a terrible curse!

currentQuests.name: Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye
currentQuests.description: Recover Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye from the Winterax caves and return it to Master Ryson.$B$BBe warned, it is said that Master Ryson's All Seeing Eye carries with it a terrible curse!

currentQuests.name: Coldtooth Supplies
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Coldtooth Supplies to the Horde Quatermaster in Frostwolf Keep.

currentQuests.name: Irondeep Supplies
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Irondeep Supplies to the Alliance Quartermaster in Dun Baldar.

currentQuests.name: Stormpike's Deciphering
currentQuests.description: Take the Ensorcelled Parchment to Prospector Stormpike in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: The Ensorcelled Parchment
currentQuests.description: Take the Ensorcelled Parchment to Loremaster Dibbs in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Dark Council
currentQuests.description: Kill 4 Argus Shadow Mages.$B$BBring the Head of Nagaz to Magistrate Maleb in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Valik
currentQuests.description: Bring a mug of Southshore Stout to Valik in the Syndicate camp.

currentQuests.name: Further Mysteries
currentQuests.description: Bring the Decrypted Letter to Magistrate Maleb in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Baron's Demise
currentQuests.description: Bring the Head of Baron Vardus to Magistrate Maleb in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Assassin's Contract
currentQuests.description: Bring the Assassin's Contract to Magistrate Maleb in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Letter to Stormpike
currentQuests.description: Take the Cleverly Encrypted Letter to Prospector Stormpike in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Noble Deaths
currentQuests.description: Bring 7 Alterac Signet Rings to Magistrate Maleb in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Encrypted Letter
currentQuests.description: Bring the Encrypted Letter to Loremaster Dibbs in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Foreboding Plans
currentQuests.description: Bring the Foreboding Plans to Magistrate Maleb in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Syndicate Assassins
currentQuests.description: Kill 12 Syndicate Footpads and 8 Syndicate Thieves, then return to Magistrate Henry Maleb in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Crushridge Warmongers
currentQuests.description: Slay 15 Crushridge Warmongers, then return to Marshal Redpath in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: Crushridge Bounty
currentQuests.description: Gather 9 Dirty Knucklebones from Crushridge ogres in the Alterac Mountains.  Bring them to Marshal Redpath in Southshore.

currentQuests.name: The Savior of Kalimdor
currentQuests.description: Take the Eye of C'Thun to Anachronos at the Caverns of Time.

currentQuests.name: C'Thun's Legacy
currentQuests.description: Take the Eye of C'Thun to Caelastrasz in the Temple of Ahn'Qiraj.

currentQuests.name: The Fall of Ossirian
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Head of Ossirian the Unscarred to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

currentQuests.name: Imperial Qiraji Regalia
currentQuests.description: Merithra of the Dream in the Temple of Ahn'Qiraj will create Elementium Infused Armaments for you should you bring her Imperial Qiraji Regalia and 3 Elementium Ore.

currentQuests.name: Imperial Qiraji Armaments
currentQuests.description: Arygos in the Temple of Ahn'Qiraj will create Elementium Infused Armaments for you should you bring him Imperial Qiraji Armaments and 3 Elementium Ore.

currentQuests.name: Secrets of the Qiraji
currentQuests.description: Take the Ancient Qiraji Artifact to the dragons hiding near the entrance of the temple.

currentQuests.name: Drape of Unyielding Strength
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Qiraji Martial Drape, 2 Onyx Idols, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Keyl Swiftclaw in Silithus.  You must also obtain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: Signet of Unyielding Strength
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Qiraji Magisterial Ring, 2 Lambent Idols, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Windcaller Yessendra in Silithus.  You must also attain Honored reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

currentQuests.name: The Stolen Tome
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Powers of the Void for Drusilla La Salle.

currentQuests.name: Mission: Possible But Not Probable
currentQuests.description: Steal Silixiz's Tower Key from Foreman Silixiz, then kill two Mutated Venture Co. Drones, two Venture Co. Patrollers, and two Venture Co. Lookouts.$B$BAssassinate Grand Foreman Gallywix and take his head, then pick the lock on Gallywix's lockbox and steal the Cache of Zanzil's Altered Mixture. Take the Cache and Gallywix's Head back to Shenthul in Orgrimmar for further instruction.

currentQuests.name: A Warden of the Horde
currentQuests.description: Return your ward to the Orgrimmar orphanage by handing in the Orcish Orphan Whistle to Orphan Matron Battlewail in the Valley of Honor.

currentQuests.name: The Binding
currentQuests.description: Using the Heartswood Core, summon and subdue a succubus, then return the Heartswood Core to Gakin the Darkbinder in the Slaughtered Lamb.

currentQuests.name: Dangerous Love
currentQuests.description: Get a Guardian's Moldy Card and bring it to Fenstad Argyle in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Winter's Presents
currentQuests.description: Speak with Greatfather Winter. He is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: The Alliance Needs Your Help!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Field Marshal Snowfall in Ironforge's Military Ward.

currentQuests.name: The Alliance Needs Your Help!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Field Marshal Snowfall in Ironforge's Military Ward.

currentQuests.name: Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian
currentQuests.description: Anachronos at the Caverns of Time in Tanaris wants you to take Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian to Stratholme and use it on Consecrated Earth. Defeat the entity that is exorcised from the staff and return to him.

currentQuests.name: The Lunar Festival
currentQuests.description: Talk to the Lunar Festival Harbinger in the entrance to the Undercity. You can also talk to Lunar Festival Harbingers in other capital cities.

currentQuests.name: Dancing for Marzipan
currentQuests.description: Do a dance emote at Innkeeper Pala, and in exchange you'll receive Thunder Bluff Marzipan!

currentQuests.name: Flexing for Nougat
currentQuests.description: Do a flex emote at Innkeeper Gryshka, and in exchange you'll receive Orgrimmar Nougat!

currentQuests.name: Incoming Gumdrop
currentQuests.description: Do a train emote at Kali Remik, and in exchange you'll receive a Darkspear Gumdrop!

currentQuests.name: Dancing for Marzipan
currentQuests.description: Do a dance emote at Innkeeper Saelienne, and in exchange you'll receive Darnassus Marzipan!

currentQuests.name: Flexing for Nougat
currentQuests.description: Do a flex emote at Innkeeper Allison, and in exchange you'll receive Stormwind Nougat!

currentQuests.name: Chicken Clucking for a Mint
currentQuests.description: Do a chicken emote at Innkeeper Norman, and in exchange you'll receive an Undercity Mint!

currentQuests.name: Chicken Clucking for a Mint
currentQuests.description: Do a chicken emote at Innkeeper Firebrew, and in exchange you'll receive an Ironforge Mint!

currentQuests.name: Incoming Gumdrop
currentQuests.description: Do a train emote at Talvash del Kissel, and in exchange you'll receive a Gnomeregan Gumdrop!

currentQuests.name: Thunderaan the Windseeker
currentQuests.description: To free Thunderaan the Windseeker from his prison, you must present the right and left halves of the Bindings of the Windseeker, 10 bars of Elementium, and the Essence of the Firelord to Highlord Demitrian in Silithus.

currentQuests.name: Light's Hope Chapel
currentQuests.description: Deliver the Call to Arms Announcement to the Keeper of the Rolls at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Investigate the Scourge of Ironforge

currentQuests.description: Well then, it's settled; here are your supplies, $c. If you wish to do an additional exchange, then I am prepared to authorize it. Just give me the word and I'll make it happen.$B$BKeep up the good work, $N. We need all the materiel we can muster if we're going to win this thing. currentQuests.name: The Hero of the Day
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Deeprock Salt and 5 gold coins to any Holly Preserver machine, upon which you will receive 5 Preserved Holly.

currentQuests.description: Find Metzen the Reindeer.  Use the notes provided to you for clues as to where he is being held.$B$BWhen you find Metzen, have the Pouch of Reindeer Dust in your possession so you can sprinkle some of the dust on him; this should free Metzen from his bonds of captivity.$B$BReturn the Pouch of Reindeer Dust to Kaymard Copperpinch in Orgrimmar once Metzen is freed.

currentQuests.name: The Power of Pine
currentQuests.description: Use a Stink Bomb Cleaner to remove any Forsaken Stink Bomb that's been dropped on Southshore.  Return to Sergeant Hartman in Southshore when you're done.

Stinking Up Southshore

currentQuests.description: Touch the bonfires within Orgrimmar, Thunder Bluff, and the Undercity, then speak to a Festival Talespinner within the capital cities.

currentQuests.name: Fragmented Magic
currentQuests.description: Polymorph the Spitelash of Azshara and kill the clones that appear several seconds later.  When you have slain 50 Polymorph Clones, return to Archmage Xylem in Azshara.

currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Prismatic Shell for Archmage Xylem.  The Archmage resides in a tower atop the cliffs of Azshara.

currentQuests.name: Under the Shadow
currentQuests.description: Check your map to find an area under Scourge attack. Go there and damage a necropolis by defeating the Scourge around them. Return 10 of their Necrotic Runes to Commander Thomas Helleran at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Shadows of Doom
currentQuests.description: Go to a summoning circle and kill a Shadow of Doom, then return to Commander Thomas Helleran at Light's Hope Chapel in Eastern Plaguelands.

currentQuests.description: Slaughter the Shadowsworn in the Blasted Lands and return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

currentQuests.description: Kill 7 Helboar in the Blasted Lands and return to the Fallen Hero of the Horde.

currentQuests.name: Trolls of a Feather
currentQuests.description: Bring a total of 6 Voodoo Feathers from the trolls in sunken temple.

currentQuests.name: The Wrong Stuff
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Rotting Wood and 4 Bloodvenom Essence to Impsy in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Hot and Itchy
currentQuests.description: Bring a piece of felcloth to Impsy in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: An Imp's Request
currentQuests.description: Bring a piece of felcloth to Impsy in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Forging the Mightstone
currentQuests.description: Bring the voodoo feathers to Ashlam Valorfist.

currentQuests.name: A Troubled Spirit
currentQuests.description: Speak with the Fallen Hero of the Horde at the entrance to the Blasted Lands.

currentQuests.name: Inert Scourgestones
currentQuests.description: Bring the Inert Scourgestone to Commander Ashlan Valorfist in Chillwind Point.

currentQuests.name: Chillwind Point
currentQuests.description: Speak to Commander Ashlam Valorfist at Chillwind Camp.

currentQuests.name: Dispelling Evil
currentQuests.description: Collect 20 Minion's Scourgestones and bring them to High Priest Thel'danis in the Western Plaguelands.

currentQuests.name: Da Voodoo
currentQuests.description: Bring the voodoo feathers to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

currentQuests.name: Spirit Totem
currentQuests.description: Bring the pieces for the spirit totem to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

currentQuests.name: Mastering the Elements
currentQuests.description: Bring the elements earth, air, fire and water to Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

currentQuests.name: Elemental Mastery
currentQuests.description: Collect a sample of air, fire, earth and water for Bath'rah the Windwatcher.

currentQuests.name: Ruined Kegs
currentQuests.description: Return to Darkcaller Yanka at the Wickerman Festival in Tirisfal Glade.

currentQuests.name: Rotten Eggs
currentQuests.description: Place the Rotten Eggs in the main brew keg located inside the Southshore Inn.

currentQuests.name: Kitchen Assistance
currentQuests.description: Calandrath at Cenarion Hold needs a batch of 10 Smoked Desert Dumplings.

currentQuests.name: Sharing the Knowledge
currentQuests.description: Bring the Torn Recipe Page to Calandrath at the inn in Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: Hallow's End Treats for Spoops!
currentQuests.description: Speak with the innkeepers of Orgrimmar, Undercity, and Thunder Bluff, as well as Kali Remik in Sen'jin Village.  Perform the tricks they ask of you in exchange for the treats they offer.$B$BReturn to Spoops at the Orgrimmar Orphanage with a Thunder Bluff Marzipan, Darkspear Gumdrop, Orgrimmar Nougat, and Undercity Mint.

currentQuests.name: Hallow's End Treats for Jesper!
currentQuests.description: Speak with the innkeepers of Stormwind, Ironforge, and Darnassus, as well as Talvash del Kissel in Ironforge.  Perform the tricks they ask of you in exchange for the treats they offer.$B$BReturn to Jesper at the Stormwind Orphanage with a Darnassus Marzipan, Gnomeregan Gumdrop, Stormwind Nougat, and Ironforge Mint.

currentQuests.name: Desert Recipe
currentQuests.description: Look for information about cooking Sandworm Meat at the Twilight's Hammer camp west of Cenarion Hold.

currentQuests.name: The Darkreaver Menace
currentQuests.description: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth spirits you must fight.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver; defeat him.$B$BBring Darkreaver's Head to Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom, Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Blood of Morphaz
currentQuests.description: Kill Morphaz in the sunken temple of Atal'Hakkar, and return his blood to Greta Mosshoof in Felwood.  The entrance to the sunken temple can be found in the Swamp of Sorrows.

currentQuests.name: The Ichor of Undeath
currentQuests.description: Acquire an Ichor of Undeath for Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.

currentQuests.name: Of Coursers We Know
currentQuests.description: Acquire 4 Healthy Courser Glands and bring them to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.

currentQuests.name: Cenarion Aid
currentQuests.description: Seek out Ogtinc in Azshara.

currentQuests.name: Destroy Morphaz
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Arcane Shard from Morphaz and return to Archmage Xylem.

currentQuests.name: The Siren's Coral
currentQuests.description: Collect 6 Enchanted Coral and return them to Archmage Xylem.

currentQuests.name: Magic Dust
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Glittering Dust to Archmage Xylem.

currentQuests.name: Magecraft
currentQuests.description: Seek out Sanath Lim-yo and gain passage to see Archmage Xylem.

currentQuests.name: The Azure Key
currentQuests.description: Return the Azure Key to Lord Jorach Ravenholdt.

currentQuests.name: Encoded Fragments
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Encoded Fragments to Archmage Xylem in Azshara.

currentQuests.name: Sealed Azure Bag
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Sealed Azure Bag from the Timbermaw Shaman in Azshara.  Then take the bag to Archmage Xylem, also found in Azshara.

currentQuests.name: A Simple Request
currentQuests.description: Speak with Lord Jorach Ravenholdt in Ravenholdt Manor.

currentQuests.name: The Green Drake
currentQuests.description: Bring the Tooth of Morphaz to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.

currentQuests.name: Wavethrashing
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Wavethrasher Scales to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast the Ruins of Eldarath.

currentQuests.name: Could I get a Fishing Flier?
Could I get a Fishing Flier?
For Great Honor
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Marks of Honor, 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor and 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

currentQuests.name: Courser Antlers
currentQuests.description: Bring a pair of Perfect Courser Antlers to Ogtinc in Azshara.  Ogtinc resides atop the cliffs northeast of the Ruins of Eldarath.

currentQuests.name: The Hunter's Charm
currentQuests.description: Speak to Ogtinc in Azshara.

currentQuests.name: Honoring a Hero
currentQuests.description: Travel to Grom's Monument in the Demon Fall Canyon of Ashenvale and use Grom's Tribute at the base of the monument.  Return to Javnir Nashak outside Orgrimmar before the Harvest Festival is over.

currentQuests.name: Honoring a Hero
currentQuests.description: Travel to Uther's Tomb in Western Plaguelands and use Uther's Tribute at his statue, and then return to Wagner Hammerstrike outside Ironforge before the Harvest Festival is over.

currentQuests.name: Concerted Efforts
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Mark of Honor, 3 Arathi Basin Mark of Honor and 3 Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

currentQuests.name: Your Fortune Awaits You...
currentQuests.description: Travel to Palemane Rock in Mulgore and seek out your fortune.

currentQuests.name: Your Fortune Awaits You...
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Wailing Caverns in the Barrens and seek out your fortune.

currentQuests.name: Your Fortune Awaits You...
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Deadmines in Westfall and seek out your fortune.

currentQuests.name: Your Fortune Awaits You...
currentQuests.description: Travel to the Eastvale Logging Camp in Elwynn Forest and seek out your fortune.

currentQuests.name: Darkmoon Elementals Deck
currentQuests.description: Return the Elementals Deck to the Darkmoon Faire when it comes to town.

currentQuests.name: Darkmoon Warlords Deck
currentQuests.description: Return the Warlords Deck to the Darkmoon Faire when it comes to town.

currentQuests.name: Darkmoon Portals Deck
currentQuests.description: Return the Portals Deck to the Darkmoon Faire when it comes to town.

currentQuests.name: Darkmoon Beast Deck
currentQuests.description: Return the Beast Deck to the Darkmoon Faire when it comes to town.

currentQuests.name: Crocolisk Boy and the Bearded Murloc
Concerted Efforts
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Alterac Valley Mark of Honor, 3 Arathi Basin Mark of Honor and 3 Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

currentQuests.name: Rise, Thunderfury!
currentQuests.description: Present the Dormant Wind Kissed Blade to Highlord Demitrian.

currentQuests.name: Examine the Vessel
currentQuests.description: Examine the Vessel of Rebirth and return it to Highlord Demitrian.

currentQuests.name: Material Assistance
currentQuests.description: If you are interested in helping Sagorne Crestrider in Orgrimmar's Valley of Wisdom, bring him an Azerothian Diamond and a Pristine Black Diamond.

currentQuests.name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume III
currentQuests.description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

currentQuests.name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume II
currentQuests.description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

currentQuests.name: Enchanted Thorium Platemail: Volume I
currentQuests.description: Return the book to its rightful owners.

currentQuests.name: Grimand's Finest Work
currentQuests.description: Take the Arcanite Barding to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind's Cathedral District for his inspection.

currentQuests.name: Judgment and Redemption
currentQuests.description: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth the spirits you must judge.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver.  Defeat him and reclaim the lost soul of the fallen charger.$B$BGive the Charger's Redeemed Soul and the Blessed Enchanted Barding to Darkreaver's Fallen Charger.

currentQuests.name: The Divination Scryer
currentQuests.description: Bring an Azerothian Diamond and a Pristine Black Diamond to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Manna-Enriched Horse Feed
currentQuests.description: Retrieve 20 Enriched Manna Biscuits - the key ingredient in making Manna-Enriched Horse Feed - for Merideth Carlson at Southshore in the Hillsbrad Foothills.  The Argent Dawn is known as the sole purveyor of the biscuits.$B$BYou also need to give her 50 gold to soothe her ruffled sensibilities.

currentQuests.name: Blessed Arcanite Barding
currentQuests.description: Return with the Blessed Arcanite Barding to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Ancient Equine Spirit
currentQuests.description: Acquire special horse feed used for feeding a spirit horse.  Merideth Carlson in Southshore apparently is the source for such food.$B$BTravel to the Dire Maul dungeon in Feralas and slay Tendris Warpwood.  Doing so will free the Ancient Equine Spirit.  Feed it the special horse feed, thereby soothing the spirit.  Finally, give it the Arcanite Barding so it may bless it.

currentQuests.name: Collection of Goods
currentQuests.description: Bring 40 Runecloth, 6 Arcanite Bars, 10 Arthas' Tears, 5 Stratholme Holy Water vials, and 150 gold to Grimand Elmore in the Dwarven District of Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: The Work of Grimand Elmore
currentQuests.description: Speak with Grimand Elmore in Stormwind's Dwarven District.

currentQuests.name: Exorcising Terrordale
currentQuests.description: Use the Exorcism Censer to drive out the spirits that torment Terrordale.  When you have slain 25 Terrordale Spirits, return to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: To Show Due Judgment
currentQuests.description: Return the Exorcism Censer to Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in the Cathedral District of Stormwind.

currentQuests.name: Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker
currentQuests.description: Speak with Lord Grayson Shadowbreaker in Stormwind's Cathedral District.

currentQuests.name: Emphasis on Sacrifice
currentQuests.description: Travel to Ironforge and get High Priest Rohan's Exorcism Censer.  You will need to make a donation of 150 gold in order to secure it.

currentQuests.name: Stave of the Ancients
currentQuests.description: You must find and destroy these four demonic corrupters:$B$BSimone the Seductress.$B$BKlinfran the Crazed.$B$BSolenor the Slayer.$B$BArtorius the Doombringer.$B$BDestroy these creatures and return to Vartrus the Ancient in Felwood with their heads.$B$BRefer to the Petrified Bark in your inventory for clues as to their whereabouts.$B$BYou MUST complete this task by yourself.

currentQuests.name: A Proper String
currentQuests.description: Stoma the Ancient has asked that you bring him a Mature Black Dragon Sinew. Should you find this sinew, return it to Stoma in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Ancient Sinew Wrapped Lamina
currentQuests.description: Hastat the Ancient has asked that you bring him a Mature Blue Dragon Sinew. Should you find this sinew, return it to Hastat in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: The Ancient Leaf
currentQuests.description: Find the owner of the Ancient Petrified Leaf. Good luck, $N; It's a big world.

currentQuests.name: Dreadsteed of Xoroth
currentQuests.description: Read Mor'zul's Instructions.  Summon a Xorothian Dreadsteed, defeat it, then bind its spirit to you.

currentQuests.name: Arcanite
currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Arcanite Bars to Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Imp Delivery
currentQuests.description: Bring the Imp in a Jar to the alchemy lab in the Scholomance.  After the parchment is created, return the jar to Gorzeeki Wildeyes.

currentQuests.name: Doomsday Candle
currentQuests.description: Bring 35 Black Dragonscales to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Wheel of the Black March
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Large Brilliant Shards and 25 Dark Iron Ore to Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Bell of Dethmoora
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 Elixirs of Shadow Power to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Xorothian Stardust
currentQuests.description: Purchase Xorothian Stardust from Ur'dan.  Bring it to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Ulathek the Traitor
currentQuests.description: Confront Ulathek, then bring The Traitor's Heart to Lord Banehollow in Jaedenar.

currentQuests.name: Lord Banehollow
currentQuests.description: Purchase Shadowy Potions from Gorzeeki in the Burning Steppes.$B$BUse the potions to travel through Jaedenar, and speak with Lord Banehollow.

currentQuests.name: The Balance of Light and Shadow
currentQuests.description: Save 50 Peasants before 15 are slain. Speak with Eris Havenfire should you accomplish this task.$B$BYou may view the Death Post to view how many Peasants have been slain.

currentQuests.name: Kroshius' Infernal Core
currentQuests.description: Search Shatter Scar Vale in Felwood for the remains of Kroshius. When you locate the remains, use the Fel Fire near them and await Kroshius' return. When the infernal has awoken, slay him and take from his corpse Kroshius' Infernal Core.$B$BReturn Kroshius' Infernal Core to Niby the Almighty in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Flawless Fel Essence
currentQuests.description: Impsy in Felwood has asked that you bring him three Flawless Fel Essences originating from three distinct locations.$B$BThe Legashi Satyrs of Azshara hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region. The Jaedenar Legionnaires of Jaedenar hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region. The Felguard Sentries of the Blasted Lands hold the Flawless Fel Essence of their region.$B$BRecover the Flawless Fel Essences and return  to Impsy in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: What Niby Commands
currentQuests.description: Speak with Impsy in Felwood.

currentQuests.name: Suppression
currentQuests.description: Venture forth into the Tainted Scar and locate a Doomguard Commander.$B$BUse the Glowing Crystal Prison on the Doomguard Commander. Be prepared for a ferocious onslaught of attacks, as the demon attempts to escape capture.$B$BShould you succeed, return the Imprisoned Doomguard to Daio in the Tainted Scar.

currentQuests.name: The Prison's Casing
currentQuests.description: Travel to Darkwhisper Gorge in Winterspring and recover 5 Tears of the Hederine from the Hederine demons that occupy the gorge. Return to Daio in the Tainted Scar when you have completed this task.

currentQuests.name: The Prison's Bindings
currentQuests.description: Travel to Dire Maul in Feralas and recover 15 Satyr Blood from the Wildspawn Satyr that inhabit the Warpwood Quarter. Return to Daio in the Tainted Scar when this is done.

currentQuests.name: Wildeyes
currentQuests.description: Bring the Case of Blood to Gorzeeki Wildeyes in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Rage of Blood
currentQuests.description: Bring 30 bottles of Raging Beast's Blood to Mor'zul Bloodbringer in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Mor'zul Bloodbringer
currentQuests.description: Speak with Mor'zul Bloodbringer in the Burning Steppes.

currentQuests.name: Thunderaan the Windseeker
currentQuests.description: To free Thunderaan the Windseeker from his prison, you must present the right and left halves of the Bindings of the Wind Seeker, 10 bars of Elementium, and the Essence of the Firelord to Highlord Demitrian.

currentQuests.name: Soothing Turtle Bisque
currentQuests.description: Bring 10 pieces of Turtle Meat and some Soothing Spices to Christoph Jeffcoat in Tarren Mill.

currentQuests.name: The Feast of Winter Veil
currentQuests.description: Feel free to read the book, "The Feast of Winter Veil", to learn more about the holiday.  When you are finished with the book, deliver it to King Magni Bronzebeard in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: The Reason for the Season
currentQuests.description: Speak with Historian Karnik at the Explorer's League in Ironforge about the Feast of Winter Veil.

currentQuests.name: The Feast of Winter Veil
currentQuests.description: Feel free to read the book, "The Feast of Winter Veil", to learn more about the holiday.  When you are finished with the book, deliver it to Cairne Bloodhoof in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: A Smokywood Pastures Thank You!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Greatfather Winter in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: You're a Mean One...
currentQuests.description: Locate and return the Stolen Treats to Wulmort Jinglepocket in Ironforge.  It was last thought to be in the possession of the Abominable Greench, found somewhere in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Stolen Winter Veil Treats
currentQuests.description: Locate the Smokywood Pastures investigator that has gone missing in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Treats for Greatfather Winter
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Gingerbread Cookies and an Ice Cold Milk to Greatfather Winter in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Great-father Winter is Here!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Greatfather Winter is Here!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Greatfather Winter is Here!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Great-father Winter is Here!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: A Smokywood Pastures Thank You!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Great-father Winter in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: You're a Mean One...
currentQuests.description: Locate and return the Stolen Treats to Kaymard Copperpinch in Orgrimmar.  It was last thought to be in the possession of the Abominable Greench, found somewhere in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

currentQuests.name: The Reason for the Season
currentQuests.description: Speak with Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom of Orgrimmar about the Feast of Winter Veil.

currentQuests.name: Stolen Winter Veil Treats
currentQuests.description: Locate the Smokywood Pastures investigator that has gone missing in the snowy regions of the Alterac Mountains.

currentQuests.name: Treats for Great-father Winter
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Gingerbread Cookies and an Ice Cold Milk to Greatfather Winter in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Great-father Winter is Here!
currentQuests.description: Speak with Greatfather Winter; he is located near the Smokywood Pastures vendor area in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: The Manor, Ravenholdt
currentQuests.description: Take the Seal of Ravenholdt to Fahrad at Ravenholdt Manor, hidden away in the hills of Hillsbrad.$B$BYour cunning will be tested along the way. Be prepared.

currentQuests.name: Triage
currentQuests.description: Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.

currentQuests.name: Horde Trauma
currentQuests.description: Travel to Hammerfall in the Arathi Highlands and speak with Doctor Gregory Victor about joining the ranks of Horde Trauma.

currentQuests.name: Triage
currentQuests.description: Save patients by using Triage Bandages to tend to their wounds. You must save 15 patients before 6 of them die from their injuries.$B$BRemember the order of triage! Critically Injured Soldiers die the fastest followed by Badly Injured Soldiers. Injured Soldiers take the longest to die and should be saved AFTER your Critically Injured and Badly Injured Soldiers have been triaged.

currentQuests.name: Alliance Trauma
currentQuests.description: Travel to Theramore in the Dustwallow Marsh and speak with Doctor Gustaf VanHowzen about joining the ranks of Alliance Trauma.

currentQuests.name: I Know A Guy...
currentQuests.description: Travel to Gadgetzan in the Tanaris desert and speak with Dirge Quikcleave about advancing your cooking career.

currentQuests.name: To Gadgetzan You Go!
currentQuests.description: Travel to Gadgetzan in the Tanaris desert and speak with Dirge Quikcleave about advancing your cooking career.

currentQuests.name: Clamlette Surprise
currentQuests.description: Dirge Quikcleave wants you to get the following items:$B$B12 Giant Eggs. You will find those on the Rocs wandering Tanaris or any other species of large bird.$B$B10 pieces of Zesty Clam Meat. You can find those in clams, naturally!$B$B20 pieces of Alterac Swiss. Get thee to a cheesery!$B$BGather all of the items and return to Dirge.

currentQuests.name: I Got Nothin' Left!
currentQuests.description: Travel to Kalimdor, to the coastal city of Theramore. From there you must search for an island, south of the main town. Nat Pagle awaits your arrival!

currentQuests.name: You Too Good!
currentQuests.description: You think Lumak is trying to tell you that he can no longer help you improve your fishing skill. You may want to try to find his friend, Nat Pagle, a human fishing off one of the islands south of Theramore (at least that's what you think Lumak said).

currentQuests.name: Nat Pagle, Angler Extreme
currentQuests.description: Nat Pagle wants you to catch the following fish:$B$BMisty Reed Mahi Mahi from the Misty Reed Strand in the Swamp of Sorrows.$B$BA Sar'theris Striker from the Sar'theris Strand in Desolace.$B$BFeralas Ahi from the Verdantis River of Feralas.$B$BSavage Coast Blue Sailfin from the Savage Coast of Stranglethorn Vale.$B$BReturn to Nat Pagle when you have reeled them all in!

currentQuests.name: The Darkreaver Menace
currentQuests.description: Use the Divination Scryer in the heart of the Great Ossuary's basement in the Scholomance.  Doing so will bring forth spirits you must fight.  Defeating these spirits will summon forth Death Knight Darkreaver; defeat him.$B$BBring Darkreaver's Head to Sagorne Creststrider in the Valley of Wisdom, Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Power over Poison
currentQuests.description: Return to Turak Runetotem on the Elder Rise, Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Curing the Sick
currentQuests.description: Use the Curative Animal Salve on 10 Sickly Gazelles that are located throughout the northern part of the Barrens; doing so should cure them.  Sickly Gazelles have been reported north of the east-west road that runs through the Crossroads.

currentQuests.name: Gathering the Cure
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Earthroot and 5 Kodo Horns to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads so he may make a curative salve.

currentQuests.name: The Principal Source
currentQuests.description: Use the Empty Dreadmist Peak Sampler to draw a sample of water from a pool at the top of the peak.$B$BDeliver the Filled Dreadmist Peak Sampler to Tonga Runetotem at the Crossroads, Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Lessons Anew
currentQuests.description: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

currentQuests.name: Power over Poison
currentQuests.description: Return to Mathrengyl Bearwalker in the Cenarion Enclave, Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Curing the Sick
currentQuests.description: Use the Curative Animal Salve on 10 Sickly Deer that are located throughout Darkshore; doing so should cure them.  Sickly Deer have been reported starting south of the Cliffspring River to the north of Auberdine and extending all the way into southern Darkshore where the edge of Ashenvale begins.

currentQuests.name: Gathering the Cure
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Earthroot and 12 Lunar Funguses to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine so she may make a curative salve.

currentQuests.name: The Principal Source
currentQuests.description: Use the Empty Cliffspring Falls Sampler to draw a sample of water from the mouth of the cave by the falls.$B$BDeliver the Filled Cliffspring Falls Sampler to Alanndarian Nightsong in Auberdine, Darkshore.

currentQuests.name: Lessons Anew
currentQuests.description: Travel to Moonglade and speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven.

currentQuests.name: Training the Beast
currentQuests.description: Speak to Jocaste in the Cenarion Enclave, in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Taming the Beast
currentQuests.description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Strigid Screecher. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Dazalar in Dolanaar.

currentQuests.name: Taming the Beast
currentQuests.description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Nightsaber Stalker. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Dazalar in Dolanaar.

currentQuests.name: Training the Beast
currentQuests.description: Speak with Holt Thunderhorn on Hunter Rise in Thunder Bluff.

currentQuests.name: Taming the Beast
currentQuests.description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Swoop. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Taming the Beast
currentQuests.description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Prairie Stalker. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Yaw Sharpmane in Bloodhoof Village.

currentQuests.name: Training the Beast
currentQuests.description: Speak with Belia Thundergranite in Ironforge.

currentQuests.name: Taming the Beast
currentQuests.description: Use the Taming Rod to tame an Ice Claw Bear. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

currentQuests.name: Taming the Beast
currentQuests.description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Snow Leopard. Practice your skills, then return to Grif Wildheart in Kharanos.

currentQuests.name: Taming the Beast
currentQuests.description: Use the Taming Rod to tame a Surf Crawler. Practice your skills, then return the Taming Rod to Thotar at Razor Hill.

currentQuests.name: Taming the Beast
currentQuests.description: Use the Taming Rod to tame an Armored Scorpid. Practice your skills, then return to Thotar at Razor Hill.

currentQuests.name: Training the Beast
currentQuests.description: Speak with Ormak Grimshot in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: The Hunter's Path

currentQuests.name: Tribal Leatherworking
currentQuests.description: Bring a Wild Leather Vest and a Wild Leather Helmet to Se'Jib in Stranglethorn Vale.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Tribal Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Elemental Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

currentQuests.name: Elemental Leatherworking
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Heart of Fire, 2 Globe of Water, 2 Core of Earth, and 2 Breath of Wind to Brumn Winterhoof in the Arathi Mountains.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Elemental Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

currentQuests.name: Dragonscale Leatherworking
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Tough Scorpid Breastplates, 2 Tough Scorpid Gloves, and 10 Worn Dragonscales to Thorkaf Dragoneye in the Badlands.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Dragonscale Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Elemental Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

currentQuests.name: Elemental Leatherworking
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Heart of Fire, 2 Globe of Water, 2 Core of Earth, and 2 Breath of Wind to Sarah Tanner in Searing Gorge.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Elemental Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Tribal Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

currentQuests.name: Tribal Leatherworking
currentQuests.description: Bring a Wild Leather Vest and a Wild Leather Helmet to Caryssia Moonhunter in Feralas.$B$BCompleting this quest will give you access to the Tribal Leatherworking arts.$B$BThe completion of this quest will prevent you from learning Dragonscale Leatherworking and Elemental Leatherworking; be sure this is the path you wish to follow before doing so.

currentQuests.description: Tormus Deepforge  wants you to bring 4 Runed Copper Belts and 4 Heavy Copper Mauls to Verner Osgood in Redridge.

currentQuests.description: Bring 3 Feather Charms to Alamar Grimm in Anvilmar.

currentQuests.name: Vile Familiars
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Vile Familiar Heads to Ruzan.

currentQuests.name: Moonglow Vest
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Embossed Leather Gloves, 5 Embossed Leather Boots and 5 Embossed Leather Cloaks to Lotherias in Darnassus.

currentQuests.name: Elixirs for the Bladeleafs
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Elixirs of Lion's Strength and 2 Elixirs of Minor Defense to Syral Bladeleaf in Dolanaar.

currentQuests.name: Electropellers

currentQuests.name: Gaffer Jacks
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Gaffer Jacks to Wizbang Cranktoggle in Auberdine.

currentQuests.name: Supplying the Front
currentQuests.description: Bring 6 Copper Axes and 6 Copper Chain Belts to Thorvald in the southern guard tower of Loch Modan.

currentQuests.name: The Stonewrought Dam
currentQuests.description: Take the orphan to the Stonewrought Dam in Loch Modan.  You should take him to the middle of the dam so he can see out over the giant waterfall.

currentQuests.name: Call of Water (Part 3)
currentQuests.description: Fill the Empty Red Waterskin at the well in Tarren Mill and return to Brine in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Call of Water (Part 2)
currentQuests.description: Fill the Empty Brown Waterskin at the watering hole below Brine's hut and return it to her in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Call of Water (Part 4)
currentQuests.description: Fill the Empty Blue Waterskin at the Ruins of Stardust in Ashenvale and return to Brine in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Call of Air
currentQuests.description: Find Prate Cloudseer in Thousand Needles.
