currentQuests.description: Bring the Torch of Eternal Flame to Kranal Fiss in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Call of Fire
currentQuests.description: Defeat the Minor Manifestation of Fire, and place the Glowing Ember in the brazier atop the Shrine of Eternal Flame.

currentQuests.name: Call of Fire
currentQuests.description: Bring 1 Fire Tar and 1 Reagent Pouch to Telf Joolam in Durotar.

currentQuests.name: Call of Fire
currentQuests.description: Bring the Torch of the Dormant Flame to Telf Joolam in Durotar.

currentQuests.name: Call of Fire
currentQuests.description: Find Kranal Fiss in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Call of Fire (Part 1)
currentQuests.description: Find Kranal Fiss in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Call of Earth
currentQuests.description: Bring the Rough Quartz to Seer Ravenfeather in Camp Narache.

currentQuests.name: Call of Earth
currentQuests.description: Find Kodo Rock and drink the Earth Sapta.

currentQuests.name: Call of Earth
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 applications of Ritual Salve to Seer Ravenfeather in Camp Narache.

currentQuests.name: Call of Earth
currentQuests.description: Bring the Rough Quartz to Canaga Earthcaller in the Valley of Trials.

currentQuests.name: Call of Earth
currentQuests.description: Find Spirit Rock and drink the Earth Sapta.

currentQuests.name: Call of Earth
currentQuests.description: Bring 2 Felstalker Hooves to Canaga Earthcaller in the Valley of Trials.

currentQuests.name: Dogran's Captivity
currentQuests.description: Bring Ken'zigla's Draught to Dogran in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: The Binding
currentQuests.description: Using Dogran's Pendant, summon and subdue a succubus, then return Dogran's Pendant to Gan'rul Bloodeye in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Love's Gift
currentQuests.description: Bring the Dirt-caked Pendant to Gan'rul Bloodeye in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Ken'zigla's Draught
currentQuests.description: Bring Ken'zigla's Draught to Grunt Logmar at Camp Taurajo.

currentQuests.name: News of Dogran
currentQuests.description: Speak with Ken'zigla at the Malaka'jin.

currentQuests.name: News of Dogran
currentQuests.description: Speak with Gazrog at the Crossroads.

currentQuests.name: Blind Cazul
currentQuests.description: Speak with Zankaja in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Devourer of Souls
currentQuests.description: Speak with Cazul in the Cleft of Shadow.

currentQuests.name: Gan'rul's Summons
currentQuests.description: Speak with Gan'rul Bloodeye in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Veteran Uzzek
currentQuests.description: Speak with Uzzek at Far Watch Post.

currentQuests.name: The Binding
currentQuests.description: Using the Glyphs of Summoning, summon and subdue a voidwalker, then return the Glyphs of Summoning to Gan'rul Bloodeye in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Forged Steel
currentQuests.description: Bring the Forged Steel Bars to Thun'grim Firegaze in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Thun'grim Firegaze
currentQuests.description: Speak with Thun'grim Firegaze in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Creature of the Void
currentQuests.description: Retrieve the Tablet of Verga for Gan'rul Bloodeye in Orgrimmar.

currentQuests.name: Vile Familiars
currentQuests.description: Speak with Zureetha Fargaze.

currentQuests.name: Path of Defense
currentQuests.description: Bring 5 Singed Scales to Uzzek at Far Watch Post in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: The Bough of the Eternals
currentQuests.description: Take the orphan to the bank of Darnassus.  The bank itself is hollowed out of a tree known as the Bough of the Eternals.

currentQuests.name: Halgar's Summons
currentQuests.description: Speak with Carendin Halgar in the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Hearts of the Pure
currentQuests.description: Bring the hearts of Dalin Forgewright and Comar Villard to Carendin Halgar in the Temple of the Damned.

currentQuests.name: The Binding
currentQuests.description: Using the Pure Hearts, summon and subdue a succubus, then return the Pure Hearts to Carendin Halgar in the Magic Quarter of the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Creature of the Void
currentQuests.description: Recover Egalin's Grimoire and bring it to Carendin Halgar in the Temple of the Damned.

currentQuests.name: Devourer of Souls
currentQuests.description: Speak with Godrick Farsan in the Temple of the Damned.

currentQuests.name: The Binding
currentQuests.description: Using the Runes of Summoning, summon and subdue a voidwalker, then return the Runes of Summoning to Carendin Halgar in the Magic Quarter of the Undercity.

currentQuests.name: Piercing the Veil
currentQuests.description: Bring Venya Marthand 3 Rattlecage Skulls.

currentQuests.name: Children's Week
currentQuests.description: Use the Human Orphan Whistle to talk with the child you will be looking after during Children's Week.

currentQuests.name: Fire Sapta
currentQuests.description: Speak to Telf Joolam for another Fire Sapta.

currentQuests.name: Seeking the Kor Gem
currentQuests.description: Bring a Kor Gem to Thundris Windweaver in Darkshore.

currentQuests.name: Call of Water
currentQuests.description: Bring a Water Sapta to Tiev Mordune in Silverpine Forest if you failed to speak to the Minor Manifestation of Water.

currentQuests.name: Cairne's Hoofprint
currentQuests.description: Travel to Thunder Bluff to see about getting Cairne Bloodhoof's hoofprint for your ward.

currentQuests.name: You Scream, I Scream...
currentQuests.description: Get some Strawberry Ice Cream for your ward.  The lad seems to prefer Tigule and Foror's brand ice cream.

conditions.name: Tigule and Foror's Strawberry Ice Cream

currentQuests.name: Gateway to the Frontier
currentQuests.description: Take your ward to the Mor'shan Rampart in the northern part of the Barrens, just before entering Ashenvale.

currentQuests.name: Down at the Docks
currentQuests.description: Take your ward to the docks of Ratchet in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Root Samples
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Root Samples to Mebok Mizzyrix in Ratchet.

currentQuests.name: Dig Rat Stew
currentQuests.description: Bring 8 Dig Rats to Grub east of the Crossroads.

currentQuests.name: Jaina's Autograph
currentQuests.description: Travel to Theramore to see about getting Lady Jaina Proudmoore's autograph for your ward.

currentQuests.name: Beer Basted Boar Ribs
currentQuests.description: Ragnar Thunderbrew in Kharanos wants 6 Crag Boar Ribs and a mug of Rhapsody Malt.

currentQuests.name: Aquatic Form
currentQuests.description: Return to Thunder Bluff and show Turak Runetotem the Pendant of the Sea Lion.

currentQuests.name: Trial of the Lake
currentQuests.description: Find a Shrine Bauble in Lake Elune'ara, and take it to the Shrine of Remulos in northwestern Moonglade.  Once there, use the Shrine Bauble.$B$BYou must speak with Tajarri at the shrine afterwards in order to complete the trial.

currentQuests.name: Trial of the Sea Lion
currentQuests.description: Find the Half Pendant of Aquatic Agility and the Half Pendant of Aquatic Endurance.  Speak with the residents of Moonglade to learn clues as to where these items may be located.$B$BForm the Pendant of the Sea Lion from the two pendant halves.  You need to be in proximity of the Shrine of Remulos to do this.$B$BBring the joined pendant to Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.

currentQuests.name: Call of Water (Part 5)
currentQuests.description: Bring the Vial of Purest Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Children's Week
currentQuests.description: Use the Orcish Orphan Whistle to talk with the child you will be looking after during Children's Week.

currentQuests.name: A Warden of the Alliance
currentQuests.description: Return your ward to the Stormwind orphanage by handing in the Human Orphan Whistle to Orphan Matron Nightingale in the Cathedral District.

currentQuests.name: Call of Water (Part 7)
currentQuests.description: Speak to the Minor Manifestation of Water in Silverpine Forest.

currentQuests.name: Call of Water (Part 8)
currentQuests.description: Bring the Shard of Water to Islen Waterseer in the Barrens.

currentQuests.name: Call of Water (Part 6)
currentQuests.description: Defeat the Corrupt Manifestation of Water and place the Corrupted Manifestation's Bracers along with the Remaining Drops of Purest Water on the Brazier of Everfount in Silverpine Forest.

currentQuests.name: Trial of the Lake
currentQuests.description: Find a Shrine Bauble in Lake Elune'ara, and take it to the Shrine of Remulos in northwestern Moonglade.  Once there, use the Shrine Bauble.$B$BYou must speak with Tajarri at the shrine afterwards in order to complete the trial.

currentQuests.description: Speak with Dendrite Starblaze in the village of Nighthaven, Moonglade.
